item.title: Chris - 2013-03-07 19:48:47
item.content:encoded: Heeeey you! Just testing the contact form on your website. Let me know if it works. Also, I went through your draft pages of other works, tidying them up. If they look good to you, you can publish them. I’ll explain how to do it all yourself later ;-) Kisses! <!--more--> AUTHOR: Chris AUTHOR EMAIL: swithinbank@gmail.com AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 87.240.226.48 Array ( [Name] => Chris [E-mail Address] => swithinbank@gmail.com [Message] => Heeeey you! I’ll explain how to do it all yourself later ;-) Kisses! )

item.title: cordey - 2013-03-29 15:54:59
item.content:encoded: Bonjour Clara, Ja travaille avec Anne Montaron pour Alla Breve. Pour les droits d'auteurs pouvez-vous me donner les noms des interprètes de: Siciliana, Aphones, Limun, Il colore dell'ombra copia, et Glockengliesserei? Bien à vous, Françoise Cordey <!--more--> AUTHOR: cordey AUTHOR EMAIL: francoise.cordey@radiofrance.com AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 91.223.73.145 Array ( [Name] => cordey [E-mail Address] => francoise.cordey@radiofrance.com [Message] => Bonjour Clara, Ja travaille avec Anne Montaron pour Alla Breve. item.title: Maria Stefanoni - 2013-04-11 10:34:40
item.content:encoded:
I am writing you because I need your collaboration for some pieces of information or materials on your piece that will be part of the Biennale of Music 2013:
1) Could you please check the correctness of the credits hereafter presented:
MARCO FUSI viola d’amore Clara Iannotta (1983) Nuova creazione (2013, durata) prima es. ass.
could you please send us:
2) Your notes on the piece (2000 characters/ 300 words)
3) Your updated biography: short (between 600 and 1000 characters / around 150 words) and complete - including the date and the place of birth) May I use the one on your web site?
4) Photos (in color, minimum 2) of you (portraits), free from royalties and in high resolution (jpg or tiff, 300 dpi or more, 15cm x 20cm). Please specify subject /subtitles and name of the photographer
Could you please be so kind to answer me by the end of this week? For the notes if it is a world premiere you have time until June the 15th.
Thanks a lot for your collaboration,
Maria Stefanoni Assistente Ufficio Stampa Settore Danza Musica Teatro Fondazione la Biennale di Venezia Ca’ Giustinian - San Marco 1364 30124 Venezia Tel: +39 041 5218 776 / 886 Fax: +39 041 5218 843 dmtpress@labiennale.org <!--more--> AUTHOR: Maria Stefanoni AUTHOR EMAIL: dmtpress@labiennale.org AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 93.62.127.130 Array ( [Name] => Maria Stefanoni [E-mail Address] => dmtpress@labiennale.org [Message] => I am writing you because I need your collaboration for some pieces of information or materials on your piece that will be part of the Biennale of Music 2013:

4) Photos (in color, minimum 2) of you (portraits), free from royalties and in high resolution (jpg or tiff, 300 dpi or more, 15cm x 20cm). Please specify subject /subtitles and name of the photographer
Could you please be so kind to answer me by the end of this week? For the notes if it is a world premiere you have time until June the 15th.
Thanks a lot for your collaboration,
Maria Stefanoni Assistente Ufficio Stampa Settore Danza Musica Teatro Fondazione la Biennale di Venezia Ca’ Giustinian - San Marco 1364 30124 Venezia Tel: +39 041 5218 776 / 886 Fax: +39 041 5218 843 dmtpress@labiennale.org
)

item.title: Brigitta Muntendorf - 2013-04-17 18:34:04
item.content:encoded:
Dear Clara,
my name is Brigitta Muntendorf and I'm also a composer living in Cologne. I founded a few years ago the Ensemble Garage for contemporary music (http://www.ensemble-garage.de) and do the artistic direction of our concerts. In december (15.12.13) I'll curate a concert of "Frau Musica (nova)" in the Deutschlandfunk, a concert series which was founded to support female composers. We'll make a portrait-concert of Jagoda Szmytka and I would like to program also to pieces of you and Malin Bang in the concert - so I was thinking about "Al di là del bianco", it's a very "fresh" piece and I enjoyed very much listening to it. But - if you have any ideas, I'm interested! Perhaps we can talk about it via skype (I'm Munti_python)? I'm looking forward hearing from you! Best wishes Brigitta ------------------- http://www.ensemble-garage.de http://www.brigitta-muntendorf.de <!--more--> AUTHOR: Brigitta Muntendorf AUTHOR EMAIL: post@brigitta-muntendorf.de AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 195.14.204.12 Array ( [Name] => Brigitta Muntendorf [E-mail Address] => post@brigitta-muntendorf.de [Message] => Dear Clara,
my name is Brigitta Muntendorf and I'm also a composer living in Cologne. I founded a few years ago the Ensemble Garage for contemporary music (http://www.ensemble-garage.de) and do the artistic direction of our concerts. In december (15.12.13) I'll curate a concert of "Frau Musica (nova)" in the Deutschlandfunk, a concert series which was founded to support female composers. We'll make a portrait-concert of Jagoda Szmytka and I would like to program also to pieces of you and Malin Bang in the concert - so I was thinking about "Al di là del bianco", it's a very "fresh" piece and I enjoyed very much listening to it. But - if you have any ideas, I'm interested! Perhaps we can talk about it via skype (I'm Munti_python)? I'm looking forward hearing from you! Best wishes Brigitta ------------------- http://www.ensemble-garage.de http://www.brigitta-muntendorf.de )

a:4:{s:2:"to";a:1:{i:0;s:24:"clara.iannotta@gmail.com";}s:7:"subject";s:36:"Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com";s:7:"message";s:1145:"Name: Brigitta Muntendorf E-mail Address: post@brigitta-muntendorf.de : Message: Dear Clara,
my name is Brigitta Muntendorf and I'm also a composer living in Cologne. I founded a few years ago the Ensemble Garage for contemporary music (http://www.ensemble-garage.de) and do the artistic direction of our concerts. In december (15.12.13) I'll curate a concert of "Frau Musica (nova)" in the Deutschlandfunk, a concert series which was founded to support female composers. We'll make a portrait-concert of Jagoda Szmytka and I would like to program also to pieces of you and Malin Bang in the concert - so I was thinking about "Al di là del bianco", it's a very "fresh" piece and I enjoyed very much listening to it. But - if you have any ideas, I'm interested! Perhaps we can talk about it via skype (I'm Munti_python)? I'm looking forward hearing from you! Best wishes Brigitta ------------------- http://www.ensemble-garage.de http://www.brigitta-muntendorf.de
Time: Wednesday April 17, 2013 at 6:34 pm IP Address: 195.14.204.12 Contact Form URL: http://claraiannotta.com/contact/
Sent by an unverified visitor to your site.";s:7:"headers";s:137:"From: Brigitta Muntendorf <post@brigitta-muntendorf.de> Reply-To: post@brigitta-muntendorf.de Content-Type: text/plain; charset="UTF-8"";}

item.title: Raphaël Languillat - 2013-04-22 15:09:57
item.content:encoded:
Chère Clara Iannotta,
je suis étudiant en composition au CRR de Reims avec Daniel D'Adamo. J'apprécie beaucoup certaines de vos oeuvres et en cours collectif, nous avons la possibilité de faire écouter et de présenter ce que nous aimons. Je me demandais si certaines de vos partitions étaient accessibles afin de pouvoir les étudier ? Le cas échéant, savez-vous où l'on peut se les procurer ?
Merci de votre attention !
Bien cordialement,
Raphaël <!--more--> AUTHOR: Raphaël Languillat AUTHOR EMAIL: Rlanguillat@gmail.com AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 77.6.62.197 Array ( [Name] => Raphaël Languillat [E-mail Address] => Rlanguillat@gmail.com [Message] => Chère Clara Iannotta,
je suis étudiant en composition au CRR de Reims avec Daniel D'Adamo. J'apprécie beaucoup certaines de vos oeuvres et en cours collectif, nous avons la possibilité de faire écouter et de présenter ce que nous aimons. Je me demandais si certaines de vos partitions étaient accessibles afin de pouvoir les étudier ? Le cas échéant, savez-vous où l'on peut se les procurer ?
Merci de votre attention !
Bien cordialement,
Raphaël )

item.title: Annette Eckerle, Musik der Jahrhunderte - 2013-05-21 12:38:02
item.content:encoded:
Dear Clara Iannotta, I am still working on the programme booklet for the festival "Der Sommer in Stuttgart". Please send an brief programme note about your composition "Limun" (performance date at the festival "Der Sommer in Stuttgart", 21th June 2013, further informations: www.mdjstuttgart.de) as soon as possible at the latetest on 31th May.
Have a lot of thanks and all my best Annette
Have a lot of thanks and all my best Annette <!--more--> AUTHOR: Annette Eckerle, Musik der Jahrhunderte AUTHOR EMAIL: Annette.Eckerle@mjdstuttgart.de AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 84.157.243.113 Array ( [Name] => Annette Eckerle, Musik der Jahrhunderte [E-mail Address] => Annette.Eckerle@mjdstuttgart.de [Message] => Dear Clara Iannotta, I am still working on the programme booklet for the festival "Der Sommer in Stuttgart". Have a lot of thanks and all my best Annette
Have a lot of thanks and all my best Annette
)

item.title: liz hirst - 2013-05-21 18:02:39
item.content:encoded: Dear Mz Ianotta, My ensemble Garage (Cologne) has programmed your work: Al di là del bianco (2009) für Bass-Klar., Vl., Vla., Vc. und Elektronik Dauer: 7 min for our performance in December at DLF in Cologne. Would you please let me know if you have a publisher or if we can hire the music directly from you.i am the contact person for the music, Brigitta Muntendorf is the Künstlerische Leiterin of our ensemble.i look forward to hearing from you. liz hirst <!--more--> AUTHOR: liz hirst AUTHOR EMAIL: lizaston@gmx.de AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 77.180.22.113 Array ( [Name] => liz hirst [E-mail Address] => lizaston@gmx.de [Message] => Dear Mz Ianotta, My ensemble Garage (Cologne) has programmed your work: Al di là del bianco (2009) für Bass-Klar., Vl., Vla., Vc. und Elektronik Dauer: 7 min for our performance in December at DLF in Cologne. Would you please let me know if you have a publisher or if we can hire the music directly from you.i am the contact person for the music, Brigitta Muntendorf is the Künstlerische Leiterin of our ensemble.i look forward to hearing from you. liz hirst )

item.title: Simone Beneventi - 2013-06-11 15:27:52
item.content:encoded:
Gentile Clara, sono Simone Beneventi, percussionista solista e freelancer con Ensemble quali Klangforum wien, Mdi , Icarus, l'arsenale. Ti contatto perché desidero conoscere il tuo trio 3X5 di prossima prima esecuzione! Ho un progetto in duo con il fisarmonicista Luca Piovesan e se avessi piacere di inviarci la partitura del tuo pezzo, una volta libero da diritti di prima esecuzione , ci piacerebbe prenderlo in considerazione. Grazie per la disponibilità Un caro saluto Simone Beneventi 3403353964 <!--more--> AUTHOR: Simone Beneventi AUTHOR EMAIL: simone.beneventi82@gmail.com AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 37.101.175.98 Array ( [Name] => Simone Beneventi [E-mail Address] => simone.beneventi82@gmail.com [Message] => Gentile Clara, sono Simone Beneventi, percussionista solista e freelancer con Ensemble quali Klangforum wien, Mdi , Icarus, l'arsenale. item.title: Haga Ratovo - 2013-06-20 16:42:43
item.content:encoded:
Dear Clara Iannotta,
I am Haga Ratovo, a 27 pianist from Paris where I studied to the CNSMDP until last year. I am going to participate to the International Piano Competition of Orleans in march 2014, an important competition about XXth century music and contemporary music. I must play a creation, a piece for piano solo(8min maximum). I know some few young composers because I play sometimes with an ensemble called "Le Balcon" in Paris which is creating some works of young composers (Lavandier, Carreno...) . So I discovered and listened to a lot of music of young composers. But music I listened didn't bring to me what I expected from a work. I finally discovered you in the CNSMDP website. (I think I already saw you at the Conservatoire). Then I went to your website and really enjoyed your pieces.I found something powerful and inner, I mean intense and deep from the beginning to the end of your works and which is talking to senses, which is looking for something, for the sound. It is the first time I ask to a composer to write something for me and for this Competition, so I don't know how to proceed. I hope you will find my request interesting and if it is the case, we maybe could discuss about it and about other details. I repeat again that I really love your work, so let's say "Bravo" and have a nice following.
Best Regards
Haga Ratovo
P.S: Maybe if you still use french, we can speak french. It is as you wish. <!--more--> AUTHOR: Haga Ratovo AUTHOR EMAIL: h.ratovo@yahoo.fr AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 78.250.42.139 Array ( [Name] => Haga Ratovo [E-mail Address] => h.ratovo@yahoo.fr [Message] => Dear Clara Iannotta,

It is the first time I ask to a composer to write something for me and for this Competition, so I don't know how to proceed. I hope you will find my request interesting and if it is the case, we maybe could discuss about it and about other details. I repeat again that I really love your work, so let's say "Bravo" and have a nice following.
Best Regards
Haga Ratovo
P.S: Maybe if you still use french, we can speak french. It is as you wish. )

item.title: Sam Adams - 2013-06-23 10:18:29
item.content:encoded: Dear Clara, I am really interested in your music - I heard about you through Dan Vezza's podcast. I am wondering: am I overstepping my bounds by asking for a score and a full recording of your 'Clangs'? Let me know if that's possible. My best regards, Sam Adams <!--more--> AUTHOR: Sam Adams AUTHOR EMAIL: samuelcarladams@gmail.com AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 94.254.44.75 Array ( [Name] => Sam Adams [E-mail Address] => samuelcarladams@gmail.com [Message] => Dear Clara, I am really interested in your music - I heard about you through Dan Vezza's podcast. I am wondering: am I overstepping my bounds by asking for a score and a full recording of your 'Clangs'? Let me know if that's possible. My best regards, Sam Adams )

item.title: Said Ruiz - 2013-07-02 13:33:25
item.content:encoded:
Hi Clara.
I've just discovered your amazing work. I'm also composer (only a student) and I'm thinking about how to get the study score of your works. I'm interested in your ensemble works and "3 sur 5".
Where is the best place to get them? Thanks in advance and my sincere congratulations!
Said. <!--more--> AUTHOR: Said Ruiz AUTHOR EMAIL: alclasan2406@hotmail.com AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 83.60.77.2 Array ( [Name] => Said Ruiz [E-mail Address] => alclasan2406@hotmail.com [Message] => Hi Clara.
I've just discovered your amazing work. I'm also composer (only a student) and I'm thinking about how to get the study score of your works. I'm interested in your ensemble works and "3 sur 5".
Where is the best place to get them? Thanks in advance and my sincere congratulations!
Said. )

item.title: Stefano Bonilauri - 2013-07-19 10:37:04
item.content:encoded:
Ciao Clara Mi chiamo Stefano Bonilauri e sono stato come te allievo di Solbiati e selezionato dall'ensemble Aleph ed ho scritto per l'ensemble Nomos,come te, ho potuto ascoltare il pezzo per l'Aleph e dal vivo quello per Nomos e... complimenti! Complimenti anche per il piccolo omaggio per il compleanno dell'Aleph, secondo me è uno dei più riusciti ed efficaci per quelle dimensioni e sicuramente è piaciuto molto la pubblico.
Siccome io ero al concerto il 4 Giugno al teatro Dunois, ho registrato tutto ed anche le prove del giorno prima,quindi se lo desideri mi dai la tua e-mail e ti spedisco la registrazione del tuo pezzo sia del concerto che delle prove.
Stefano Bonilauri <!--more--> AUTHOR: Stefano Bonilauri AUTHOR EMAIL: stefano.mgrazia@libero.it AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 151.55.209.78 Array ( [Name] => Stefano Bonilauri [E-mail Address] => stefano.mgrazia@libero.it [Message] => Ciao Clara Mi chiamo Stefano Bonilauri e sono stato come te allievo di Solbiati e selezionato dall'ensemble Aleph ed ho scritto per l'ensemble Nomos,come te, ho potuto ascoltare il pezzo per l'Aleph e dal vivo quello per Nomos e... complimenti! Complimenti anche per il piccolo omaggio per il compleanno dell'Aleph, secondo me è uno dei più riusciti ed efficaci per quelle dimensioni e sicuramente è piaciuto molto la pubblico.
Siccome io ero al concerto il 4 Giugno al teatro Dunois, ho registrato tutto ed anche le prove del giorno prima,quindi se lo desideri mi dai la tua e-mail e ti spedisco la registrazione del tuo pezzo sia del concerto che delle prove.
Stefano Bonilauri )

item.title: Raffaele De Giacometti - 2013-09-07 10:31:33
item.content:encoded:
Gentile Clara, mi chiamo Raffaele De Giacometti. Non ci conosciamo di persona, ma entrambi abbiamo partecipato nel 2010 al Premio Nazionale delle arti di Trento come compositori. Anzitutto volevo congratularmi con lei per i risultati che sta ottenendo in ambito internazionale, per il prestigioso Gaudeamus Prize e per la borsa di studio DAAD di Berlino. Mi perdoni se le chiedo un consiglio. Mi sono appena diplomato in composizione, e come molti (tutti?) giovani artisti italiani noto che le porte nel nostro paese sono chiuse e accedere al mondo del lavoro è quasi impossibile a prescindere dalle capacità dei singoli individui. Sto dunque vagliando l’ipotesi “estero”. Le volevo chiedere dunque un consiglio sulla borsa di studio DAAD. Quando lei ha presentato la domanda aveva già chiaro il luogo (l’istituto) dove - nell’eventualità di una selezione - avrebbe praticato il “composer in residence”? è inoltre necessario indicare un programma dettagliato di ciò che si intende fare durante il periodo coperto dalla borsa di studio? Ad esempio: bisogna indicare esattamente quante composizioni si intende scrivere, per quale organico e per quale gruppo… etc, oppure nulla di tutto questo? Infine, avendo attualmente un po’ di lacune in inglese (diciamo che in qualche modo mi faccio capire e riesco a comprendere qualcosa, se non troppo complesso), è necessario presentare il TOEFL o IELTS (magari con un certo punteggio) oppure tali certificazioni non sono necessarie? E se mi permette una domanda più personale: si trova bene a Berlino? Ci sono delle possibilità per chi vorrebbe vivere con la musica (con la composizione), anche al di fuori della borsa di studio? Saranno ben accetti ulteriori consigli o sue impressioni, anche in riferimento ad istituti o enti su cui appoggiarsi… Mi scusi per tutte queste domande, anche banali, ma non avendo mai affrontato questo tipo di opportunità volevo capire un po’ come potermi muovere. Mi scuso da subito per il disturbo e spero di avere presto sue notizie. La ringrazio!
Cordialmente,
Raffaele De Giacometti

item.title: Hugo Vogel - 2013-09-12 21:51:16
item.content:encoded: Hi Clara. As a dutch composer i live for 8 months in Rome. This moment i listen your work on radio 4 in the netherlands , Gaudeamus. Hopefully you can tell me where i have to go in Rome for modern music concerti. Tell me please! I wish you succes with your music <!--more--> AUTHOR: Hugo Vogel AUTHOR EMAIL: hugovogel@telfort.nl AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 188.217.96.29 Array ( [Name] => Hugo Vogel [E-mail Address] => hugovogel@telfort.nl [Message] => Hi Clara. As a dutch composer i live for 8 months in Rome. This moment i listen your work on radio 4 in the netherlands , Gaudeamus. Hopefully you can tell me where i have to go in Rome for modern music concerti. Tell me please! I wish you succes with your music )

item.title: VAL BLU Resort in Bludenz - 2013-10-16 08:36:18

Guten Tag Frau Iannotta,
leider kann ich Sie telefonisch nicht erreichen. Sie haben ja vom 07. bis 08. Oktober 2013 bei uns im Haus genächtigt. Hierzu habe ich noch eine kurze frage. Könnten Sie uns bitte kurz unter folgender Nummer anrufen: +43 5552 63106.
Vielen Dank Liebe Grüße aus Vorarlberg
Martina Jochum Front Office

item.title: Jonathan Pontier - 2013-11-06 18:39:02
item.content:encoded: Hi Clara, Here's fellow composer Jonathan Pontier...I just wanted to say bravo for the piece you wrote for KDM, I really enjoyed it a lot ! Mostly for the combination of tonnes/textures and thé groove you put to it ! Hope to meet you someday at a concert or to hear some new things, à bientôt, Amitiés. <!--more--> AUTHOR: Jonathan Pontier AUTHOR EMAIL: jonpontier@gmail.com AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 82.225.34.178 Array ( [Name] => Jonathan Pontier [E-mail Address] => jonpontier@gmail.com [Message] => Hi Clara, Here's fellow composer Jonathan Pontier...I just wanted to say bravo for the piece you wrote for KDM, I really enjoyed it a lot ! item.title: Manuela Kerer - 2013-11-08 19:30:05
item.content:encoded:
Carissima Clara,
come stai??? Spero beneeeeeeeeeeee!!! Vorrei tanto rivederti! Ma oggi ho una richiesta: Ho una trasmissione su musica contemporanea alle RAI Radio regionale Bolzano (in lingua tedesca). Mi potresti mandare o uploadare un pezzo tuo (ca. 7-10 minuti oppure più pezzi più corti oppure qualcosa di più lungo dove si potrebbe tagliare) e mandare anche delle informazioni sul pezzo? Vorrei fare sentire la tua musica! Se il pezzo è su CD mi servirebbe il numero del CD, senò la data/luogo ecc. del concerto. Ed anche i nomi degli interpreti. Un baciooooooo!!! Manuela <!--more--> AUTHOR: Manuela Kerer AUTHOR EMAIL: manuela@kerer.bz AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 109.117.252.235 Array ( [Name] => Manuela Kerer [E-mail Address] => manuela@kerer.bz [Message] => Carissima Clara,
come stai??? Spero beneeeeeeeeeeee!!! Vorrei tanto rivederti! Ma oggi ho una richiesta: Ho una trasmissione su musica contemporanea alle RAI Radio regionale Bolzano (in lingua tedesca). Vorrei fare sentire la tua musica! Se il pezzo è su CD mi servirebbe il numero del CD, senò la data/luogo ecc. del concerto. Ed anche i nomi degli interpreti. Un baciooooooo!!! Manuela )

item.title: ulrike brand - 2013-11-11 10:50:04
item.content:encoded: Buongiorno Clara! Come promesso ierei sera ti mando i miei contatti. Il mio sito è in ricostruzione, tra poco ci sarà più materiale. Se vuoi puoi ascoltare qualcosa sotto http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zOFes0ma1l0. Mi piacerebbe tanto suonare un tuo pezzo per violoncello. Fatti viva quando sei tornata. A presto! item.title: Mateja Zenzerovic - 2013-11-11 12:36:00
item.content:encoded:
Sehr geehrte Clara, ich bin Mateja Zenzerovic, eine Akkordeonistin aus Hannover. Ich gratuliere Dir zur Deine Musik! Es ist faszinierend! Und um direkt zu sprechen, würde ich sehr gerne ein Stück von Dir für Akkordeon solo haben! Ich bin jetzt dabei um Gelder zu sammeln um meine Idee realisieren zu können einigen Jungen Komponisten den Auftrag zu geben und neue Werke fürs Akkordeon zu kriegen. Hättest Du überhaupt interesse ein Werk für Akkordeon solo zu schreiben? Ich würde mich sehr freuen!
Viele Grüße, Mateja www.matejazenzerovic.com <!--more--> AUTHOR: Mateja Zenzerovic AUTHOR EMAIL: matejazenzerovic@yahoo.com AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 217.190.201.98 Array ( [Name] => Mateja Zenzerovic [E-mail Address] => matejazenzerovic@yahoo.com [Message] => Sehr geehrte Clara, ich bin Mateja Zenzerovic, eine Akkordeonistin aus Hannover. Ich gratuliere Dir zur Deine Musik! Es ist faszinierend! Und um direkt zu sprechen, würde ich sehr gerne ein Stück von Dir für Akkordeon solo haben! Ich bin jetzt dabei um Gelder zu sammeln um meine Idee realisieren zu können einigen Jungen Komponisten den Auftrag zu geben und neue Werke fürs Akkordeon zu kriegen. Hättest Du überhaupt interesse ein Werk für Akkordeon solo zu schreiben? Ich würde mich sehr freuen!
Viele Grüße, Mateja www.matejazenzerovic.com )

item.title: Alexa Guenther - 2013-11-13 09:35:53
item.content:encoded:
Dear Clara, i hope you're getting better soon, sending a lot of stranger wishing wells. I am currently looking for awesome, inspiring people to participate in a documentary for my friends at Indenpendent Films. http://www.independ.net/ this is what they are looking for:
We are producing a short documentary on creative and inspirational individuals within the Berlin sphere of influence. Following themes of inspiration, innovation and experimentation, we will shape the film around four central characters in order to experience their creative processes unfolding. We believe these characters' ability to change our way of looking at something and their individuality makes them stand out in the crowd.
As a person who has achieved in their field, we feel you embody these principles and we'd like to invite you to participate in the documentary as one of the key contributors.
Practically this would involve an interview and some time with the camera crew observing your working practices. We are happy to be flexible to your schedule and work around you in a way that would be least intrusive to your work.
We expect this to take place over approximately 2 days between the 24th of November and the 1st December, excluding the 25th-26th.
The final piece will sit upon Toyota's website.
In order to compensate you for the minimal disruption and your time we propose a goodwill gesture of 500 euros and a usage fee of 1500 euros, for a total of 2000 euros.
If this sounds like something that you are interested in our next step would be for one of our researchers to come and visit you to do a very brief interview on camera. This would only be viewed internally here at Independent Films.
the timing would be rather tight - but still, i would love to stay in contact, either for that project or one my other "buns" - your stuff is pretty rad!
hope to talk soon, wishing you all the best! Cheers, Alexa +49 176 32906651 mail: alexa@smallthings.tv <!--more--> AUTHOR: Alexa Guenther AUTHOR EMAIL: alexa@smallthings.tv AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 77.12.61.39 Array ( [Name] => Alexa Guenther [E-mail Address] => alexa@smallthings.tv [Message] => Dear Clara, i hope you're getting better soon, sending a lot of stranger wishing wells. I am currently looking for awesome, inspiring people to participate in a documentary for my friends at Indenpendent Films. http://www.independ.net/ this is what they are looking for:
We are producing a short documentary on creative and inspirational individuals within the Berlin sphere of influence. Following themes of inspiration, innovation and experimentation, we will shape the film around four central characters in order to experience their creative processes unfolding. We believe these characters' ability to change our way of looking at something and their individuality makes them stand out in the crowd.
As a person who has achieved in their field, we feel you embody these principles and we'd like to invite you to participate in the documentary as one of the key contributors.
Practically this would involve an interview and some time with the camera crew observing your working practices. We are happy to be flexible to your schedule and work around you in a way that would be least intrusive to your work.
We expect this to take place over approximately 2 days between the 24th of November and the 1st December, excluding the 25th-26th.
The final piece will sit upon Toyota's website.
In order to compensate you for the minimal disruption and your time we propose a goodwill gesture of 500 euros and a usage fee of 1500 euros, for a total of 2000 euros.
If this sounds like something that you are interested in our next step would be for one of our researchers to come and visit you to do a very brief interview on camera. This would only be viewed internally here at Independent Films.
the timing would be rather tight - but still, i would love to stay in contact, either for that project or one my other "buns" - your stuff is pretty rad!
hope to talk soon, wishing you all the best! Cheers, Alexa +49 176 32906651 mail: alexa@smallthings.tv )

item.title: wolfram schurig - 2013-11-24 19:48:47
item.content:encoded:
Hi Clara!
Just want to say good luck for your upcoming direction period at the btzm. It's a pity you couldn'd come this year! Looking forward to probably meeting you in Nov'14! - and, of course listening to your programs!
All the best!
Wolfram
All the best <!--more--> AUTHOR: wolfram schurig AUTHOR EMAIL: wolfram.schurig@gmail.com AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 194.166.226.9 Array ( [Name] => wolfram schurig [E-mail Address] => wolfram.schurig@gmail.com [Message] => Hi Clara!
Just want to say good luck for your upcoming direction period at the btzm. It's a pity you couldn'd come this year! Looking forward to probably meeting you in Nov'14! - and, of course listening to your programs!
All the best!
Wolfram
All the best )

item.title: Martine Guibert / Ensemble 2e2m - 2013-11-26 10:53:46
item.content:encoded:
Dear Clara Iannotta,
Pierre Roullier, artistic director of 2e2m, would be very happy to receive some of your scores for ensemble (approximatively 8 to 15 instruments), if possible works which would be French premières in 2015. Could you send them as pdf files to my e-mail address or by post at : Ensemble 2e2m 15, Boulevard Gabriel Péri 94500 Champigny sur Marne France
with many thanks and kind regards my phone : + 33 1 47 06 17 76 <!--more--> AUTHOR: Martine Guibert / Ensemble 2e2m AUTHOR EMAIL: ens2e2m@wanadoo.fr AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 195.6.36.115 Array ( [Name] => Martine Guibert / Ensemble 2e2m [E-mail Address] => ens2e2m@wanadoo.fr [Message] => Dear Clara Iannotta,
Pierre Roullier, artistic director of 2e2m, would be very happy to receive some of your scores for ensemble (approximatively 8 to 15 instruments), if possible works which would be French premières in 2015. Could you send them as pdf files to my e-mail address or by post at : Ensemble 2e2m 15, Boulevard Gabriel Péri 94500 Champigny sur Marne France
with many thanks and kind regards my phone : + 33 1 47 06 17 76 )

item.title: Jari Klemetti - 2013-11-26 14:43:33
item.content:encoded:
Dear Ms. Iannotta,
My name is Jari Klemetti and I'm writing from Sibelius Academy Library (Helsinki, Finland) to ask if your music is available for purchase by some publishing house or directly from you. One of our doctoral students has been very impressed by your work and is seaching for material for her doctoral dissertation. If possible, we would be eager to acquaire some of your scores for our colletion to be studied by our teachers and students.
Thank you very much for your attention.
With best regards,
Jari Klemetti
Collection Development Coordinator The University of the Arts Helsinki Sibelius Academy Library POB-39 (Toolonlahdenkatu 16 C) FI-00097 Taideyliopisto Finland
E-mail: jari.klemetti@siba.fi Tel. +358 40 710 4221
http://lib.siba.fi/en/home/ www.facebook.com/sibakirjasto <!--more--> AUTHOR: Jari Klemetti AUTHOR EMAIL: jari.klemetti@siba.fi AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 128.214.156.116 Array ( [Name] => Jari Klemetti [E-mail Address] => jari.klemetti@siba.fi [Message] => Dear Ms. Iannotta,

One of our doctoral students has been very impressed by your work and is seaching for material for her doctoral dissertation. If possible, we would be eager to acquaire some of your scores for our colletion to be studied by our teachers and students.
Thank you very much for your attention.
With best regards,
Jari Klemetti
Collection Development Coordinator The University of the Arts Helsinki Sibelius Academy Library POB-39 (Toolonlahdenkatu 16 C) FI-00097 Taideyliopisto Finland
E-mail: jari.klemetti@siba.fi Tel. +358 40 710 4221
http://lib.siba.fi/en/home/ www.facebook.com/sibakirjasto )

a:4:{s:2:"to";a:1:{i:0;s:24:"clara.iannotta@gmail.com";}s:7:"subject";s:36:"Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com";s:7:"message";s:1065:"Name: Jari Klemetti E-mail Address: jari.klemetti@siba.fi : Message: Dear Ms. Iannotta,
My name is Jari Klemetti and I'm writing from Sibelius Academy Library (Helsinki, Finland) to ask if your music is available for purchase by some publishing house or directly from you. One of our doctoral students has been very impressed by your work and is seaching for material for her doctoral dissertation. If possible, we would be eager to acquaire some of your scores for our colletion to be studied by our teachers and students.
Thank you very much for your attention.
With best regards,
Jari Klemetti
Collection Development Coordinator The University of the Arts Helsinki Sibelius Academy Library POB-39 (Toolonlahdenkatu 16 C) FI-00097 Taideyliopisto Finland
E-mail: jari.klemetti@siba.fi Tel. +358 40 710 4221
http://lib.siba.fi/en/home/ www.facebook.com/sibakirjasto
Time: Tuesday November 26, 2013 at 2:43 pm IP Address: 128.214.156.116 Contact Form URL: http://claraiannotta.com/contact/
Sent by an unverified visitor to your site.";s:7:"headers";s:119:"From: Jari Klemetti <jari.klemetti@siba.fi> Reply-To: jari.klemetti@siba.fi Content-Type: text/plain; charset="UTF-8"";}

item.title: PHACE - 2013-11-28 00:19:23
item.content:encoded:
Dear Clara Iannotta, I just came accross your work by chance (Soundcloud) and it got me quite interested. Could you please send me scores (PDF is fine) of your following works for perusal:
Mini (2013) for 7 musicians D’après (2012) for 7 musicians Al di là del bianco (2009) for bass clarinet & string trio
if you prefer by slow mail: PHACE c/o Reinhard Fuchs Selzergasse 18/1 1150 Vienna
www.phace.at
Thanks and best regards, Reinhard Fuchs (artistic director PHACE) <!--more--> AUTHOR: PHACE AUTHOR EMAIL: reinhard.fuchs@phace.at AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 77.119.129.53 Array ( [Name] => PHACE [E-mail Address] => reinhard.fuchs@phace.at [Message] => Dear Clara Iannotta, I just came accross your work by chance (Soundcloud) and it got me quite interested. Could you please send me scores (PDF is fine) of your following works for perusal:
Mini (2013) for 7 musicians D’après (2012) for 7 musicians Al di là del bianco (2009) for bass clarinet & string trio
if you prefer by slow mail: PHACE c/o Reinhard Fuchs Selzergasse 18/1 1150 Vienna
www.phace.at
Thanks and best regards, Reinhard Fuchs (artistic director PHACE)
)

item.title: Edoardo Gammarelli - 2013-12-05 09:51:09
item.content:encoded: Ciao, sono un italiano che vive a Stoccarda da 2 anni. Ho sentito oggi una tua intervista su Deutschland Radio Kultur. Sono un appassionato di musica (tutti i generi) ma conosco poco la colta moderna. Ciononostante ho subito cercato qualcosa in rete. E quello che ho trovato mi piace! Solo un appunto: il tuo sito internet è essenziale e semplice...ma davvero poco leggibile. Senza fare grandi sforzi, dovresti provare a cambiare il colore dello sfondo perché il bianco "sparato" rende proprio fastidiosa la lettura! Complimenti per la tua carriera e continua così. E un giorno magari ritorneremo tutti in Italia.... Edoardo <!--more--> AUTHOR: Edoardo Gammarelli AUTHOR EMAIL: edoardo.gammarelli2@de.bosch.com AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 194.39.218.10 Array ( [Name] => Edoardo Gammarelli [E-mail Address] => edoardo.gammarelli2@de.bosch.com [Message] => Ciao, sono un italiano che vive a Stoccarda da 2 anni. Ho sentito oggi una tua intervista su Deutschland Radio Kultur. Sono un appassionato di musica (tutti i generi) ma conosco poco la colta moderna. Ciononostante ho subito cercato qualcosa in rete. E quello che ho trovato mi piace! Solo un appunto: il tuo sito internet è essenziale e semplice...ma davvero poco leggibile. Senza fare grandi sforzi, dovresti provare a cambiare il colore dello sfondo perché il bianco "sparato" rende proprio fastidiosa la lettura! Complimenti per la tua carriera e continua così. E un giorno magari ritorneremo tutti in Italia.... Edoardo )

item.title: Mathis Mayr - 2013-12-06 16:42:10
item.content:encoded: Hallo Clara Iannotta, I am the Cellist of Ensemble mosaik and Heard your string quartet in Klangwerkstatt,it was really very good. I really hope that your piece clang will be chosen for the first concert of ensemble kollektiv, maybe you know more about it?, I listened to the part on soundcloud and I thought it is very beautiful. Could you maybe send me already the score and / or the cello part , so I could prepare it a little bit and we could meet in January to work on it? Tomorrow we fly with mosaik to Bangkok because of the wet and cold weather in Berlin. Hope to see you soon. All best, mathis <!--more--> AUTHOR: Mathis Mayr AUTHOR EMAIL: Mathismayr@yahoo.de AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 2.207.86.101 Array ( [Name] => Mathis Mayr [E-mail Address] => Mathismayr@yahoo.de [Message] => Hallo Clara Iannotta, I am the Cellist of Ensemble mosaik and Heard your string quartet in Klangwerkstatt,it was really very good. I really hope that your piece clang will be chosen for the first concert of ensemble kollektiv, maybe you know more about it?, I listened to the part on soundcloud and I thought it is very beautiful. Could you maybe send me already the score and / or the cello part , so I could prepare it a little bit and we could meet in January to work on it? Tomorrow we fly with mosaik to Bangkok because of the wet and cold weather in Berlin. Hope to see you soon. All best, mathis )

item.title: Annegret Mayer-Lindenberg - 2013-12-07 13:29:43
item.content:encoded:
Hallo Clara, my name is Annegret, I'm the viola player of Ensemble Garage in Köln (Germany), and we are playing your piece "Al di là del bianco" next week, as you probably know. I have a question about the piece (viola part): in measure 90/91 and also 98/99 it is not possible for me to play what is written, because the interval is to big to catch within one hand, what should I do there? play only one line or play something different? Thankyou!
best wishes, looking forward to playing and working on your piece, Annegret <!--more--> AUTHOR: Annegret Mayer-Lindenberg AUTHOR EMAIL: amayerlindenberg@gmail.com AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 79.228.183.120 Array ( [Name] => Annegret Mayer-Lindenberg [E-mail Address] => amayerlindenberg@gmail.com [Message] => Hallo Clara, my name is Annegret, I'm the viola player of Ensemble Garage in Köln (Germany), and we are playing your piece "Al di là del bianco" next week, as you probably know. I have a question about the piece (viola part): in measure 90/91 and also 98/99 it is not possible for me to play what is written, because the interval is to big to catch within one hand, what should I do there? play only one line or play something different? Thankyou!
best wishes, looking forward to playing and working on your piece, Annegret
)

item.title: Joungbum Lee - 2013-12-08 06:27:26
item.content:encoded:
Dear Mrs. Iannontta I really enjoyed your music especially your ensemble works. Is there any way that I could get a score? for clangs (2012) and àphones (2011)? It would be great if I could listen with scores! Thanks Sincerely, <!--more--> AUTHOR: Joungbum Lee AUTHOR EMAIL: joungbumlee@gmail.com AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 98.201.153.82 Array ( [Name] => Joungbum Lee [E-mail Address] => joungbumlee@gmail.com [Message] => Dear Mrs. Iannontta I really enjoyed your music especially your ensemble works. item.content:encoded:
Hallo Clara, I have had some discussions with Alexander Moosbrugger about the Bozzini Quartet coming to Bludenz again next year. Alexander told me that you are curating next years program so I was wondering if I could pick up the talks with you. best regards, Clemens

item.title: Enrico Minaglia - 2013-12-12 11:09:05
item.content:encoded:
Ehilà, chi si risente! Spero ti ricordi di me, ci siamo conosciuti in classe da Alessandro, ero l'altro romano. Ti scrivo perchè ho visto che sei stata selezionata per il MATA, e siccome volevo inviargli del materiale, volevo sapere quale fosse stata la tua esperienza... ne vale la pena? Un'altra cosa: hai per caso sentito Alessandro di recente? Sto provando a contattarlo da qualche giorno ma non risponde alle email e al cellulare, ne sai niente?
grazie, a presto
Enrico <!--more--> AUTHOR: Enrico Minaglia AUTHOR EMAIL: enrico.minaglia@gmail.com AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 94.37.36.194 Array ( [Name] => Enrico Minaglia [E-mail Address] => enrico.minaglia@gmail.com [Message] => Ehilà, chi si risente! Spero ti ricordi di me, ci siamo conosciuti in classe da Alessandro, ero l'altro romano. Ti scrivo perchè ho visto che sei stata selezionata per il MATA, e siccome volevo inviargli del materiale, volevo sapere quale fosse stata la tua esperienza... ne vale la pena? Un'altra cosa: hai per caso sentito Alessandro di recente? Sto provando a contattarlo da qualche giorno ma non risponde alle email e al cellulare, ne sai niente?
grazie, a presto
Enrico )

item.title: Matthew - 2014-01-07 17:20:50
item.content:encoded:
Hi Clara!
Nice website. Congrats on everything, particularly Ensemble Intercontemporain!

item.title: silvia thurner - 2014-01-08 09:37:33
item.content:encoded:
Hallo Clara,
Alexander Moosbrugger told me, that you are making the program of the "bludenzer tage zeitgemäßer musik" in 2014. Do you have the preview of the program at this time? In an article in the magazine KULTUR about festivals in Vorarlberg their will be a short advertising to the btzm. Best regards Silvia Thurner <!--more--> AUTHOR: silvia thurner AUTHOR EMAIL: silvia.thurner@aon.at AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 178.188.81.226 Array ( [Name] => silvia thurner [E-mail Address] => silvia.thurner@aon.at [Message] => Hallo Clara,

item.title: Valeria Sirangelo-TRIO ECLETTICA - 2014-01-09 21:52:40
item.content:encoded: Ciao Clara, sono Valeria del Trio Eclettica, ci ha parlato molto bene di te Rocco De Cia con cui abbiamo avuto il piacere di collaborare. Abbiamo ascoltato "Il colore dell' ombra" e ci è piaciuto molto. Stiamo preparando un progetto per la divulgazione della musica contemporanea e la promozione dei nuovi compositori. Ti vorremmo chiedere se ti facesse piacere scrivere un pezzo per noi da inserire in questo progetto. Naturalmente ci dovresti indicare il tuo compenso. Grazie mille, Valeria. <!--more--> AUTHOR: Valeria Sirangelo-TRIO ECLETTICA AUTHOR EMAIL: trioeclettica@gmail.com AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 93.37.24.156 Array ( [Name] => Valeria Sirangelo-TRIO ECLETTICA [E-mail Address] => trioeclettica@gmail.com [Message] => Ciao Clara, sono Valeria del Trio Eclettica, ci ha parlato molto bene di te Rocco De Cia con cui abbiamo avuto il piacere di collaborare. Abbiamo ascoltato "Il colore dell' ombra" e ci è piaciuto molto. Stiamo preparando un progetto per la divulgazione della musica contemporanea e la promozione dei nuovi compositori. Ti vorremmo chiedere se ti facesse piacere scrivere un pezzo per noi da inserire in questo progetto. Naturalmente ci dovresti indicare il tuo compenso. Grazie mille, Valeria. )

item.title: Josephine Valeske - 2014-01-13 13:20:25
item.content:encoded:
Dear Ms Ianotta,
for the public relation work of the festival MaerzMusik we need some high quality press photographs of you. Could you possibly send some to my e-mail address or provide me with the contact details of someone to ask?
Thank you for the effort, yours sincerely Josephine Valeske <!--more--> AUTHOR: Josephine Valeske AUTHOR EMAIL: josephine.valeske@berlinerfestspiele.de AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 213.61.32.110 Array ( [Name] => Josephine Valeske [E-mail Address] => josephine.valeske@berlinerfestspiele.de [Message] => Dear Ms Ianotta,
for the public relation work of the festival MaerzMusik we need some high quality press photographs of you. Could you possibly send some to my e-mail address or provide me with the contact details of someone to ask?
Thank you for the effort, yours sincerely Josephine Valeske

item.title: Bob Paolinelli - 2014-01-26 13:35:36
item.content:encoded:

item.title: felix baumann - 2014-01-26 14:39:39
item.content:encoded:
Dear Clara,
Wir planen an den kommenden Tagen für Neue Musik Zürich am 16. November ein Ensemblestück von Dir mit dem Hochschulensemble für zeitgenössische Musik aufzuführen. Bin vom 27.1.-5.2. in Berlin, hast Du zufällig Lust und Zeit für ein kurzes Treffen? Würde mich freuen. Wenn nicht: magst Du mir eines Deiner neueren Stücke empfehlen, das für einfach besetztes Ensemble auf Hochschulstufe machbar ist? Die Studierenden sind nicht ganz ungewohnt, Neue Musik zu spielen. Danke Dir!
Liebe Grüsse Felix Baumann
Leiter MA of Arts in Composition and Theory ZHdK Zürcher Hochschule der Künste <!--more--> AUTHOR: felix baumann AUTHOR EMAIL: felix.baumann@zhdk.ch AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 178.198.142.56 Array ( [Name] => felix baumann [E-mail Address] => felix.baumann@zhdk.ch [Message] => Dear Clara,
Wir planen an den kommenden Tagen für Neue Musik Zürich am 16. November ein Ensemblestück von Dir mit dem Hochschulensemble für zeitgenössische Musik aufzuführen. Bin vom 27.1.-5.2. in Berlin, hast Du zufällig Lust und Zeit für ein kurzes Treffen? Würde mich freuen. Wenn nicht: magst Du mir eines Deiner neueren Stücke empfehlen, das für einfach besetztes Ensemble auf Hochschulstufe machbar ist? Die Studierenden sind nicht ganz ungewohnt, Neue Musik zu spielen. Danke Dir!
Liebe Grüsse Felix Baumann
Leiter MA of Arts in Composition and Theory ZHdK Zürcher Hochschule der Künste )

Wenn nicht: magst Du mir eines Deiner neueren Stücke empfehlen, das für einfach besetztes Ensemble auf Hochschulstufe machbar ist? Die Studierenden sind nicht ganz ungewohnt, Neue Musik zu spielen. Danke Dir!
Liebe Grüsse Felix Baumann

item.content:encoded:
LIebe Clara Iannotta,
PHACE will am 12.05.2015 "Al di là del bianco" im Wiener Konzerthaus aufführen und wir benötigen dazu die Noten. Bekommen wir diese über Sie oder über einen Verlag?

item.title: gregory brown - 2014-02-12 22:34:22
item.content:encoded: Hey Clara, I'm with DOTDOTDOTMUSIC, the publicist for the MATA festival this year. I'm putting together a password-protected website for press to access photos, can you send me a hi-res photo of yourself with photographer credits that I can put on there? Hi-res meaning 200-300 dpi, 2-10 mb. Thanks a lot! Cheers, Greg <!--more--> AUTHOR: gregory brown AUTHOR EMAIL: gregory@dotdotdotmusic.net AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 142.255.75.138 Array ( [Name] => gregory brown [E-mail Address] => gregory@dotdotdotmusic.net [Message] => Hey Clara, I'm with DOTDOTDOTMUSIC, the publicist for the MATA festival this year. I'm putting together a password-protected website for press to access photos, can you send me a hi-res photo of yourself with photographer credits that I can put on there? Hi-res meaning 200-300 dpi, 2-10 mb. Thanks a lot! Cheers, Greg )

item.title: silvia borzelli - 2014-02-17 20:14:39
item.content:encoded: ciao clara, sono silvia borzelli, non ci conosciamo personalmente ma abbiamo amici in comune ed ho spesso sentito parlare di te. ti scrivo perché sono stata contattata tempo fa dal trio eclettica e so che hai fatto il mio nome; anche se non so se la collaborazione si potrà realizzare o meno (incastri temporali non favorevoli) ho pensato comunque di farti sapere che ho apprezzato la tua "segnalazione". mi dispiace non esser potuta venire ad ascoltare il concerto del gaudemus con il tuo pezzo lo scorso settembre (vivo ad amsterdam) e spero quindi di aver presto o tardi un'altra occasione per conoscerti personalmente. inoltre ti faccio i complimenti per il tuo lavoro, ho appena ascoltato un pò dei tuoi pezzi (bellissimo limun), non capita tutti i giorni di incontrare un'altra compositrice romana, anch'essa emigrata (in fuga dall'amaro bel paese?) e soprattutto brava. in bocca al lupo per tutto e spero a presto silvia <!--more--> AUTHOR: silvia borzelli AUTHOR EMAIL: slvbrz@yahoo.it AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 77.173.117.57 Array ( [Name] => silvia borzelli [E-mail Address] => slvbrz@yahoo.it [Message] => ciao clara, sono silvia borzelli, non ci conosciamo personalmente ma abbiamo amici in comune ed ho spesso sentito parlare di te. ti scrivo perché sono stata contattata tempo fa dal trio eclettica e so che hai fatto il mio nome; anche se non so se la collaborazione si potrà realizzare o meno (incastri temporali non favorevoli) ho pensato comunque di farti sapere che ho apprezzato la tua "segnalazione". mi dispiace non esser potuta venire ad ascoltare il concerto del gaudemus con il tuo pezzo lo scorso settembre (vivo ad amsterdam) e spero quindi di aver presto o tardi un'altra occasione per conoscerti personalmente. inoltre ti faccio i complimenti per il tuo lavoro, ho appena ascoltato un pò dei tuoi pezzi (bellissimo limun), non capita tutti i giorni di incontrare un'altra compositrice romana, anch'essa emigrata (in fuga dall'amaro bel paese?) e soprattutto brava. in bocca al lupo per tutto e spero a presto silvia )

item.title: Kristina Pott - 2014-02-19 13:57:22
item.content:encoded:
Dear Ms. Iannotta,
for this year's "Wittener Tage für Neue Kammermusik" we would like to print a photo of yours in the festival brochure. Could you send us a portrait, license free, but with the photographer's name and in high quality (1500KB minimum)?
For any questions, please feel free to send me an e-mail. Best regards,
Kristina Pott <!--more--> AUTHOR: Kristina Pott AUTHOR EMAIL: a1325.carlton@wdr.de AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 149.219.195.226 Array ( [Name] => Kristina Pott [E-mail Address] => a1325.carlton@wdr.de [Message] => Dear Ms. Iannotta,
for this year's "Wittener Tage für Neue Kammermusik" we would like to print a photo of yours in the festival brochure. Could you send us a portrait, license free, but with the photographer's name and in high quality (1500KB minimum)?
For any questions, please feel free to send me an e-mail. Best regards,
Kristina Pott )

item.title: Rubén Vega - 2014-03-04 16:42:58
item.content:encoded:
Hola,
¿Conoces el European Musical Creation Workshop?
Se trata de una iniciativa que pretende contribuir a la consolidación profesional de jóvenes compositores así como al desarrollo de redes de cooperación entre compositores, intérpretes, promotores y público.
Actualmente está abierto el plazo para solicitudes de participación en el próximo Composition Summer Camp. Tal vez puedas estar interesada o puedas conocer a alguien que pueda estarlo.
http://www.emcw.eu/es/calls/2014/
Me gustaría estar al corriente de tus noticias bien por email, facebook o twitter.
Gracias por la atención y recibe un saludo atento,
Rubén Vega Balbás EMCW ~ Production Manager www.emcw.eu info@emcw.eu Twitter: @emcw_eu Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/pages/European-Musical-Creation-Workshop/291504454226462 <!--more--> AUTHOR: Rubén Vega AUTHOR EMAIL: info@emcw.eu AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 81.43.195.234 Array ( [Name] => Rubén Vega [E-mail Address] => info@emcw.eu [Message] => Hola,

item.title: Josquin Macarez - 2014-03-06 19:41:00
item.content:encoded:
Chère Clara,
Je me permets de vous contacter car nous aimerions vous proposer de composer une oeuvre pour notre choeur lors de la saison 15/16.
accentus est un chœur de chambre professionnel très investi dans le répertoire a cappella, la création contemporaine, l’oratorio et l’opéra. Fondé par Laurence Equilbey il y a 20 ans, il se produit aujourd’hui dans les plus grandes salles de concerts et festivals français et internationaux. Je vous invite à consulter notre site internet : http://www.accentus.fr/erda-accentus/accentus/biographie/ Seriez-vous intéressé pour créer une oeuvre (15 minutes maximum) pour notre choeur en 15/16 ? Je suis à votre disposition pour en discuter. Bien cordialement,
Josquin Macarez Délegué artistique
erda | accentus 51 rue de Chabrol F-75010 Paris T: +33 1 42 46 22 87 / M: +33 6 33 23 08 43 www.accentus.fr www.insulaorchestra.fr www.lejeunechoeurdeparis.fr www.tenso-vocal.com <!--more--> AUTHOR: Josquin Macarez AUTHOR EMAIL: j.macarez@accentus.fr AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 82.226.77.85 Array ( [Name] => Josquin Macarez [E-mail Address] => j.macarez@accentus.fr [Message] => Chère Clara,

Je suis à votre disposition pour en discuter. Bien cordialement,
Josquin Macarez Délegué artistique
erda | accentus 51 rue de Chabrol F-75010 Paris T: +33 1 42 46 22 87 / M: +33 6 33 23 08 43 www.accentus.fr www.insulaorchestra.fr www.lejeunechoeurdeparis.fr www.tenso-vocal.com
)

item.title: Karin Hascher - 2014-03-17 10:51:31
item.content:encoded:
Sorry - I was too fast.... Message: Subjekt: Kompositionspreis der Landeshauptstadt Stuttgart Dear Mrs. Ianotta, for our City-Newspaper Stuttgarter Amtsblatt (and for www.stuttgart.de) we need a printable colour photo of you. I have only ab black an white, but I founded a photo on soundcloud - this ist nice, but too small to print it. Could you please send me a better one? Greatings, Karin Hascher, Telefon +49(0)711-216-91797 <!--more--> AUTHOR: Karin Hascher AUTHOR EMAIL: karin.hascher@stuttgart.de AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 91.208.45.101 Array ( [Name] => Karin Hascher [E-mail Address] => karin.hascher@stuttgart.de [Message] => Sorry - I was too fast.... Message: Subjekt: Kompositionspreis der Landeshauptstadt Stuttgart Dear Mrs. Ianotta, for our City-Newspaper Stuttgarter Amtsblatt (and for www.stuttgart.de) we need a printable colour photo of you. )

item.title: Eddy Geeraerts - 2014-03-17 12:08:41
item.content:encoded:
PC tradotte Compositori, editori musicali, Mandami un punteggio (full score), ed effettuo una registrazione con il PC, per orchestra sinfonica, banda, orchestra da camera, coro o coro e orchestra, solista con accompagnamento di pianoforte, musica per il cinema, accompagnamento di una canzone etc... Molti mesi ho cercato i miglior suoni e programmi. Oserei dire che alcuni passagi suonare meglio di una versione con orchestra. Un grande vantaggio è che dopo la registrazione, su richiestra del compositore tutto regolazione sono possibili. Stile e interpretazione, sound, equilibro, staccato, legato. FX e tutti gli effetti uno studio musicale sono possibili. A partire da 45 Euro, posso anche fare un accompagnamento di pianoforte con e senza solista, il solista può praticare con accompagnamento di pianoforte. Lo lavaro non è molto costoso. Per 85 Euro avete una registrazione di diversi minuti. Ma imprimo, mandami un punteggio (e- mail) e faccio una breve registrazione GRATUITA, successivamente se si è soddisfatti, si può decidere per effettuare una registrazione competa. Esempi 1.Symphonic orchestra: Beethoven - 5th Symphony http://users.telenet.be/recordings/1.Beethoven5.mp3
2.Symphonic Band: Dvorak - New World http://users.telenet.be/recordings/2.NewWorld.mp3
3.Choir (SATB) and Symphonic Orchestra: "Agnus Dei" from the Requiem - Mozart http://users.telenet.be/recordings/3.Requiem.mp3
4.Clarinet Solo and Piano: Weber - Concertino for Clarinet http://users.telenet.be/recordings/4.Weber.mp3
5.Contemporary modern woodwind Quintet. http://users.telenet.be/recordings/5.WoodQuintet.mp3
6.Contemporary modern String Quartet http://users.telenet.be/recordings/6.StringQuartet.mp3
Reason for my writing you. For several months now, I've been focused on making music recordings with the use of a PC and am therefore contacting composers and Music Publishers. If you supply me with a score, I will make a recording for you whether it's for an orchestra, symphony orchestra, concert band, chamber music, choir and orchestra, solo instrument with piano accompaniment, film music, etc. I have invested a significant amount of time and resources in finding the right combination of programs in order to reach a good result, of which I dare say that some movements sound better than a live recording with an orchestra would. I used to be the Bandmaster for various military orchestra's and my background as a conductor means I have experience with style, interpretation, balance, etc. Composers often like to listen to their work in order to add some subsequent adjustments to the composition or just to have a recording. Recordings in a studio with an orchestra are very expensive, while I can make a representative recording at a very affordable rate with professional sounds and programs. The major advantage is that all adjustments submitted by the composer after the recording are possible, such as style and interpretation, more or less staccato, vibrato, legato, some movements placed a little earlier on, etc. Moreover, I can offer the printed scores in an easily printable PDF format. The sound can also be adjusted; sharper, fuller, echo, FX effects, etc. Mastering equal to that of a professional studio is possible. Even adjustments per note are possible. As soon as you have your ready-made composition, you can listen to it for a first round and then add all the adjustments. If you supply me with a score (possible by email), then I can record a fragment for you by way of a FREE trial sample - without any strings attached, of course. I can also (at a very good rate, starting from 45€) record piano accompaniments,with and without soloist, essential for educational compositions. Students of the academy can then rehearse their works with the aid of a piano recording, which might be very interesting. I do not charge high rates, as this is more of a hobby. For instance, I offer 3-minutes demos(for Symphonic orchestra or Band) from 85€. You can request a quotation without any commitment. Moreover, you will only be charged if you are satisfied with the final result. Eddy Geeraerts <!--more--> AUTHOR: Eddy Geeraerts AUTHOR EMAIL: eddygeeraerts@telenet.be AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 94.226.195.154 Array ( [Name] => Eddy Geeraerts [E-mail Address] => eddygeeraerts@telenet.be [Message] => PC tradotte Compositori, editori musicali, Mandami un punteggio (full score), ed effettuo una registrazione con il PC, per orchestra sinfonica, banda, orchestra da camera, coro o coro e orchestra, solista con accompagnamento di pianoforte, musica per il cinema, accompagnamento di una canzone etc... Un grande vantaggio è che dopo la registrazione, su richiestra del compositore tutto regolazione sono possibili. Stile e interpretazione, sound, equilibro, staccato, legato. FX e tutti gli effetti uno studio musicale sono possibili. A partire da 45 Euro, posso anche fare un accompagnamento di pianoforte con e senza solista, il solista può praticare con accompagnamento di pianoforte. Lo lavaro non è molto costoso. Per 85 Euro avete una registrazione di diversi minuti. Ma imprimo, mandami un punteggio (e- mail) e faccio una breve registrazione GRATUITA, successivamente se si è soddisfatti, si può decidere per effettuare una registrazione competa. item.title: Roger Jannotta - 2014-04-10 11:52:57
item.content:encoded:
Dear Ms. Iannotta,
Firstly, congratulations on your composition: "Limun." I was able to listen to most of it and look a bit at the score. The effects and their notation I found very interesting.
But now for my main reason for writing. My family name was changed when my paternal grandfather imigrated to the US at the beginning of the 1900's. He was from Castel San Vincenzo, Italy. It was also Iannotta which I think is not a very common name even in Italy, but was changed to Jannotta probably because in the hand-written script in European style "I" looks a lot like "J" as written in the US!
Curiously, my first wind instrument was, as yours, the flute although at an early age I also studied oboe, saxophone and clarinet. I studied at the University of New Mexico and later composition at the New England Conservatory in Boston. Composition was also an early love as well as arranging and orchestrating. More information is available on Wikipedia should you be interested although only a little of my non-jazz, non-commercial is available on line.
So, are we related? There may be a chance that we are. In the US, my parents had almost no contact with our Italian relatives although my mother together with her family spent a year in Italy arond 1926.
In any case, keep writing your lovely music! All the best.
Sincerely, Roger Jannotta Hohenesterstr. 18 81245 München <!--more--> AUTHOR: Roger Jannotta AUTHOR EMAIL: jannotta@gmx.de AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 87.174.155.20 Array ( [Name] => Roger Jannotta [E-mail Address] => jannotta@gmx.de [Message] => Dear Ms. Iannotta,
Firstly, congratulations on your composition: "Limun." I was able to listen to most of it and look a bit at the score. The effects and their notation I found very interesting.

It was also Iannotta which I think is not a very common name even in Italy, but was changed to Jannotta probably because in the hand-written script in European style "I" looks a lot like "J" as written in the US!
Curiously, my first wind instrument was, as yours, the flute although at an early age I also studied oboe, saxophone and clarinet. I studied at the University of New Mexico and later composition at the New England Conservatory in Boston. Composition was also an early love as well as arranging and orchestrating. More information is available on Wikipedia should you be interested although only a little of my non-jazz, non-commercial is available on line.
So, are we related? There may be a chance that we are. In the US, my parents had almost no contact with our Italian relatives although my mother together with her family spent a year in Italy arond 1926.
In any case, keep writing your lovely music! All the best.
Sincerely, Roger Jannotta Hohenesterstr. 18 81245 München
)

item.title: Jae-Hyuk, Ra - 2014-04-10 18:20:06
item.content:encoded: Hi. My name is Jae-Hyuk Ra. I'm a composition majoring student in Seoul, Korea. By chance, I got to listen to your piece "3 sur 5" and I was really fascinated and impressed of it. And I am your biggest fan. To these days I'm trying to search for any information about the piece but couldn't find anything anywhere. I don't speak English & French very well. I couldn't even find a music file of it so i can never listen to the piece again right now. May i ask you if you would be kind enough to send me your piece's music file, score and video file so that I could listen to your piece again. I'm pretty sure that it will be a great nourishment to my study. I look forward to your great song. I will look forward to your reply. have a nice day! <!--more--> AUTHOR: Jae-Hyuk, Ra AUTHOR EMAIL: revolution90@naver.com AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 121.160.99.121 Array ( [Name] => Jae-Hyuk, Ra [E-mail Address] => revolution90@naver.com [Message] => Hi. My name is Jae-Hyuk Ra. I'm a composition majoring student in Seoul, Korea. By chance, I got to listen to your piece "3 sur 5" and I was really fascinated and impressed of it. And I am your biggest fan. To these days I'm trying to search for any information about the piece but couldn't find anything anywhere. I don't speak English & French very well. I couldn't even find a music file of it so i can never listen to the piece again right now. May i ask you if you would be kind enough to send me your piece's music file, score and video file so that I could listen to your piece again. I'm pretty sure that it will be a great nourishment to my study. I look forward to your great song. I will look forward to your reply. have a nice day! )

item.title: Stefan Beyer - 2014-04-13 01:12:47
item.content:encoded:
Dear Clara,
I hope this finds you well.
I am writing a text on Mark Barden. I had been wondering when listening to Clangs at Maerzmusik, if you would too be using paper sheets ("blow at edge, whistle-tone") and Melodicas. I think to remember the Melodikas. But what about paper sheets?
Just a random memory and idea I had, as I might want to add something about this in the text.
Could you please do me the favor and clarify my unclear memory?
Best!
Stefan <!--more--> AUTHOR: Stefan Beyer AUTHOR EMAIL: mail@stefanbeyer.com AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 178.0.145.38 Array ( [Name] => Stefan Beyer [E-mail Address] => mail@stefanbeyer.com [Message] => Dear Clara,
I hope this finds you well.
I am writing a text on Mark Barden. I had been wondering when listening to Clangs at Maerzmusik, if you would too be using paper sheets ("blow at edge, whistle-tone") and Melodicas. I think to remember the Melodikas. But what about paper sheets?
Just a random memory and idea I had, as I might want to add something about this in the text.
Could you please do me the favor and clarify my unclear memory?
Best!
Stefan )

item.title: Ruth Velten - 2014-05-11 23:37:22
item.content:encoded:
Dear Clara,
I have recently heard some of your compositions and I am very interested in a solo piece for soprano saxophone which is listed in in the internet: Nuova composizione per sax soprano e live electronics (2011) sassofono soprano, live electronics Durata: 7' 00'' Does this piece still exist?It is not listed on your page. I am a classical saxphone player and I am looking for new pieces (www.ruthvelten.com) Congratulations as well to the performance at Wittener Tage and many success for all your upcoming works. All the best, I am looking forward to hearing from you. Ruth <!--more--> AUTHOR: Ruth Velten AUTHOR EMAIL: ruthvelten@yahoo.de AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 78.52.49.239 Array ( [Name] => Ruth Velten [E-mail Address] => ruthvelten@yahoo.de [Message] => Dear Clara,
I have recently heard some of your compositions and I am very interested in a solo piece for soprano saxophone which is listed in in the internet: Nuova composizione per sax soprano e live electronics (2011) sassofono soprano, live electronics Durata: 7' 00'' Does this piece still exist?It is not listed on your page. I am a classical saxphone player and I am looking for new pieces (www.ruthvelten.com) Congratulations as well to the performance at Wittener Tage and many success for all your upcoming works. All the best, I am looking forward to hearing from you. Ruth
)

a:4:{s:2:"to";a:1:{i:0;s:24:"clara.iannotta@gmail.com";}s:7:"subject";s:36:"Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com";s:7:"message";s:821:"Name: Ruth Velten E-mail Address: ruthvelten@yahoo.de : Message: Dear Clara,
I have recently heard some of your compositions and I am very interested in a solo piece for soprano saxophone which is listed in in the internet: Nuova composizione per sax soprano e live electronics (2011) sassofono soprano, live electronics Durata: 7' 00'' Does this piece still exist?It is not listed on your page. I am a classical saxphone player and I am looking for new pieces (www.ruthvelten.com) Congratulations as well to the performance at Wittener Tage and many success for all your upcoming works. All the best, I am looking forward to hearing from you. Ruth

item.title: Volker Michael - 2014-05-29 22:42:36
item.content:encoded:
Dear Clara Ianotta,
are You ready for an interview for "Kulturradio" (RBB) - I was asked by the Radio to do this for next Thursday when You will get the Rheinsberg-Award... to do a portrait for the programme. I will call You tomorrow !
All the Best,
Volker

item.title: Ricardo Capellino Carlos - 2014-06-01 20:05:46
item.content:encoded:
Dear Clara, I´m Ricardo Capellino, international saxophone player. I´ve listened some works in your webpage and I would like to know all your work. I thinks it´s really great!! Do you have written something with saxophone or to saxophone? (I´ve listened "Àphones"), super!! Thnaks for your attention and let´s in touch. All the best R
You can try to get more info about my activities in: www.ricardocapellino.com www.triodemagia.com <!--more--> AUTHOR: Ricardo Capellino Carlos AUTHOR EMAIL: info@ricardocapellino.com AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 81.203.122.227 Array ( [Name] => Ricardo Capellino Carlos [E-mail Address] => info@ricardocapellino.com [Message] => Dear Clara, I´m Ricardo Capellino, international saxophone player. )

item.content:encoded:

James <!--more--> AUTHOR: James Bradbury AUTHOR EMAIL: james@jbcomposer.com AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 58.7.129.219 Array ( [Name] => James Bradbury [E-mail Address] => james@jbcomposer.com [Message] => Hi Clara,

item.title: Matthew Shlomowitz - 2014-06-19 00:17:16
item.content:encoded:
Hello Clara. I co-direct the London based Plus Minus ensemble with Joanna Bailie. http://www.plusminusensemble.com
Joanna and I like you work and are interested in "The people here go mad. They blame the wind". Would it be possible for you to send me a PDF of the score and a recording or video?
Thanks, Matthew <!--more--> AUTHOR: Matthew Shlomowitz AUTHOR EMAIL: mshlom@hotmail.com AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 86.135.58.137 Array ( [Name] => Matthew Shlomowitz [E-mail Address] => mshlom@hotmail.com [Message] => Hello Clara. I co-direct the London based Plus Minus ensemble with Joanna Bailie. http://www.plusminusensemble.com
Joanna and I like you work and are interested in "The people here go mad. They blame the wind". Would it be possible for you to send me a PDF of the score and a recording or video?
Thanks, Matthew )

item.title: Olivier Benoit - 2014-06-19 09:05:46
item.content:encoded:
Dear Clara, I'm Olivier Benoit, new Artistic Director of the National jazz orchester (France). Actually, i'm developing an european project, meaning creations on different towns of Europe. Firsts are Paris and Berlin (written by myself). The next one will be about Rome. For "Rome", i'would like to open the Orchester to contemporary music. I've asked to Benjamin de la Fuente for writing a part of the music, and i'm thinking about an italian composer for the the other part.
I'm really interested by your work. Would it be possible to talk about that ? Could you give me an email ? I'll explain more about all of this.
Thanks in advance and regards, Olivier Benoit www.onj.org. <!--more--> AUTHOR: Olivier Benoit AUTHOR EMAIL: obenoitmusic@gmail.com AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 85.168.116.116 Array ( [Name] => Olivier Benoit [E-mail Address] => obenoitmusic@gmail.com [Message] => Dear Clara, I'm Olivier Benoit, new Artistic Director of the National jazz orchester (France). Actually, i'm developing an european project, meaning creations on different towns of Europe. Firsts are Paris and Berlin (written by myself). The next one will be about Rome. For "Rome", i'would like to open the Orchester to contemporary music. I've asked to Benjamin de la Fuente for writing a part of the music, and i'm thinking about an italian composer for the the other part.
I'm really interested by your work. Would it be possible to talk about that ? Could you give me an email ? I'll explain more about all of this.
Thanks in advance and regards, Olivier Benoit www.onj.org.
)

item.title: Cat Hope - 2014-06-23 15:23:47
item.content:encoded: hi clara my name is Cat Hope, a composer in Australia. I have recently discovered your compositions and love them! I have a new music group, Decibel, for five instruments (bfl, bclar, cello, viola and piano with electronics) http://www.decibelnewmusic.com and wondered if you had any pieces that may suit us? i would love to program it in one of our upcoming concerts. thanks for making such great music. cat cathope.com <!--more--> AUTHOR: Cat Hope AUTHOR EMAIL: cat@cathope.com AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 202.159.164.28 Array ( [Name] => Cat Hope [E-mail Address] => cat@cathope.com [Message] => hi clara my name is Cat Hope, a composer in Australia. item.title: Mads Brammer - 2014-07-08 15:13:36
item.content:encoded:
Hi Clara Athelas Sinfonietta Copenhagen are looking at your piece
Clara Iannotta (*1983) (IT) D’après (2012) fl/b.fl, cl/b.cl, pno, perc, vl, vla, vc (8’) http://claraiannotta.com/works/ensemble/dapres/
For a performance in copenhagen (DK) and aarhus (DK) in in early september. This means that we have to get the music ASAP for the musicians.
I will off course contact your publisher, but if you can provide me with the music before in PDF for example it would be helpful as we are entering the holiday period.
Please provide me with the relevant publisher contact as well.
Hope to hear from you soon
Best Mads Athelas Sinfonietta Copenhagen mads@athelas.dk <!--more--> AUTHOR: Mads Brammer AUTHOR EMAIL: mads@athelas.dk AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 89.23.247.187 Array ( [Name] => Mads Brammer [E-mail Address] => mads@athelas.dk [Message] => Hi Clara Athelas Sinfonietta Copenhagen are looking at your piece
Clara Iannotta (*1983) (IT) D’après (2012) fl/b.fl, cl/b.cl, pno, perc, vl, vla, vc (8’) http://claraiannotta.com/works/ensemble/dapres/
For a performance in copenhagen (DK) and aarhus (DK) in in early september. This means that we have to get the music ASAP for the musicians.
I will off course contact your publisher, but if you can provide me with the music before in PDF for example it would be helpful as we are entering the holiday period.
Please provide me with the relevant publisher contact as well.
Hope to hear from you soon
Best Mads Athelas Sinfonietta Copenhagen mads@athelas.dk )

item.title: liz hirst (ensemble garage) - 2014-07-22 00:11:10
item.content:encoded: Hallo Clara, Darmstadt möchte dein Stück veröffentlichen für die Teilnehmer , könntest Du denen kontaktieren und bestätigen dass dies in Ordnung sei oder ablehnen? Wenn Du ablehnst, behalten Sie die Partitur nur für den Tonmeister. Danke gr <!--more--> AUTHOR: liz hirst (ensemble garage) AUTHOR EMAIL: lizhirst@gmx.de AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 121.74.100.87 Array ( [Name] => liz hirst (ensemble garage) [E-mail Address] => lizhirst@gmx.de [Message] => Hallo Clara, Darmstadt möchte dein Stück veröffentlichen für die Teilnehmer , könntest Du denen kontaktieren und bestätigen dass dies in Ordnung sei oder ablehnen? Wenn Du ablehnst, behalten Sie die Partitur nur für den Tonmeister. Danke gr )

item.title: Hsin-Huei Huang - 2014-07-26 13:52:12
item.content:encoded: Liebe Frau Iannotta Ich bin eine in Wien lebende Pianistin, ich habe über das Bludenzer Tage der zeitgenässer Musik gelesen und möchte gerne mich für nächstjährige Mitwirkung bewerben. Kann ich Ihnen ein paar Infos von mir via mail zuschicken? Herzliche Grüße, Hsin-Huei Huang <!--more--> AUTHOR: Hsin-Huei Huang AUTHOR EMAIL: huang.hsinhuei@gmail.com AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 84.114.151.150 Array ( [Name] => Hsin-Huei Huang [E-mail Address] => huang.hsinhuei@gmail.com [Message] => Liebe Frau Iannotta Ich bin eine in Wien lebende Pianistin, ich habe über das Bludenzer Tage der zeitgenässer Musik gelesen und möchte gerne mich für nächstjährige Mitwirkung bewerben. item.title: Gabriella Smart - 2014-07-29 07:45:28
item.content:encoded:
Hi Clara, Cat Hope suggested I contact you. I'm hoping you might be available to be involved in an international composer project I'm developing over the next 2 years. If you can email me, I'll send you more information.
Best regards,
Gabriella Smart Artistic Director Soundstream Collective www.soundstream.org.au <!--more--> AUTHOR: Gabriella Smart AUTHOR EMAIL: smartg@senet.com.au AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 118.211.30.60 Array ( [Name] => Gabriella Smart [E-mail Address] => smartg@senet.com.au [Message] => Hi Clara, Cat Hope suggested I contact you. I'm hoping you might be available to be involved in an international composer project I'm developing over the next 2 years. If you can email me, I'll send you more information.
Best regards,
Gabriella Smart Artistic Director Soundstream Collective www.soundstream.org.au )

item.title: Claire Edwardes - 2014-08-20 01:37:36
item.content:encoded: Dear Clara, Matthew Shlomowitz recently recommended your music to me - I co direct a group in Sydney called Ensemble Offspring - we would love to potentially commission you to write a new piece as early as the 2nd half of next year if that suits you. We are putting in for a grant for emerging composers who are in the first 5 years of their professional career - would you say you fit into that category? If so, email me and we can discuss this option a bit more - our website is www.ensembleoffspring.com and mine is claireedwardes.com I have checked out your soundcloud and like what I hear :) Cheers Claire <!--more--> AUTHOR: Claire Edwardes AUTHOR EMAIL: claire@ensembleoffspring.com AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 210.50.99.218 Array ( [Name] => Claire Edwardes [E-mail Address] => claire@ensembleoffspring.com [Message] => Dear Clara, Matthew Shlomowitz recently recommended your music to me - I co direct a group in Sydney called Ensemble Offspring - we would love to potentially commission you to write a new piece as early as the 2nd half of next year if that suits you. We are putting in for a grant for emerging composers who are in the first 5 years of their professional career - would you say you fit into that category? If so, email me and we can discuss this option a bit more - our website is www.ensembleoffspring.com and mine is claireedwardes.com I have checked out your soundcloud and like what I hear :) Cheers Claire )

item.title: Eva Zöllner - 2014-08-20 20:24:55
item.content:encoded: Dear Clara, I lately heard your piece performed by ensemble Garage in Darmstadt and I really liked it! I would like to ask you, if you by any chance have plans to write an accordion piece some time in the future? ( I saw you wrote one for accordion and two percussions). I will live in Paris for 6 months next year (for a residency at Cite des Arts) and I am looking for composers who would be interested in collaborating with me there. Will you move back to Paris some time and would you be interested in some sort of collaboration? I would be happy to hear from you, in any case. Best regards, Eva <!--more--> AUTHOR: Eva Zöllner AUTHOR EMAIL: eva@eva-zoellner.de AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 31.18.17.107 Array ( [Name] => Eva Zöllner [E-mail Address] => eva@eva-zoellner.de [Message] => Dear Clara, I lately heard your piece performed by ensemble Garage in Darmstadt and I really liked it! I would like to ask you, if you by any chance have plans to write an accordion piece some time in the future? ( I saw you wrote one for accordion and two percussions). I will live in Paris for 6 months next year (for a residency at Cite des Arts) and I am looking for composers who would be interested in collaborating with me there. Will you move back to Paris some time and would you be interested in some sort of collaboration? I would be happy to hear from you, in any case. Best regards, Eva )
