item.title: Jonas Olsson - 2014-09-04 21:55:22
item.content:encoded:
Hi, I'm the pianist of the Swedish ensemble Mimitabu; we are very interested in your music and would like to perform your trio The people here go mad. They blame the wind at a chamber concert in Göteborg in (possibly) November or December. We'd be very happy if you could send us a score, as well as information on how to obtain the music boxes. Looking forward to a collaboration, and all the best, Jonas Olsson
http://mimitabu.se/ https://soundcloud.com/mimitabu <!--more--> AUTHOR: Jonas Olsson AUTHOR EMAIL: jonasolsson153@hotmail.com AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 109.91.139.151 Array ( [Name] => Jonas Olsson [E-mail Address] => jonasolsson153@hotmail.com [Message] => Hi, I'm the pianist of the Swedish ensemble Mimitabu; we are very interested in your music and would like to perform your trio The people here go mad. They blame the wind at a chamber concert in Göteborg in (possibly) November or December. We'd be very happy if you could send us a score, as well as information on how to obtain the music boxes. Looking forward to a collaboration, and all the best, Jonas Olsson
http://mimitabu.se/ https://soundcloud.com/mimitabu )

item.title: Anne Søe Iwan - 2014-09-06 21:11:43
item.content:encoded: Dear Mrs. Iannotta I am working on "Dápres " and enjoy it very much! I have a question for radioeffect...how to do it (I am a violin player!) And why is it called Dápres? Warm wishes Anne in Copenhagen <!--more--> AUTHOR: Anne Søe Iwan AUTHOR EMAIL: annesoe@mail.dk AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 2.111.16.23 Array ( [Name] => Anne Søe Iwan [E-mail Address] => annesoe@mail.dk [Message] => Dear Mrs. Iannotta I am working on "Dápres " and enjoy it very much! item.title: Oriol Saladrigues - 2014-09-12 14:25:05
item.content:encoded:
Salut Clara, comment ça va?
Je t'écris en tant que co-directeur artistique du Festival Mixtur de Barcelone (www.mixturbcn.com), et c'est à propos d'un appel à projets à niveau éuropéen organisé par la EACEA, peut-être que tu est déjà au courant de ça: http://eacea.ec.europa.eu/creative-europe/funding/cooperation-projects-2015_en
Nous (Mixtur) sommes en train de chercher des partenaires pour présenter un dossier et demander cette aide, et je t'écris pour te poser la question, tu penses que ça pourrait être aussi intéressant pour les Journées Bludenzer.
Ça serait un peu long d'en parler ici, en tout cas on peut s'appeller si tu veux, je peux appeller à des fixes en europe sans problème, aurais-tu un numéro de fixe? ou peut-être que t'est sur Paris? J'habite à Paris.
Bon, j'espère que tout va bien pour toi et j'attends de tes nouvelles! Salut, Oriol <!--more--> AUTHOR: Oriol Saladrigues AUTHOR EMAIL: oriol.saladrigues@mixturbcn.com AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 84.99.95.238 Array ( [Name] => Oriol Saladrigues [E-mail Address] => oriol.saladrigues@mixturbcn.com [Message] => Salut Clara, comment ça va?
Je t'écris en tant que co-directeur artistique du Festival Mixtur de Barcelone (www.mixturbcn.com), et c'est à propos d'un appel à projets à niveau éuropéen organisé par la EACEA, peut-être que tu est déjà au courant de ça: http://eacea.ec.europa.eu/creative-europe/funding/cooperation-projects-2015_en
Nous (Mixtur) sommes en train de chercher des partenaires pour présenter un dossier et demander cette aide, et je t'écris pour te poser la question, tu penses que ça pourrait être aussi intéressant pour les Journées Bludenzer.
Ça serait un peu long d'en parler ici, en tout cas on peut s'appeller si tu veux, je peux appeller à des fixes en europe sans problème, aurais-tu un numéro de fixe? ou peut-être que t'est sur Paris? J'habite à Paris.
Bon, j'espère que tout va bien pour toi et j'attends de tes nouvelles! Salut, Oriol )

item.title: Klaus-Peter Werani - 2014-09-15 09:41:50
item.content:encoded: Hallo Clara, ich hoffe es ist in Ordnung, dass ich dir auf Deutsch schreibe? Sonst kann ich dir auch noch mal auf Englisch oder Italienisch schreiben... Ich bin ein Bratscher/Komponist aus München,.spiele im Symphonieorchester des BR und im TrioCoriolis, viel Neue Musik in München und bei den großen Festivals. Nun habe ich ein neues Projekt mit dem wunderbaren Akkordeon-Spieler Kai Wangler (auch aus München), das Duo 2KW. Wir wollen einen großen Antrag bei der Siemens-Stiftung stellen: es gibt ein wunderbares Repertoire für Akkordeon + Viola (NA Huber, Rolf Riehm, T Hosokawa, Uros Roijko, W Rihm...) aber ganz neue Stücke fehlen. Wir haben Zusagen von Mark Andre und Ulrich Kreppein, dass sie Stücke für uns schreiben werden. Kooperationspartner werden der Heidelberger Frühling und das Münchner Kulturreferat sein (hier haben wir eine Zusage). Von der Siemens-Stiftung erhoffen wir uns die Finanzierung der Honorare für die Auftragswerke - dafür sind wir mit der Stiftung bereits in Kontakt. Uns gefällt deine Musik sehr und wir würden uns von dir ein Stück für die Besetzung Akkordeon + Viola wünschen. Könntest du dir vorstellen bis Ende 2015 ein Stück für uns zu schreiben? Können wir in den nächsten Tagen mal telefonieren? Für Aufführungen haben wir weitere mögliche Kooperationspartner in ganz Deutschland (Kassel, Ulm, Freiburg...). Die werden wir ansprechen, wenn wir alle Komponisten benennen können: drei Uraufführungen sollen es sein. Es würde mich sehr freuen, von dir zu hören - und noch mehr, wenn die Kooperation zu Stande käme! Herzliche Grüße Klaus-Peter <!--more--> AUTHOR: Klaus-Peter Werani AUTHOR EMAIL: kpwerani@gmx.de AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 46.244.192.250 Array ( [Name] => Klaus-Peter Werani [E-mail Address] => kpwerani@gmx.de [Message] => Hallo Clara, ich hoffe es ist in Ordnung, dass ich dir auf Deutsch schreibe? Wir haben Zusagen von Mark Andre und Ulrich Kreppein, dass sie Stücke für uns schreiben werden. Kooperationspartner werden der Heidelberger Frühling und das Münchner Kulturreferat sein (hier haben wir eine Zusage). Von der Siemens-Stiftung erhoffen wir uns die Finanzierung der Honorare für die Auftragswerke - dafür sind wir mit der Stiftung bereits in Kontakt. Uns gefällt deine Musik sehr und wir würden uns von dir ein Stück für die Besetzung Akkordeon + Viola wünschen. Könntest du dir vorstellen bis Ende 2015 ein Stück für uns zu schreiben? a:53:{s:14:"comment_author";s:18:"Klaus-Peter Werani";s:20:"comment_author_email";s:15:"kpwerani@gmx.de";s:18:"comment_author_url";s:0:"";s:20:"contact_form_subject";s:36:"Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com";s:17:"comment_author_IP";s:14:"46.244.192.250";s:15:"comment_content";s:1619:"Hallo Clara, ich hoffe es ist in Ordnung, dass ich dir auf Deutsch schreibe? Sonst kann ich dir auch noch mal auf Englisch oder Italienisch schreiben... Ich bin ein Bratscher/Komponist aus München,.spiele im Symphonieorchester des BR und im TrioCoriolis, viel Neue Musik in München und bei den großen Festivals. Nun habe ich ein neues Projekt mit dem wunderbaren Akkordeon-Spieler Kai Wangler (auch aus München), das Duo 2KW. Wir wollen einen großen Antrag bei der Siemens-Stiftung stellen: es gibt ein wunderbares Repertoire für Akkordeon + Viola (NA Huber, Rolf Riehm, T Hosokawa, Uros Roijko, W Rihm...) aber ganz neue Stücke fehlen. Wir haben Zusagen von Mark Andre und Ulrich Kreppein, dass sie Stücke für uns schreiben werden. Kooperationspartner werden der Heidelberger Frühling und das Münchner Kulturreferat sein (hier haben wir eine Zusage). Von der Siemens-Stiftung erhoffen wir uns die Finanzierung der Honorare für die Auftragswerke - dafür sind wir mit der Stiftung bereits in Kontakt. Uns gefällt deine Musik sehr und wir würden uns von dir ein Stück für die Besetzung Akkordeon + Viola wünschen. Könntest du dir vorstellen bis Ende 2015 ein Stück für uns zu schreiben? Können wir in den nächsten Tagen mal telefonieren? Für Aufführungen haben wir weitere mögliche Kooperationspartner in ganz Deutschland (Kassel, Ulm, Freiburg...). Die werden wir ansprechen, wenn wir alle Komponisten benennen können: drei Uraufführungen sollen es sein. Es würde mich sehr freuen, von dir zu hören - und noch mehr, wenn die Kooperation zu Stande käme! Herzliche Grüße Klaus-Peter";s:12:"comment_type";s:12:"contact_form";s:7:"user_ip";s:14:"46.244.192.250";s:10:"user_agent";s:119:"Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_6_8) AppleWebKit/534.59.10 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/5.1.9 Safari/534.59.10";s:8:"referrer";s:33:"http://claraiannotta.com/contact/";s:4:"blog";s:24:"http://claraiannotta.com";s:15:"SERVER_SOFTWARE";s:22:"Apache mod_fcgid/2.3.9";s:11:"REQUEST_URI";s:9:"/contact/";s:14:"CONTENT_LENGTH";s:4:"1987";s:12:"CONTENT_TYPE";s:33:"application/x-www-form-urlencoded";s:13:"DOCUMENT_ROOT";s:34:"/var/www/vhtdocs/userweb63199/html";s:17:"GATEWAY_INTERFACE";s:7:"CGI/1.1";s:11:"HTTP_ACCEPT";s:63:"text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,*/*;q=0.8";s:20:"HTTP_ACCEPT_ENCODING";s:4:"gzip";s:20:"HTTP_ACCEPT_LANGUAGE";s:5:"de-de";s:15:"HTTP_CONNECTION";s:5:"close";s:49:"HTTP_DEFAULT_PS_CAPABILITY_LIST_FOR_SMALL_SCREENS";s:40:"TinyScreen.SkipUADependentOptimizations:";s:9:"HTTP_HOST";s:17:"claraiannotta.com";s:11:"HTTP_ORIGIN";s:24:"http://claraiannotta.com";s:22:"HTTP_PS_CAPABILITYLIST";s:9:"ll,ii,dj:";s:12:"HTTP_REFERER";s:33:"http://claraiannotta.com/contact/";s:25:"HTTP_SURROGATE_CAPABILITY";s:11:"key=ESI/1.0";s:15:"HTTP_USER_AGENT";s:119:"Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; item.title: Andreas Engström - 2014-09-16 10:56:41
item.content:encoded:
Dear Clara Iannotta, I am working for the festival faithful!, which is taking place in the second part of November, curated by Elke Moltrecht. At the festival your string quartet A Failed Entertainment is programmed to be performed by two string quartets, Tana and Sonar Quartet (the theme of the festival is comparision of interpretation). Is the score published or do we get it from you? It would be great if you could send it to me, maybe as pdf, so I can send it further to the ensembles. Please don't hesitate to give me a call if you have any questions.
All the best, Andreas
Andreas Engström Grimmstrasse 19 10967 Berlin Germany

item.title: Carl Traverse - 2014-10-03 22:56:28
item.content:encoded:
Hi Clara,
My name is Carl, I'm a young musician in high school. I've been listening to the works you have posted on your soundcloud page and I really love what you have there. It's very captivating music!
I was wondering if it would be possible to look at scores of some of the works you have posted? I was most interested in your ensemble pieces, Àphones, Clangs, and D'après.
These would be for personal study only and I would not share them with anyone.
Thanks for your time! Carl <!--more--> AUTHOR: Carl Traverse AUTHOR EMAIL: traversecarl@gmail.com AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 71.235.238.122 Array ( [Name] => Carl Traverse [E-mail Address] => traversecarl@gmail.com [Message] => Hi Clara,
My name is Carl, I'm a young musician in high school. I've been listening to the works you have posted on your soundcloud page and I really love what you have there. It's very captivating music!
I was wondering if it would be possible to look at scores of some of the works you have posted? I was most interested in your ensemble pieces, Àphones, Clangs, and D'après.
These would be for personal study only and I would not share them with anyone.
Thanks for your time! Carl )

a:4:{s:2:"to";a:1:{i:0;s:24:"clara.iannotta@gmail.com";}s:7:"subject";s:36:"Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com";s:7:"message";s:736:"Name: Carl Traverse E-mail Address: traversecarl@gmail.com : Message: Hi Clara,
My name is Carl, I'm a young musician in high school. I've been listening to the works you have posted on your soundcloud page and I really love what you have there. It's very captivating music!
I was wondering if it would be possible to look at scores of some of the works you have posted? I was most interested in your ensemble pieces, Àphones, Clangs, and D'après.
These would be for personal study only and I would not share them with anyone.
Thanks for your time! Carl
Time: Friday October 3, 2014 at 10:56 pm IP Address: 71.235.238.122 Contact Form URL: http://claraiannotta.com/contact/

item.title: Edmond MAITRE - 2014-10-13 06:44:45
item.content:encoded: Bonjour Madame, J'ai écris le Dictionnaire universel des compositeurs de musique (41820 biographies) et je serais intéressé par quelques renseignements : Quels ont été vos professeurs à l'IRCAM ? En quelques mots, quelle est votre éthique musicale ou votre philosophie musicale ? Merci d'avance. Bien à vous. E.MAITRE <!--more--> AUTHOR: Edmond MAITRE AUTHOR EMAIL: edmond.maitre@hotmail.fr AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 77.207.124.208 Array ( [Name] => Edmond MAITRE [E-mail Address] => edmond.maitre@hotmail.fr [Message] => Bonjour Madame, J'ai écris le Dictionnaire universel des compositeurs de musique (41820 biographies) et je serais intéressé par quelques renseignements : Quels ont été vos professeurs à l'IRCAM ? item.title: Asmus Trautsch - 2014-10-14 01:01:26
item.content:encoded:
Scenic concert with Daniel Gloger
Dear Clara Iannotta, last week I sent you already a letter to the Bludenzer Tage zeitgemäßer Musik. I herewith would like to renew my invitation to the project NACKT, a scenic concert for countenor. Daniel Gloger (Neue Vocalsolisten Stuttgart) and I (composer and dramaturg) developed this performance as a hybrid between concert and music theatre together with the stage designer Sonja Füsti and the costume designer Julia von Leliwa. We would be glad to welcome you and offer you free tickets. In addition, I would be happy if you have some interest in our project for Bludenz. Certainly I can send you more information and a DVD of the whole show. Our website is www.projekt-nackt.de It will be in English soon. With kind regards, Asmus Trautsch <!--more--> AUTHOR: Asmus Trautsch AUTHOR EMAIL: a.trautsch@gmx.de AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 84.57.215.96 Array ( [Name] => Asmus Trautsch [E-mail Address] => a.trautsch@gmx.de [Message] => Scenic concert with Daniel Gloger

Certainly I can send you more information and a DVD of the whole show. Our website is www.projekt-nackt.de It will be in English soon. With kind regards, Asmus Trautsch
)

item.title: Julian Siffert - 2014-10-19 17:43:07
item.content:encoded:
Dear Clara,
my name is Julian, i´m a 21 year old composition student from Austria currently studying in Lyon with Philippe Hurel and due to pretty lucky circumstances i have been able to listen to the performance of your piece "clangs" at the mata festival in New york back in......puh somewhen around easter - dates have never been my biggest strengh! anyway: i´d really like to listen to that piece again but unfortunately i could only find an excerpt on your soundcloud page which is why i wanted to ask you if you would give away the whole recording as well?
Lookin´ forward to listen to some new stuff! Yours Julian <!--more--> AUTHOR: Julian Siffert AUTHOR EMAIL: julian@baalrog.at AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 87.88.53.48 Array ( [Name] => Julian Siffert [E-mail Address] => julian@baalrog.at [Message] => Dear Clara,
my name is Julian, i´m a 21 year old composition student from Austria currently studying in Lyon with Philippe Hurel and due to pretty lucky circumstances i have been able to listen to the performance of your piece "clangs" at the mata festival in New york back in......puh somewhen around easter - dates have never been my biggest strengh! anyway: i´d really like to listen to that piece again but unfortunately i could only find an excerpt on your soundcloud page which is why i wanted to ask you if you would give away the whole recording as well?
Lookin´ forward to listen to some new stuff! Yours Julian )

item.title: Bergeot - 2014-10-20 17:18:52
item.content:encoded: Bonjour Avant toute chose merci pour vos œuvres – j’ai beaucoup aimé « 3 sur 5 » (seul morceau entendu intégralement) (dont l’accordéon m’a irrésistiblement fait penser à Seven Words de Goubaidoulina) ; je n’ai malheureusement pas pu assister à la création d’Intent on Resurrection — Spring or Some Such Thing… Je me permets de vous écrire pour tout à fait autre chose : vous informer que j'ai créé aujourd’hui une page wikipedia (fr) vous concernant (http://fr.wikipedia.org/wiki/Clara_Iannotta) - je me suis principalement référé à votre site web pour le contenu. N'hésitez pas à la modifier/corriger/enrichir (dans la mesure du possible je peux m'en charger le cas échéant). Cordialement Michel Bergeot <!--more--> AUTHOR: Bergeot AUTHOR EMAIL: m.bergeot@voila.fr AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 171.18.34.73 Array ( [Name] => Bergeot [E-mail Address] => m.bergeot@voila.fr [Message] => Bonjour Avant toute chose merci pour vos œuvres – j’ai beaucoup aimé « 3 sur 5 » (seul morceau entendu intégralement) (dont l’accordéon m’a irrésistiblement fait penser à Seven Words de Goubaidoulina) ; je n’ai malheureusement pas pu assister à la création d’Intent on Resurrection — Spring or Some Such Thing… Je me permets de vous écrire pour tout à fait autre chose : vous informer que j'ai créé aujourd’hui une page wikipedia (fr) vous concernant (http://fr.wikipedia.org/wiki/Clara_Iannotta) - je me suis principalement référé à votre site web pour le contenu. N'hésitez pas à la modifier/corriger/enrichir (dans la mesure du possible je peux m'en charger le cas échéant). Cordialement Michel Bergeot )

Cordialement Michel Bergeot";s:12:"comment_type";s:12:"contact_form";s:7:"user_ip";s:12:"171.18.34.73";s:10:"user_agent";s:72:"Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:32.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/32.0";s:8:"referrer";s:33:"http://claraiannotta.com/contact/";s:4:"blog";s:24:"http://claraiannotta.com";s:15:"SERVER_SOFTWARE";s:22:"Apache mod_fcgid/2.3.9";s:11:"REQUEST_URI";s:9:"/contact/";s:14:"CONTENT_LENGTH";s:4:"1093";s:12:"CONTENT_TYPE";s:33:"application/x-www-form-urlencoded";s:13:"DOCUMENT_ROOT";s:34:"/var/www/vhtdocs/userweb63199/html";s:17:"GATEWAY_INTERFACE";s:7:"CGI/1.1";s:11:"HTTP_ACCEPT";s:63:"text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,*/*;q=0.8";s:20:"HTTP_ACCEPT_ENCODING";s:4:"gzip";s:20:"HTTP_ACCEPT_LANGUAGE";s:35:"fr,fr-fr;q=0.8,en-us;q=0.5,en;q=0.3";s:15:"HTTP_CONNECTION";s:5:"close";s:49:"HTTP_DEFAULT_PS_CAPABILITY_LIST_FOR_SMALL_SCREENS";s:40:"TinyScreen.SkipUADependentOptimizations:";s:9:"HTTP_HOST";s:17:"claraiannotta.com";s:22:"HTTP_PS_CAPABILITYLIST";s:9:"ll,ii,dj:";s:12:"HTTP_REFERER";s:33:"http://claraiannotta.com/contact/";s:25:"HTTP_SURROGATE_CAPABILITY";s:11:"key=ESI/1.0";s:15:"HTTP_USER_AGENT";s:72:"Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; item.title: Marcus Weiss - 2014-10-21 21:52:46
item.content:encoded:
Dear Clara, As you hopefully know, two works of you, the new trio for Catch and also "limun" will be performed at the "Tage für neue Musik Zürich" (13-16. November 2014). The secretary who is putting together the program book asked me to send her a text about "limun". Could you send that (in german?) directly to Alessandra Rupena: Maybe you have planed to come to Zurich!? Alessandra would also organize (or helo to organize your trip and hotel. So maybe see you there! all best Marcus <!--more--> AUTHOR: Marcus Weiss AUTHOR EMAIL: marcusweiss@gmx.ch AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 80.219.116.247 Array ( [Name] => Marcus Weiss [E-mail Address] => marcusweiss@gmx.ch [Message] => Dear Clara, As you hopefully know, two works of you, the new trio for Catch and also "limun" will be performed at the "Tage für neue Musik Zürich" (13-16. November 2014). The secretary who is putting together the program book asked me to send her a text about "limun". Could you send that (in german?) directly to Alessandra Rupena: Maybe you have planed to come to Zurich!? Alessandra would also organize (or helo to organize your trip and hotel. So maybe see you there! all best Marcus
)

item.title: Sophie Lacaze - 2014-10-24 14:04:39
item.content:encoded:
Bonjour, Je m'appelle Sophie Lacaze, je suis compositrice, et j'ai entendu parler de vous à deux reprises ces derniers temps... D'une part par Anne Montaron, qui m'a expliqué que vous aviez été récemment nommée directrice artistique d'un festival en Allemagne et que vous comptiez programmer autant d'oeuvres de femmes que d'hommes (bravo !) Et d'autre part par Guilherme Carvalho, un de mes collègues de l'Université de Montpellier avec lequel j'ai repris un petit festival de musique contemporaine sur Montpellier. Il a assisté à votre création au Festival d'Automne et m'en a dit beaucoup de bien. La prochaine édition de ce festival, Turbulences Sonores, aura lieu en avril prochain. La thématique cette année est la miniature. Nous avons vu sur votre site que vous aviez composé une "siciliana -miniature" pour trio à cordes. Serait-il possible d'obtenir la partition ? Nous aimerions essayer de la programmer. Merci d'avance pour votre réponse ! Bien cordialement, Sophie Lacaze http://www.sophielacaze.com <!--more--> AUTHOR: Sophie Lacaze AUTHOR EMAIL: sophie@sophielacaze.com AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 90.57.2.242 Array ( [Name] => Sophie Lacaze [E-mail Address] => sophie@sophielacaze.com [Message] => Bonjour, Je m'appelle Sophie Lacaze, je suis compositrice, et j'ai entendu parler de vous à deux reprises ces derniers temps... D'une part par Anne Montaron, qui m'a expliqué que vous aviez été récemment nommée directrice artistique d'un festival en Allemagne et que vous comptiez programmer autant d'oeuvres de femmes que d'hommes (bravo !) Et d'autre part par Guilherme Carvalho, un de mes collègues de l'Université de Montpellier avec lequel j'ai repris un petit festival de musique contemporaine sur Montpellier. Il a assisté à votre création au Festival d'Automne et m'en a dit beaucoup de bien. La prochaine édition de ce festival, Turbulences Sonores, aura lieu en avril prochain. La thématique cette année est la miniature. Nous avons vu sur votre site que vous aviez composé une "siciliana -miniature" pour trio à cordes. Serait-il possible d'obtenir la partition ? Nous aimerions essayer de la programmer. Merci d'avance pour votre réponse ! Bien cordialement, Sophie Lacaze http://www.sophielacaze.com
)

item.title: Alberto Rosado Carabias - 2014-10-27 12:14:17
item.content:encoded:
Hola Clara: Soy Alberto Rosado, pianista y profesor en COSCYL-Salamanca. Me imagino que Iñaki te habrá comentado que hemos programado tu obra Aphones en un concierto que haremos con TaCoS (Taller de música contemporánea) con nuestros alumnos. A través de este mensaje te quiero pedir los materiales de la obra en PDF, si están en alquiler dímelo. El concierto será el 21 de marzo en Salamanca, dirigido por Óscar Colomina Bosch y nos gustaría mucho que pudieses estar trabajando con los alumnos. La obra nos gusta mucho y seguro que va a ser una muy buena experiencia para nuestros alumnos.
Un abrazo,
Alberto <!--more--> AUTHOR: Alberto Rosado Carabias AUTHOR EMAIL: rosadoalberto@hotmail.com AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 81.33.41.216 Array ( [Name] => Alberto Rosado Carabias [E-mail Address] => rosadoalberto@hotmail.com [Message] => Hola Clara: Soy Alberto Rosado, pianista y profesor en COSCYL-Salamanca. Me imagino que Iñaki te habrá comentado que hemos programado tu obra Aphones en un concierto que haremos con TaCoS (Taller de música contemporánea) con nuestros alumnos. A través de este mensaje te quiero pedir los materiales de la obra en PDF, si están en alquiler dímelo. El concierto será el 21 de marzo en Salamanca, dirigido por Óscar Colomina Bosch y nos gustaría mucho que pudieses estar trabajando con los alumnos. La obra nos gusta mucho y seguro que va a ser una muy buena experiencia para nuestros alumnos.
Un abrazo,
Alberto
)

item.title: Karolin Roelcke - 2014-10-28 11:07:08
item.content:encoded:
Dear Clara Iannotta,
in May 2015 your music piece "3 sur 5" will be played at the Philhamonie in Berlin. I work for the agency K&K Kulturmanagement and Kommunikation who works in cooperation with Deutschlandradio Kultur and who gives school classes from Berlin the possibility to hear this concert.
Now I´m searching for informations about "3 sur 5", so that the school classes can prepare themselves a little bit for the concert and have some informations about the background of this music piece.
Would it be possible, that you send me some informations about "3 sur 5" I could use? That would be great!
Thank you very much for your answer. With best regards,
Karolin Roelcke <!--more--> AUTHOR: Karolin Roelcke AUTHOR EMAIL: karolin_roelcke@gmx.ch AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 84.175.65.195 Array ( [Name] => Karolin Roelcke [E-mail Address] => karolin_roelcke@gmx.ch [Message] => Dear Clara Iannotta,
in May 2015 your music piece "3 sur 5" will be played at the Philhamonie in Berlin. I work for the agency K&K Kulturmanagement and Kommunikation who works in cooperation with Deutschlandradio Kultur and who gives school classes from Berlin the possibility to hear this concert.
Now I´m searching for informations about "3 sur 5", so that the school classes can prepare themselves a little bit for the concert and have some informations about the background of this music piece.
Would it be possible, that you send me some informations about "3 sur 5" I could use? That would be great!
Thank you very much for your answer. With best regards,
Karolin Roelcke )

a:4:{s:2:"to";a:1:{i:0;s:24:"clara.iannotta@gmail.com";}s:7:"subject";s:36:"Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com";s:7:"message";s:940:"Name: Karolin Roelcke E-mail Address: karolin_roelcke@gmx.ch : Message: Dear Clara Iannotta,
in May 2015 your music piece "3 sur 5" will be played at the Philhamonie in Berlin. I work for the agency K&K Kulturmanagement and Kommunikation who works in cooperation with Deutschlandradio Kultur and who gives school classes from Berlin the possibility to hear this concert.
Now I´m searching for informations about "3 sur 5", so that the school classes can prepare themselves a little bit for the concert and have some informations about the background of this music piece.
Would it be possible, that you send me some informations about "3 sur 5" I could use? That would be great!
Thank you very much for your answer. With best regards,
Karolin Roelcke
Time: Tuesday October 28, 2014 at 11:07 am IP Address: 84.175.65.195 Contact Form URL: http://claraiannotta.com/contact/
Sent by an unverified visitor to your site.";s:7:"headers";s:123:"From: Karolin Roelcke <karolin_roelcke@gmx.ch> Reply-To: karolin_roelcke@gmx.ch Content-Type: text/plain; charset="UTF-8"";}

item.title: Jonah Haven - 2014-10-29 21:20:30
item.content:encoded:
Hi Clara Iannotta!
I am in love with your music! and I am wondering if you would be interested in teaching me during the month of January. Here are some examples of previous musics I've created: https://soundcloud.com/jonahhaven.
Much of the talks I've had with past teachers, who include Sabrina Schroeder, Chaya Czernowin, and Lewis Nielson, have been about transformation of sound and structures. I would love to talk with you about silence, confusion, and physicality, as those are the quiet loves in my music right now. Let me know if you would like to teach me during January. Thank you!
Best, Jonah Haven <!--more--> AUTHOR: Jonah Haven AUTHOR EMAIL: jhaven@oberlin.edu AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 132.162.162.132 Array ( [Name] => Jonah Haven [E-mail Address] => jhaven@oberlin.edu [Message] => Hi Clara Iannotta!
I am in love with your music! and I am wondering if you would be interested in teaching me during the month of January. Here are some examples of previous musics I've created: https://soundcloud.com/jonahhaven.
Much of the talks I've had with past teachers, who include Sabrina Schroeder, Chaya Czernowin, and Lewis Nielson, have been about transformation of sound and structures. I would love to talk with you about silence, confusion, and physicality, as those are the quiet loves in my music right now. Let me know if you would like to teach me during January. Thank you!
Best, Jonah Haven )

item.title: Fabien Lévy - 2014-11-03 20:30:00
item.content:encoded:
Cara Clara,
No lo se in quella lingua possiamo parlare -:)
Would you like to come once to the conservatory of Detmold to present your music? Since Detmold is a little bit far from Berlin (4.30 from Berlin, 2.30 from Cologne, 20 minutes from Bilefeld), perhaps once are you traveling between Berlin and Cologne and you could step by for one afternoon, if possible a wednesday afternoon, first presenting your string quartet in my analysis class (15.-16.30, subject in the Summer semester: String quartet), and then in our composition seminar (16.45-20, but you could stay until 19.00 to have the last train at 19.40). We could discuss other possibilities for the Summer semester, or for the wintersemester 2015.
Just let me know. I would be also happy to meet with you in Berlin, where we both live.
Best,
Fabien Lévy <!--more--> AUTHOR: Fabien Lévy AUTHOR EMAIL: fabien.levy@gmx.net AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 78.52.173.154 Array ( [Name] => Fabien Lévy [E-mail Address] => fabien.levy@gmx.net [Message] => Cara Clara,
No lo se in quella lingua possiamo parlare -:)

We could discuss other possibilities for the Summer semester, or for the wintersemester 2015.
Just let me know. I would be also happy to meet with you in Berlin, where we both live.
Best,
Fabien Lévy )

item.title: Blanchet Marc - 2014-11-03 20:57:33
item.content:encoded: Photograph and writer i present a new exhibition (called Récemment (recently) in France, in Paris from the 6th november. If you have a look on www.marcblanchet.fr you will have an idea by Fantôme (ghost) who is the last serie. The new one is in the same way and all is indicated on the website. I send you this mail because i appreciated very much your work diffused on Radio France. I like (love ?) composers as Nono and Lachenmann (as writer Kurtag choosed some of my poetries for an unfinished business). regard Marc Blanchet contact@marcblanchet.fr 0660718406 (actually this week in Paris) if you give an email i can send you the invitation <!--more--> AUTHOR: Blanchet Marc AUTHOR EMAIL: contact@marcblanchet.fr AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 90.46.104.177 Array ( [Name] => Blanchet Marc [E-mail Address] => contact@marcblanchet.fr [Message] => Photograph and writer i present a new exhibition (called Récemment (recently) in France, in Paris from the 6th november. If you have a look on www.marcblanchet.fr you will have an idea by Fantôme (ghost) who is the last serie. The new one is in the same way and all is indicated on the website. I send you this mail because i appreciated very much your work diffused on Radio France. I like (love ?) composers as Nono and Lachenmann (as writer Kurtag choosed some of my poetries for an unfinished business). regard Marc Blanchet contact@marcblanchet.fr 0660718406 (actually this week in Paris) if you give an email i can send you the invitation )

item.title: Chiara Morcelli-vcp - 2014-11-13 13:47:35
item.content:encoded:
I'm Chiara Morcelli from VISUAL COMMUNICATION PROJECT, a video production and post-production studio based in Berlin.
We specialize in Live Events.
On occasion of your partecipation to the "Faithful" Festival the 15. November in Radialsystem, berlin, I would like to propose to your attention our professional video services: - Audiovisual documentation of the show with HD multiple-camera setup and professional audio recorder;
- Video of the shows from different angles (whole show or only selected parts);
https://vimeo.com/60997660
- Trailer - short video presentation of the show;
https://vimeo.com/105041364
- Showreel editing of selected images of your best performances
- web channel where archive and spread your video productions;
- Technical support for any kind of video installations;
We provide our customers high and certified expertise in digital image elaboration, with a strong creative ability during the planning step and an involving availability in the developing and sharing of the projects.
We can offer very professional and high quality products with a very affordable prices!
Attached you can find a special offer for you!
We speak German, English, Spanish, French and Italian.
Please, for further information visit our web site.
http://vimeo.com/visualcomproject http://visualproject.indivia.net/
Best Regards
Chiara Morcelli 004917697810003 <!--more--> AUTHOR: Chiara Morcelli-vcp AUTHOR EMAIL: kiratraum@gmail.com AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 91.65.168.93 Array ( [Name] => Chiara Morcelli-vcp [E-mail Address] => kiratraum@gmail.com [Message] => I'm Chiara Morcelli from VISUAL COMMUNICATION PROJECT, a video production and post-production studio based in Berlin.

item.title: bruno - 2014-11-16 01:22:08
item.content:encoded: salve stimata musicista scrivo da Napoli .sono bruno Pedros un chitarrista. mi ha colpito la sua ricerca musicale ..Le vorrei chiedere se fosse podssibile avere delle lezioni di composizione ?sono un chitarrista classico e flamenco e ho vissuto molti anni in spagna ..Non so scrivere per altri strumenti e il mio sogno scriv un conc per chit e orchestra grazie . <!--more--> AUTHOR: bruno AUTHOR EMAIL: brunopedros@virgilio.it AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 62.98.187.44 Array ( [Name] => bruno [E-mail Address] => brunopedros@virgilio.it [Message] => salve stimata musicista scrivo da Napoli .sono bruno Pedros un chitarrista. mi ha colpito la sua ricerca musicale ..Le vorrei chiedere se fosse podssibile avere delle lezioni di composizione ?sono un chitarrista classico e flamenco e ho vissuto molti anni in spagna ..Non so scrivere per altri strumenti e il mio sogno scriv un conc per chit e orchestra grazie . )

item.title: Stephanie Haensler - 2014-11-17 11:02:22
item.content:encoded: Hi Clara I just discovered your work - last days in Zürich at the Tage für Neue Musik, where I also had a piece, I am a composer too. Pity that you weren't there, I would have liked to talk to you. It's amazing, we have the same obsessions with bells and music boxes! :) Maybe we can get in contact or even meet somewhere! I really like your work, especially your subtile research for delicate sound mixtures. All the best, Stephanie <!--more--> AUTHOR: Stephanie Haensler AUTHOR EMAIL: stephhae@swissonline.ch AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 46.126.210.135 Array ( [Name] => Stephanie Haensler [E-mail Address] => stephhae@swissonline.ch [Message] => Hi Clara I just discovered your work - last days in Zürich at the Tage für Neue Musik, where I also had a piece, I am a composer too. Pity that you weren't there, I would have liked to talk to you. It's amazing, we have the same obsessions with bells and music boxes! :) Maybe we can get in contact or even meet somewhere! I really like your work, especially your subtile research for delicate sound mixtures. All the best, Stephanie )

item.title: laurent mariusse - 2014-11-18 20:02:23
item.content:encoded: Hello I am a french percussionist solo player, I juste received a piece for marimba solo by James Wood "Secret dialogue" I also play solo pieces in April, write for me by Ton That Tiet, Jose Evangelista, Marie Hélène Bernard an Sophie Lacaze. I propose solo concert and project with improvisation and writing music with OMAX I invite you to visit my website www.laurentmariusse.com and soundcloud http://soundcloud.com/laurent-mariusse Perhaps you will be interested for a collaboration together I am looking forward to have news from you Best regards Laurent <!--more--> AUTHOR: laurent mariusse AUTHOR EMAIL: lautmariusse@me.com AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 92.95.92.145 Array ( [Name] => laurent mariusse [E-mail Address] => lautmariusse@me.com [Message] => Hello I am a french percussionist solo player, I juste received a piece for marimba solo by James Wood "Secret dialogue" I also play solo pieces in April, write for me by Ton That Tiet, Jose Evangelista, Marie Hélène Bernard an Sophie Lacaze. item.title: silvio palmieri, composer - 2014-11-19 08:19:20
item.content:encoded:
The Molinari Quartet's Sixth International Competition for Composition
Through its Composition Competition, the Molinari Quartet wishes to encourage young composers to write for string quartet. Over the past centuries, the string quartet has become, thanks to the great masterpieces written for the formation, a highly valued but dreadful form to write for for composers. But even today, in 2014, the string quartet is as alive and exciting as ever !
The Molinari Quartet contributes to the development of the string quartet literature by encouraging composers to send new original scores to its Competition.
The Molinari Quartet is pleased to announce its Sixth International Competition for Composition for string quartet.
Composers are invited to submit an original work for string quartet. The best compositions will be played in concert during the Molinari Quartet's Twentieth and Beyond series to be held in Montreal (Quebec, Canada) during the 2015-2016 season.
The jury will be comprised of the Molinari Quartet's artistic director and its musicians, in addition to well-known Canadian composers John Rea, Michel Gonneville and Ana Sokolovic who will determine four winners. The winning compositions will be performed by the Molinari Quartet during a special concert during the 2015-2016 season. After the concert performance the jury will deliberate and choose the order of the winners. The First Prize winner shall receive a $3000 grant as well as a silkscreen by renowned Canadian artist Guido Molinari. The second prize winner will receive a $2000 grant and the third prize winner a $1000 grant. The jury reserves the right not to grant all three prizes.
The winners will be invited to work with the Molinari Quartet prior to the concert and to participate in the Dialogues at the Chapelle, a public workshop of discussions and analysis produced by the Molinari Quartet.
Rules for Eligibility:
· Candidates must be 40 years old or less as of April 1st 2015, the due date for registration.
· The work must not exceed 20 minutes.
· Only works for string quartet that have neither been performed professionnally nor published as of April 1st 2015 shall be accepted.
· Works for quartet and electronics are accepted.
· Scores must be received by the Molinari Quartet at the latest April 1st 2015. (The post
office stamp shall be recognized as the receiving date)
· Registration fees of $25 CAN must accompany all scores. *
· A candidate may submit more than one work, but each work must be sent separately.
· Parts and scores shall remain the property of the Molinari Quartet.
· The candidate must send a score as well as separate playing parts to the Molinari Quartet.
· All scores must be sent anonymously; only a pseudonym can appear on the score pages.
· The candidate shall also send a sealed envelope bearing his or her pseudonym which will contain his or her name, postal address, e-mail address, telephone number, birth date, resumé as well as a statement as to the fact that the work is yet unpublished and that it has never been performed professionnally.
· The composer whose work has been chosen as one of the winning compositions, will not receive any extra payment for the execution or recording of the work.
· The winners of the competition commit themselves to find the necessary funding for a stay in Montreal to work with the Molinari Quartet and assist to the performance in the 2015-2016 season.
* The registration fees may be paid by cheque (to Molinari Quartet), Paypal or cash. We also accept US dollars but you must add 5$ to cover the bank’s conversion fees.
Competition Calendar:
Competition launch: September 2014
Due date for registration and receiving scores: April 1 st 2015
Jury: May 2015
Announcement of winners: May 2015
Winners Concert: 2015-2016 season
Please send the scores to :
Molinari Quartet
P.O. Box 56536
Montreal, Quebec
Canada H1W 3Z3
For more information write to : qm@quatuormolinari.qc.ca
or call 514-527-5515

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
a:3:{s:4:"Name";s:25:"silvio palmieri, composer";s:14:"E-mail Address";s:24:"qm@quatuormolinari.qc.ca";s:7:"Message";s:4248:"The Molinari Quartet's Sixth International Competition for Composition
Through its Composition Competition, the Molinari Quartet wishes to encourage young composers to write for string quartet. Over the past centuries, the string quartet has become, thanks to the great masterpieces written for the formation, a highly valued but dreadful form to write for for composers. But even today, in 2014, the string quartet is as alive and exciting as ever !
The Molinari Quartet contributes to the development of the string quartet literature by encouraging composers to send new original scores to its Competition.
The Molinari Quartet is pleased to announce its Sixth International Competition for Composition for string quartet.
Composers are invited to submit an original work for string quartet. The best compositions will be played in concert during the Molinari Quartet's Twentieth and Beyond series to be held in Montreal (Quebec, Canada) during the 2015-2016 season.
The jury will be comprised of the Molinari Quartet's artistic director and its musicians, in addition to well-known Canadian composers John Rea, Michel Gonneville and Ana Sokolovic who will determine four winners. The winning compositions will be performed by the Molinari Quartet during a special concert during the 2015-2016 season. After the concert performance the jury will deliberate and choose the order of the winners. The First Prize winner shall receive a $3000 grant as well as a silkscreen by renowned Canadian artist Guido Molinari. The second prize winner will receive a $2000 grant and the third prize winner a $1000 grant. The jury reserves the right not to grant all three prizes.
The winners will be invited to work with the Molinari Quartet prior to the concert and to participate in the Dialogues at the Chapelle, a public workshop of discussions and analysis produced by the Molinari Quartet.
Rules for Eligibility:
· Candidates must be 40 years old or less as of April 1st 2015, the due date for registration.
· The work must not exceed 20 minutes.
· Only works for string quartet that have neither been performed professionnally nor published as of April 1st 2015 shall be accepted.
· Works for quartet and electronics are accepted.
· Scores must be received by the Molinari Quartet at the latest April 1st 2015. (The post
office stamp shall be recognized as the receiving date)
· Registration fees of $25 CAN must accompany all scores. *
· A candidate may submit more than one work, but each work must be sent separately.
· Parts and scores shall remain the property of the Molinari Quartet.
· The candidate must send a score as well as separate playing parts to the Molinari Quartet.
· All scores must be sent anonymously; only a pseudonym can appear on the score pages.
· The candidate shall also send a sealed envelope bearing his or her pseudonym which will contain his or her name, postal address, e-mail address, telephone number, birth date, resumé as well as a statement as to the fact that the work is yet unpublished and that it has never been performed professionnally.
· The composer whose work has been chosen as one of the winning compositions, will not receive any extra payment for the execution or recording of the work.
· The winners of the competition commit themselves to find the necessary funding for a stay in Montreal to work with the Molinari Quartet and assist to the performance in the 2015-2016 season.
* The registration fees may be paid by cheque (to Molinari Quartet), Paypal or cash. We also accept US dollars but you must add 5$ to cover the bank’s conversion fees.
Competition Calendar:
Competition launch: September 2014
Due date for registration and receiving scores: April 1 st 2015
Jury: May 2015
Announcement of winners: May 2015
Winners Concert: 2015-2016 season
Please send the scores to :
Molinari Quartet
P.O. Box 56536
Montreal, Quebec
Canada H1W 3Z3
For more information write to : qm@quatuormolinari.qc.ca
or call 514-527-5515
web: http://quatuormolinari.qc.ca/en/";}

item.title: Björn Gottstein - 2014-12-04 18:46:29
item.content:encoded:
Hi Clara
I am contacting you because we will be performing your piece Clangs at the Eclat festival. Also I will be holding a laudatio for the price winners. I was wondering if you could send me some information about the piece, i e a program note and also a biography and a photo of yourself. That would be superhelpfull. All the best,
Björn <!--more--> AUTHOR: Björn Gottstein AUTHOR EMAIL: bjoern.gottstein@swr.de AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 217.66.32.202 Array ( [Name] => Björn Gottstein [E-mail Address] => bjoern.gottstein@swr.de [Message] => Hi Clara
I am contacting you because we will be performing your piece Clangs at the Eclat festival. Also I will be holding a laudatio for the price winners. I was wondering if you could send me some information about the piece, i e a program note and also a biography and a photo of yourself. That would be superhelpfull. All the best,
Björn )

item.title: Richard Haynes - 2014-12-10 13:42:07
item.content:encoded: Hi Clara! I was very happy to hear that you like the recording of the live performance with Ensemble Garage. Do you know yet if it will be used for the CD? I really hope that we get to work together in the future. Warm regards from Zurich, Richard <!--more--> AUTHOR: Richard Haynes AUTHOR EMAIL: info@richardehaynes.com AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 194.230.155.167 Array ( [Name] => Richard Haynes [E-mail Address] => info@richardehaynes.com [Message] => Hi Clara! I was very happy to hear that you like the recording of the live performance with Ensemble Garage. Do you know yet if it will be used for the CD? I really hope that we get to work together in the future. Warm regards from Zurich, Richard )

item.title: Ildemaro Correa Zavala - 2014-12-11 02:59:33
item.content:encoded:
Hello Teacher Clara, I am a Mexican composer of Panamanian origin very interested in his work, because I'm seeing a new avant-garde in the new generation of European composers between which I think highlights you and some others like Aaron Cassidy. Personally, I think that I can learn a lot from you.
Here in Mexico, (and in general in Latin America), things do not go well in terms of avant-garde expressions. There is a want to do music tonal and twelve-tone in the best of cases: atonal in various forms.
I'm dabbling in micro-tonality based on theories regarding the Mexican composer of the century XX Julián Carrillo and our best exponent of the avant-garde in Mexico: Julio Estrada.
If possible you'd like muscho who visited my web site: www.lanocheestrellada.com.mx where you can find my aesthetic ideas and my music.
See you soon and will be aware of its future work.
Best regards. <!--more--> AUTHOR: Ildemaro Correa Zavala AUTHOR EMAIL: ildemarocorrea@gmail.com AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 189.177.174.22 Array ( [Name] => Ildemaro Correa Zavala [E-mail Address] => ildemarocorrea@gmail.com [Message] => Hello Teacher Clara, I am a Mexican composer of Panamanian origin very interested in his work, because I'm seeing a new avant-garde in the new generation of European composers between which I think highlights you and some others like Aaron Cassidy. Personally, I think that I can learn a lot from you.
Here in Mexico, (and in general in Latin America), things do not go well in terms of avant-garde expressions. There is a want to do music tonal and twelve-tone in the best of cases: atonal in various forms.
I'm dabbling in micro-tonality based on theories regarding the Mexican composer of the century XX Julián Carrillo and our best exponent of the avant-garde in Mexico: Julio Estrada.
If possible you'd like muscho who visited my web site: www.lanocheestrellada.com.mx where you can find my aesthetic ideas and my music.
See you soon and will be aware of its future work.
Best regards. )

a:4:{s:2:"to";a:1:{i:0;s:24:"clara.iannotta@gmail.com";}s:7:"subject";s:36:"Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com";s:7:"message";s:1159:"Name: Ildemaro Correa Zavala E-mail Address: ildemarocorrea@gmail.com : Message: Hello Teacher Clara, I am a Mexican composer of Panamanian origin very interested in his work, because I'm seeing a new avant-garde in the new generation of European composers between which I think highlights you and some others like Aaron Cassidy. Personally, I think that I can learn a lot from you.
Here in Mexico, (and in general in Latin America), things do not go well in terms of avant-garde expressions. There is a want to do music tonal and twelve-tone in the best of cases: atonal in various forms.
I'm dabbling in micro-tonality based on theories regarding the Mexican composer of the century XX Julián Carrillo and our best exponent of the avant-garde in Mexico: Julio Estrada.
If possible you'd like muscho who visited my web site: www.lanocheestrellada.com.mx where you can find my aesthetic ideas and my music.
See you soon and will be aware of its future work.
Best regards.
Time: Thursday December 11, 2014 at 2:59 am IP Address: 189.177.174.22 Contact Form URL: http://claraiannotta.com/contact/
Sent by an unverified visitor to your site.";s:7:"headers";s:134:"From: Ildemaro Correa Zavala <ildemarocorrea@gmail.com> Reply-To: ildemarocorrea@gmail.com Content-Type: text/plain; charset="UTF-8"";}

item.title: Nadia Ratsimandresy - 2014-12-27 15:37:29
item.content:encoded:
Dear Clara,
I'm writing on behalf of the Trio 3D - Sophie Maréchal, guitarist, Virginie Colette, soprano and me, ondist. We appreciate a lot your music and as we are building a répertoire including female composers, we think your music will bring a new color to the sound of the trio.
The trio will be musically participating in the debate around the topic "Women and Composition" at the CDMC (centre de musique contemporaine) - Cité de la Musique, Paris. We will perform miniatures (from 1 to 2 minutes) of female composers. That will take place the 11th of March, 2015.
We would be so happy to meet you there, if by any chance you will be free that day (10:00 am-6:00 pm).
Will you be in Paris for your piece "D'après" the 5th of March ?
We are looking forward to hearing from you
Nadia - for the Trio 3D
-- nad.dresy@gmail.com http://www.nadiaratsimandresy.com <!--more--> AUTHOR: Nadia Ratsimandresy AUTHOR EMAIL: nad.dresy@gmail.com AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 88.182.116.221 Array ( [Name] => Nadia Ratsimandresy [E-mail Address] => nad.dresy@gmail.com [Message] => Dear Clara,

We would be so happy to meet you there, if by any chance you will be free that day (10:00 am-6:00 pm).
Will you be in Paris for your piece "D'après" the 5th of March ?
We are looking forward to hearing from you
Nadia - for the Trio 3D
-- nad.dresy@gmail.com http://www.nadiaratsimandresy.com )

item.title: Branko Dzinovic - 2015-01-06 07:09:15
item.content:encoded:
Hello Clara,
My name is Branko Dzinovic, and I'm an accordion player from Toronto. I had the chance to hear your great piece "3 sur 5" for accordion and 2 percussionists, and I would like to perform it at the University of Toronto. Would you please tell me how I can purchase the score and whether I need permission to perform it.
Thanks a lot, Branko <!--more--> AUTHOR: Branko Dzinovic AUTHOR EMAIL: contact@brankodzinovic.com AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 174.92.4.48 Array ( [Name] => Branko Dzinovic [E-mail Address] => contact@brankodzinovic.com [Message] => Hello Clara,
My name is Branko Dzinovic, and I'm an accordion player from Toronto. I had the chance to hear your great piece "3 sur 5" for accordion and 2 percussionists, and I would like to perform it at the University of Toronto. Would you please tell me how I can purchase the score and whether I need permission to perform it.
Thanks a lot, Branko )

item.title: Nate Bachhuber - 2015-01-12 03:06:18
item.content:encoded:
Dear Clara -
I'm writing to discuss the possibility of your piece Intent on Resurrection — Spring or Some Such Thing in early March of 2016 on our Green Umbrella series, but before we add the work to the program we want to make sure you'd be available to attend the performance here in Los Angeles.
I'm always weary of using web forms to initiate contact, so I hope you receive this note. Would you please write me back at nbachhuber@laphil.org so I know you've received this?
I look forward to further discussions with you.
Thanks in advance and best wishes until soon, Nate
--- Nate Bachhuber Associate Manager, Artistic Planning Los Angeles Philharmonic Association Walt Disney Concert Hall • Hollywood Bowl 151 South Grand Avenue, Los Angeles, CA 90012-3034 213.972.3405 | nbachhuber@laphil.org| www.laphil.com <!--more--> AUTHOR: Nate Bachhuber AUTHOR EMAIL: nbachhuber@laphil.org AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 209.249.224.14 Array ( [Name] => Nate Bachhuber [E-mail Address] => nbachhuber@laphil.org [Message] => Dear Clara -
I'm writing to discuss the possibility of your piece Intent on Resurrection — Spring or Some Such Thing in early March of 2016 on our Green Umbrella series, but before we add the work to the program we want to make sure you'd be available to attend the performance here in Los Angeles.
I'm always weary of using web forms to initiate contact, so I hope you receive this note. Would you please write me back at nbachhuber@laphil.org so I know you've received this?
I look forward to further discussions with you.
Thanks in advance and best wishes until soon, Nate
--- Nate Bachhuber Associate Manager, Artistic Planning Los Angeles Philharmonic Association Walt Disney Concert Hall • Hollywood Bowl 151 South Grand Avenue, Los Angeles, CA 90012-3034 213.972.3405 | nbachhuber@laphil.org| www.laphil.com
)

item.title: Adrianne Pope - 2015-01-24 23:59:10
item.content:encoded: Hi Clara, We're a Los Angeles based violin/viola duo and are currently programming our first concert. We're friends with Maya Bennardo and Hanna Levinson from andPlay, and they recommended Limun. We've listened to the recording on your website and would love to play it this Spring! How would you recommend us getting the music? Looking forward to hearing from you! Adrianne and Linnea <!--more--> AUTHOR: Adrianne Pope AUTHOR EMAIL: adrianne@adriannepope.com AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 104.59.144.86 Array ( [Name] => Adrianne Pope [E-mail Address] => adrianne@adriannepope.com [Message] => Hi Clara, We're a Los Angeles based violin/viola duo and are currently programming our first concert. We're friends with Maya Bennardo and Hanna Levinson from andPlay, and they recommended Limun. We've listened to the recording on your website and would love to play it this Spring! How would you recommend us getting the music? Looking forward to hearing from you! Adrianne and Linnea )

item.title: Pala Garcia - 2015-02-11 22:01:48
item.content:encoded:
Score for Il Colore dell'ombra
Dear Clara,
I'm the violinist of in a New York based piano trio with a new music focus. We're really interested in your music and your piece for piano trio, and wanted to inquire how we might go about obtaining the score. We would like to program it on a show we have planned for mid-May of this year, if the piece is available.
Many thanks!
Pala Garcia <!--more--> AUTHOR: Pala Garcia AUTHOR EMAIL: palagarcia@gmail.com AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 77.119.128.241 Array ( [Name] => Pala Garcia [E-mail Address] => palagarcia@gmail.com [Message] => Score for Il Colore dell'ombra
Dear Clara,
I'm the violinist of in a New York based piano trio with a new music focus. We're really interested in your music and your piece for piano trio, and wanted to inquire how we might go about obtaining the score. We would like to program it on a show we have planned for mid-May of this year, if the piece is available.
Many thanks!
Pala Garcia )

item.title: karen lorenz - 2015-02-17 10:59:47
item.content:encoded:
Dear Clara, I have some questions in "Limun", we'll play it with ensemble mosaik at Märzmusik. First of all: what does the arrow meen in bar 105 (viola-part) between the harmonic and the open string? Will you come to the rehearsels? All the best Karen <!--more--> AUTHOR: karen lorenz AUTHOR EMAIL: karen.viola@gmx.de AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 87.123.96.30 Array ( [Name] => karen lorenz [E-mail Address] => karen.viola@gmx.de [Message] => Dear Clara, I have some questions in "Limun", we'll play it with ensemble mosaik at Märzmusik. First of all: what does the arrow meen in bar 105 (viola-part) between the harmonic and the open string? Will you come to the rehearsels? All the best Karen
)

item.title: Andrea Lodge - 2015-02-20 00:46:46
item.content:encoded:
Hello Clara,
I recently discovered your work "3 Sur 5" for accordion and two percussionists. I just love the sounds you create! I'm wondering about the possibility of getting the score or a sample of the score to consider it for performance. I work for a new music festival called nief-norf in Tennessee, USA. If you'd like to check it out, the website is niefnorf.org It would be wonderful to check out some of your music! Thank you very much, Andrea Lodge <!--more--> AUTHOR: Andrea Lodge AUTHOR EMAIL: andrea_lodge@hotmail.com AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 72.89.192.145 Array ( [Name] => Andrea Lodge [E-mail Address] => andrea_lodge@hotmail.com [Message] => Hello Clara,
I recently discovered your work "3 Sur 5" for accordion and two percussionists. I just love the sounds you create! I'm wondering about the possibility of getting the score or a sample of the score to consider it for performance. I work for a new music festival called nief-norf in Tennessee, USA. If you'd like to check it out, the website is niefnorf.org It would be wonderful to check out some of your music! Thank you very much, Andrea Lodge )

item.title: Moon Young Ha - 2015-02-20 12:06:26
item.content:encoded:
Dear Clara,
My name is Moon Young Ha and I am artistic director/C.E.O. of ensemble mise-en, contemporary new music ensemble based in New York City. (www.mise-en.org) We are currently booking new projects for next seasons, and we are wondering if there would be a chance that we can work with Bludenzer Tagen Zeitgemäßer Musik. Please let us know if there is any way we can discuss about this more. Hope to hear from you soon and very much looking forward. Many thanks and have a wonderful day.
Best, Moon Young Ha
Artistic Director/C.E.O. ensemble mise-en www.mise-en.org
MISE-EN_PLACE Bushwick 678 Hart St #1B Brooklyn, NY 11221 <!--more--> AUTHOR: Moon Young Ha AUTHOR EMAIL: ensemble@mise-en.org AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 194.214.81.37 Array ( [Name] => Moon Young Ha [E-mail Address] => ensemble@mise-en.org [Message] => Dear Clara,

Please let us know if there is any way we can discuss about this more. Hope to hear from you soon and very much looking forward. Many thanks and have a wonderful day.
Best, Moon Young Ha

item.title: Thomas Lehn - 2015-02-21 10:27:57
item.content:encoded: Hello Clara, when will BTZM happen in 2015? ensemble]h[iatus (www.ensemble-hiatus.eu) is maybe going to perform in Vienna in late November. If you still have program space, it would be a good opportunity to perform in Bludenz. Would be nice to get in touch. Thanks! Best wishes, Thomas cell 0157 0337 1510 www.thomaslehn.com <!--more--> AUTHOR: Thomas Lehn AUTHOR EMAIL: mail@thomaslehn.com AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 80.121.84.168 Array ( [Name] => Thomas Lehn [E-mail Address] => mail@thomaslehn.com [Message] => Hello Clara, when will BTZM happen in 2015? ensemble]h[iatus (www.ensemble-hiatus.eu) is maybe going to perform in Vienna in late November. item.title: Margo Kieser - 2015-02-28 00:33:57
item.content:encoded:
Dear Ms. Iannotta, I am Margo Kieser, Principal Librarian for the San Francisco Symphony and I believe you have been in touch with Sam Adams regarding a performance in April of “Aphones”. I’ll need to get the parts as soon as possible. Do you sell them directly? Many thanks for your help! I’m looking forward to the performance. Best regards, Margo <!--more--> AUTHOR: Margo Kieser AUTHOR EMAIL: mkieser@sfsymphony.org AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 12.216.211.2 Array ( [Name] => Margo Kieser [E-mail Address] => mkieser@sfsymphony.org [Message] => Dear Ms. Iannotta, I am Margo Kieser, Principal Librarian for the San Francisco Symphony and I believe you have been in touch with Sam Adams regarding a performance in April of “Aphones”. item.title: piera formenti - 2015-03-08 19:00:43
item.content:encoded:
Buongiorno Clara,
Mi chiamo Piera Formenti, sono un'attrice italiana residente a Parigi da 10 anni.
Ho scoperto la musica contemporanea grazie al mio compagno, il compositore francese Benjamin de la Fuente. Leggo gli spartiti e so recitare all'interno di un'orchestra o di un ensemble. Come attrice, il lavoro su musica è quello che più desidero fare in assoluto.
Ho recentemente recitato in "On Fire : création pour comédienne, piano et orchestre" di Benjamin de la Fuente, presentato al festival Présences di Radio France, con l'Orchestre Philharmonique di Radio France. La parte vocale, recitata in francese su testi di Malcolm X, è stata scritta su spartito. La mia rassegna stampa segue a fine messaggio. Link d’ascolto, tratto da “Les lundis de la contemporaine” di Arnaud Merlin, France Musique, del 23/02/2015 : http://www.francemusique.fr/emission/les-lundis-de-la-contemporaine/2014-2015/festivals-presences-2-gordon-de-la-fuente-carter-et-rizo-salom-par-l-orchestre
In italiano ho recitato nell’opera "Re Orso" di Marco Stroppa, con l'Ensemble Intercontemporain e l'IRCAM, sotto la direzione di Susanna Mällki all'Opéra Comique. Il testo di Arrigo Boito è stato trascritto con grande precisione ritmica su spartito. Link d’ascolto : http://www.dailymotion.com/video/x277tly_stroppa-re-orso-paris-may-21-2012_music (mio ingresso a partire da 1:19).
Le scrivo perché seguo il suo lavoro da qualche tempo e mi piacerebbe poter collaborare con lei. Nel caso in cui pensasse ad un'attrice o una recitante per un suo futuro progetto, in italiano o in francese, sono a sua completa disposizione.
Se desiderasse sapere qualche cosa di più sul mio lavoro, le posso inviare il mio CV e una foto via mail.
Spero veramente di avere l’opportunità di poter collaborare con lei.
Le auguro tutto il meglio.
Cordiali saluti,
Piera Formenti
Piera FORMENTI 13 rue Joseph Kosma 75019 PARIS +33 6 50 76 81 97 piera.formenti@free.fr
Elle joue Shakespeare à Syracuse et à Modène, à Bologne elle dit Dostoïevski, on la voit dans le théâtre de Pasolini à Venise et c’est dans Re Orso de Stroppa qu’on put l’applaudir à Paris [lire notre chronique du 19 mai 2012] : elle s’appelle Piera Formenti et c’est à sa présence invasive qu’on a confié la très copieuse partie de récitante d’On fire, conçu « pour comédienne, piano, orchestre et orgue électronique » [...] Les textes s’enchaînent très vite, bataillant de citations en scandales, hurlant souvent mais isolant certaines perles dans des accalmies dangereuses – « Tout ce qu’on a connu, c’est l’hypocrisie. Le rêve américain ? Connais pas ! Nous vivons chaque jour le cauchemar américain », par exemple. Après une grouillante section d’orchestre, en volière, la voix dénonce aussi la presse qui fait « passer l’assassin pour la victime et la victime pour l’assassin ; si vous n’y prenez pas garde, les journaux vous feront haïr les opprimés et aimer les oppresseurs ». Bertrand Bolognesi, Anaclase. Critique complète : http://www.anaclase.com/chroniques/concert-2-%E2%80%93-carter-gordon-la-fuente-et-rizo-salom
Sur scène, aux côtés d’un orchestre lacérant l’espace, le pianiste Wilhem Latchoumia et la « speakerine » italienne Piera Formenti engagent la lutte. Dans un haut-débit rageur qui ne tarira jamais, la voix de la jeune femme est amplifiée, voire déformée pour simuler ses interlocuteurs. Elle harangue la foule et « mitraille » son texte avec une énergie et un débit vocal inouï, défiant l’excès de son des forces instrumentales. La partie éruptive de piano contre, quant à elle, les assauts de l’orchestre dans des interventions spectaculaires. L’oeuvre « coup de poing » laisse sans voix ! Michèle Tosi, Res Musica. Critique complète : http://www.resmusica.com/2015/02/17/presences-benjamin-de-la-fuente-hausse-le-ton-avec-on-fire/
Le compositeur s’est en effet tourné vers la figure insurgée de Malcom X et ses textes que l’on peut qualifier d’incandescents, dits par une récitante inspirée, Piera Formenti, avec l’Orchestre national de France déchaîné sous le direction Joshua Dos Santos et, au piano, Wilhem Latchoumia. Maurice Ulrich, L’humanité. Critique complète : http://www.humanite.fr/un-souffle-de-rage-et-de-sons-sur-presences-565546
Une femme survoltée, Piera Formenti, deux micros, des mots qui claquent à chaque instant, une musique concassée et furieuse, portée aux extrêmes. Omer Corlaix, blog. Critique complète : http://omercorlaix-fr.over-blog.com/2015/02/presences-un-quart-de-siecle-plus-tard.html
[...] qu’une récitante (Piera Formenti) rapporte avec rage dans un tumulte instrumental dominé par l’indomptable piano de Wilhem Latchoumia. Pierre Gervasoni, Le Monde. Critique complète : http://www.lemonde.fr/acces-restreint/musiques/article/2015/02/09/6d6a69986a6569c5946d6568669770_4572701_1654986.html <!--more--> AUTHOR: piera formenti AUTHOR EMAIL: piera.formenti@free.fr AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 88.162.122.104 Array ( [Name] => piera formenti [E-mail Address] => piera.formenti@free.fr [Message] => Buongiorno Clara,

a:4:{s:2:"to";a:1:{i:0;s:24:"clara.iannotta@gmail.com";}s:7:"subject";s:36:"Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com";s:7:"message";s:5227:"Name: piera formenti E-mail Address: piera.formenti@free.fr : Message: Buongiorno Clara,
Mi chiamo Piera Formenti, sono un'attrice italiana residente a Parigi da 10 anni.
Ho scoperto la musica contemporanea grazie al mio compagno, il compositore francese Benjamin de la Fuente. Leggo gli spartiti e so recitare all'interno di un'orchestra o di un ensemble. Come attrice, il lavoro su musica è quello che più desidero fare in assoluto.
Ho recentemente recitato in "On Fire : création pour comédienne, piano et orchestre" di Benjamin de la Fuente, presentato al festival Présences di Radio France, con l'Orchestre Philharmonique di Radio France. La parte vocale, recitata in francese su testi di Malcolm X, è stata scritta su spartito. La mia rassegna stampa segue a fine messaggio. Link d’ascolto, tratto da “Les lundis de la contemporaine” di Arnaud Merlin, France Musique, del 23/02/2015 : http://www.francemusique.fr/emission/les-lundis-de-la-contemporaine/2014-2015/festivals-presences-2-gordon-de-la-fuente-carter-et-rizo-salom-par-l-orchestre
In italiano ho recitato nell’opera "Re Orso" di Marco Stroppa, con l'Ensemble Intercontemporain e l'IRCAM, sotto la direzione di Susanna Mällki all'Opéra Comique. Il testo di Arrigo Boito è stato trascritto con grande precisione ritmica su spartito. Link d’ascolto : http://www.dailymotion.com/video/x277tly_stroppa-re-orso-paris-may-21-2012_music (mio ingresso a partire da 1:19).
Le scrivo perché seguo il suo lavoro da qualche tempo e mi piacerebbe poter collaborare con lei. Nel caso in cui pensasse ad un'attrice o una recitante per un suo futuro progetto, in italiano o in francese, sono a sua completa disposizione.
Se desiderasse sapere qualche cosa di più sul mio lavoro, le posso inviare il mio CV e una foto via mail.
Spero veramente di avere l’opportunità di poter collaborare con lei.
Le auguro tutto il meglio.
Cordiali saluti,
Piera Formenti
Piera FORMENTI 13 rue Joseph Kosma 75019 PARIS +33 6 50 76 81 97 piera.formenti@free.fr
Elle joue Shakespeare à Syracuse et à Modène, à Bologne elle dit Dostoïevski, on la voit dans le théâtre de Pasolini à Venise et c’est dans Re Orso de Stroppa qu’on put l’applaudir à Paris [lire notre chronique du 19 mai 2012] : elle s’appelle Piera Formenti et c’est à sa présence invasive qu’on a confié la très copieuse partie de récitante d’On fire, conçu « pour comédienne, piano, orchestre et orgue électronique » [...] Les textes s’enchaînent très vite, bataillant de citations en scandales, hurlant souvent mais isolant certaines perles dans des accalmies dangereuses – « Tout ce qu’on a connu, c’est l’hypocrisie. Le rêve américain ? Connais pas ! Nous vivons chaque jour le cauchemar américain », par exemple. Après une grouillante section d’orchestre, en volière, la voix dénonce aussi la presse qui fait « passer l’assassin pour la victime et la victime pour l’assassin ; si vous n’y prenez pas garde, les journaux vous feront haïr les opprimés et aimer les oppresseurs ». Bertrand Bolognesi, Anaclase. Critique complète : http://www.anaclase.com/chroniques/concert-2-%E2%80%93-carter-gordon-la-fuente-et-rizo-salom
Sur scène, aux côtés d’un orchestre lacérant l’espace, le pianiste Wilhem Latchoumia et la « speakerine » italienne Piera Formenti engagent la lutte. Dans un haut-débit rageur qui ne tarira jamais, la voix de la jeune femme est amplifiée, voire déformée pour simuler ses interlocuteurs. Elle harangue la foule et « mitraille » son texte avec une énergie et un débit vocal inouï, défiant l’excès de son des forces instrumentales. La partie éruptive de piano contre, quant à elle, les assauts de l’orchestre dans des interventions spectaculaires. L’oeuvre « coup de poing » laisse sans voix ! Michèle Tosi, Res Musica. Critique complète : http://www.resmusica.com/2015/02/17/presences-benjamin-de-la-fuente-hausse-le-ton-avec-on-fire/
Le compositeur s’est en effet tourné vers la figure insurgée de Malcom X et ses textes que l’on peut qualifier d’incandescents, dits par une récitante inspirée, Piera Formenti, avec l’Orchestre national de France déchaîné sous le direction Joshua Dos Santos et, au piano, Wilhem Latchoumia. Maurice Ulrich, L’humanité. Critique complète : http://www.humanite.fr/un-souffle-de-rage-et-de-sons-sur-presences-565546
Une femme survoltée, Piera Formenti, deux micros, des mots qui claquent à chaque instant, une musique concassée et furieuse, portée aux extrêmes. Omer Corlaix, blog. Critique complète : http://omercorlaix-fr.over-blog.com/2015/02/presences-un-quart-de-siecle-plus-tard.html
[...] qu’une récitante (Piera Formenti) rapporte avec rage dans un tumulte instrumental dominé par l’indomptable piano de Wilhem Latchoumia. Pierre Gervasoni, Le Monde. Critique complète : http://www.lemonde.fr/acces-restreint/musiques/article/2015/02/09/6d6a69986a6569c5946d6568669770_4572701_1654986.html
Time: Sunday March 8, 2015 at 7:00 pm IP Address: 88.162.122.104 Contact Form URL: http://claraiannotta.com/contact/
Sent by an unverified visitor to your site.";s:7:"headers";s:122:"From: piera formenti <piera.formenti@free.fr> Reply-To: piera.formenti@free.fr Content-Type: text/plain; charset="UTF-8"";}

item.title: Claude Lévy - 2015-03-12 17:13:53
item.content:encoded:
Hello Clara,
A retired music teacher from France, I attended yesterday concert at the Italian Academy and enjoyed very much listening to your Failed Entertainment piece. At some point, I couldn’t help thinking of Pierre Henry’s Variations pour une Porte et un Soupir, when the instruments produced sounds that, to me, seemed like creaking doors. If I am right, I think it fascinating that, after composers in the 50’s electronically played with natural sounds, you would have tried to imitate acoustically what Henry’s generation did with their good old recording devices. Whatever, it was a Successful Entertainment – English not being my first language, I want to make it clear that I want this to be a compliment and not anything derogatory!
Best, Claude <!--more--> AUTHOR: Claude Lévy AUTHOR EMAIL: claude.levy@dbmail.com AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 207.237.109.48 Array ( [Name] => Claude Lévy [E-mail Address] => claude.levy@dbmail.com [Message] => Hello Clara,
A retired music teacher from France, I attended yesterday concert at the Italian Academy and enjoyed very much listening to your Failed Entertainment piece. At some point, I couldn’t help thinking of Pierre Henry’s Variations pour une Porte et un Soupir, when the instruments produced sounds that, to me, seemed like creaking doors. If I am right, I think it fascinating that, after composers in the 50’s electronically played with natural sounds, you would have tried to imitate acoustically what Henry’s generation did with their good old recording devices. Whatever, it was a Successful Entertainment – English not being my first language, I want to make it clear that I want this to be a compliment and not anything derogatory!
Best, Claude
)

item.title: Karin Hellqvist - 2015-03-30 23:16:57
item.content:encoded:
Dear Clara,
This is Karin Hellqvist, violinist in Curious Chamber Players writing. I hope all is well with you! As you know we'll play you piano trio in NYC in April. Will be a lot of fun, a really great piece! Rei said you might be there? for the concert? I have a couple of small questions to you about some details in the piece. - In bar 16 for example, how do you imagine the bow shifting here, with every semiquaver or just for the black notes? - In bar 72, is the crescendo before the downbeat just for the piano or are vln + vlc missing some notes? We enjoy working with the piece! All the best, Karin <!--more--> AUTHOR: Karin Hellqvist AUTHOR EMAIL: info@karinhellqvist.com AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 37.2.8.213 Array ( [Name] => Karin Hellqvist [E-mail Address] => info@karinhellqvist.com [Message] => Dear Clara,
This is Karin Hellqvist, violinist in Curious Chamber Players writing. I hope all is well with you! As you know we'll play you piano trio in NYC in April. Will be a lot of fun, a really great piece! I have a couple of small questions to you about some details in the piece. - In bar 16 for example, how do you imagine the bow shifting here, with every semiquaver or just for the black notes? - In bar 72, is the crescendo before the downbeat just for the piano or are vln + vlc missing some notes? We enjoy working with the piece! All the best, Karin )

item.title: caleb salgado - 2015-04-01 18:14:44
item.content:encoded:
ciao cara,
come stai? ho una domanda riguardo a un application per fare un concerto con Manufaktur für aktuelle Musik a berlino. In quale zona abiti? cioè dove sta il tuo appartamento lì? ti chiedo perché nel futuro se facciamo domanda allo stato per avere $$$ sarebbe bene di fare in modo che faresti parte del programmo in cui facciamo domanda.
Un abbraccio, caleb <!--more--> AUTHOR: caleb salgado AUTHOR EMAIL: calebsalgado@gmail.com AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 85.171.206.11 Array ( [Name] => caleb salgado [E-mail Address] => calebsalgado@gmail.com [Message] => ciao cara,
come stai? ho una domanda riguardo a un application per fare un concerto con Manufaktur für aktuelle Musik a berlino. In quale zona abiti? cioè dove sta il tuo appartamento lì? ti chiedo perché nel futuro se facciamo domanda allo stato per avere $$$ sarebbe bene di fare in modo che faresti parte del programmo in cui facciamo domanda.
Un abbraccio, caleb )

item.title: Iñaki Alberdi - 2015-04-07 16:12:51
item.content:encoded:
Dear Mrs Clara Ianotta:
Let me please introduce my self. My name is Iñaki Alberdi I'm accordionist and I like very much you piece "3 sur 5". Could you tell me please were can i buy it?
If you want to know something about my carrier please click :
https://www.youtube.com/user/ALBERDIACCORDION
Or: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sDta98MVHBA Where you can listen a little my last work about accordion concertos with the Spanish National Orchestra and works by Torres, Sánchez-Verdú, Lazkano and Erkoreka.
Thank you very much for you atenttion.
Yours Iñaki Alberdi <!--more--> AUTHOR: Iñaki Alberdi AUTHOR EMAIL: alberdi64@wanadoo.fr AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 83.193.107.144 Array ( [Name] => Iñaki Alberdi [E-mail Address] => alberdi64@wanadoo.fr [Message] => Dear Mrs Clara Ianotta:

Or: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sDta98MVHBA Where you can listen a little my last work about accordion concertos with the Spanish National Orchestra and works by Torres, Sánchez-Verdú, Lazkano and Erkoreka.
Thank you very much for you atenttion.
Yours Iñaki Alberdi
)

item.title: Cleek Schrey - 2015-04-16 00:45:55
item.content:encoded:
Dear Clara,
How do you do? First of all, I've enjoyed what I've heard of your music very much.
I am a composition student at Wesleyan and part of my thesis work involves the discussion of music by composers who are working with action-notation and a sound world that involves extended techniques. Would you be willing to share a few scores with me for me to take a look at? You are one of the composers that I would like to discuss. I also might have a few questions down the road.
Best regards, Cleek Schrey <!--more--> AUTHOR: Cleek Schrey AUTHOR EMAIL: eschrey@wesleyan.edu AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 71.62.12.156 Array ( [Name] => Cleek Schrey [E-mail Address] => eschrey@wesleyan.edu [Message] => Dear Clara,
How do you do? First of all, I've enjoyed what I've heard of your music very much.
I am a composition student at Wesleyan and part of my thesis work involves the discussion of music by composers who are working with action-notation and a sound world that involves extended techniques. Would you be willing to share a few scores with me for me to take a look at? You are one of the composers that I would like to discuss. I also might have a few questions down the road.
Best regards, Cleek Schrey
)

item.title: marsan simon - 2015-04-19 19:02:15
item.content:encoded:
Hello Clara !
I'm a young composer in the CRR in Lyon, in France. I wish you an happy birthday ! Your music inspire me and you influence my music, you help me to create because you give me another way to consider music. I wish you a good continuation in yours musical's projects !
Simon Marsan
PS: sorry for my bad english <!--more--> AUTHOR: marsan simon AUTHOR EMAIL: simon.marsan@orange.fr AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 79.91.182.162 Array ( [Name] => marsan simon [E-mail Address] => simon.marsan@orange.fr [Message] => Hello Clara !
I'm a young composer in the CRR in Lyon, in France. I wish you an happy birthday ! Your music inspire me and you influence my music, you help me to create because you give me another way to consider music. I wish you a good continuation in yours musical's projects !
Simon Marsan
PS: sorry for my bad english )

Simon Marsan
