item.title: Dominik Schweiger - 2015-05-05 15:55:30
item.content:encoded:
Dear Ms. Iannotta,
I would like to ask if you can provide me with a commentary on your piece «al di là del bianco» and with a printable photo.
Thank you and best wishes,
Dominik Schweiger <!--more--> AUTHOR: Dominik Schweiger AUTHOR EMAIL: schweiger@konzerthaus.at AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 212.183.18.43 Array ( [Name] => Dominik Schweiger [E-mail Address] => schweiger@konzerthaus.at [Message] => Dear Ms. Iannotta,

Thank you and best wishes,
Dominik Schweiger )

item.title: Anna Kwiatkowska - 2015-05-06 11:56:02
item.content:encoded: Dear Clara Iannotta, Looking for interesting works for musicians I work with (cellist Mikolaj Palosz and pianist Joanna Opalinska) I came accross your 'Il colore dell'ombra'. Please. tell me how i could get the score? I would also be interested in your solo violin piece 'Dead Wasps in the Jam-Jar'. As far as I know, your music has not been performed in Poland yet so I hope it could be the beginning... With best regards Anna Kwiatkowska <!--more--> AUTHOR: Anna Kwiatkowska AUTHOR EMAIL: a.kozera78@wp.pl AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 95.49.50.249 Array ( [Name] => Anna Kwiatkowska [E-mail Address] => a.kozera78@wp.pl [Message] => Dear Clara Iannotta, Looking for interesting works for musicians I work with (cellist Mikolaj Palosz and pianist Joanna Opalinska) I came accross your 'Il colore dell'ombra'. Please. tell me how i could get the score? I would also be interested in your solo violin piece 'Dead Wasps in the Jam-Jar'. As far as I know, your music has not been performed in Poland yet so I hope it could be the beginning... With best regards Anna Kwiatkowska )

item.title: Martina Seeber - 2015-05-07 21:41:25
item.content:encoded: Chere Clara, pour un programme pour un concert du trio K/D/M a la Philharmonie de Berlin, je cherche un petit commentaire, une note sur la piece 3 sur 5. Est-ce que vous avec deja ecrit quelque chose? Merci beaucoup en avance. La langue n*est pas importante, anglais, italien, francais.. Mais c'est assez urgent, je suis désolée. Cordialement, Martina Seeber <!--more--> AUTHOR: Martina Seeber AUTHOR EMAIL: martina.seeber@nochmusik.de AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 88.67.134.10 Array ( [Name] => Martina Seeber [E-mail Address] => martina.seeber@nochmusik.de [Message] => Chere Clara, pour un programme pour un concert du trio K/D/M a la Philharmonie de Berlin, je cherche un petit commentaire, une note sur la piece 3 sur 5. Cordialement, Martina Seeber )

item.title: Eve Cambreling - EnsembleTEMA - 2015-05-18 08:50:50
item.content:encoded: Dear Clara Iannotta, we are a young ensemble for contemporary music from Karlsruhe, Germany (aber vielleicht sprechen Sie ja sogar deutsch, Ihr Mobilnummer ist deutsch!). We are going to play your piece "Il collore dell'ombra" on the 2nd of July in Sermoneta (incontri musica contemporanea festival Pontino). Could you send us the score and the parts if there are some? It would be very easy to have them as Pdf, it's faster and we are quite late... ! item.title: Celia Adrián - 2015-06-03 12:15:59
item.content:encoded:
Dear Clara,
I`m spanish accordeonist and this year I`m beggining to work with a new chamber group, percussion, piano and clarinet. We´re looking for repertory, and my last teacher, Iñaki Alberdi said me that your work 3 pour 5 it`s very good music and I heard it and it`s fantastic work!!! I`d like to adquire it, maybe you coud send it bay mail or where could I get it? If you have another work for these instruments, we would be a lot grateful. Thank you very much and congratulations for your wonderfull music. Best regards, Celia <!--more--> AUTHOR: Celia Adrián AUTHOR EMAIL: cuca_adrian@yahoo.es AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 83.58.11.81 Array ( [Name] => Celia Adrián [E-mail Address] => cuca_adrian@yahoo.es [Message] => Dear Clara,
I`m spanish accordeonist and this year I`m beggining to work with a new chamber group, percussion, piano and clarinet. We´re looking for repertory, and my last teacher, Iñaki Alberdi said me that your work 3 pour 5 it`s very good music and I heard it and it`s fantastic work!!! I`d like to adquire it, maybe you coud send it bay mail or where could I get it? If you have another work for these instruments, we would be a lot grateful. Thank you very much and congratulations for your wonderfull music. Best regards, Celia )

item.title: Caio de Azevedo - 2015-06-03 17:05:18
item.content:encoded:
Hello Clara, how are you? Fine, I hope!
My name is Caio de Azevedo and I'm a 21 years old brazilian composer and cellist from the city of Salvador, Bahia. First of all: Thank you for the attention and for all your amazing work! I just met you (musically) today... and it was (has been) a fantastic moment. Immediately I searched for your website and reading about you I realized a mutual confort and passion about the art of composition that brought me a true joy in my artistic world (thank you for that, too). But what made me take your contact and write for you immediately was this paragraph: "I am particularly interested in music as an existential, physical experience — music should be seen as well as heard. This is one of the reasons why I sometimes prefer to talk about the choreography of the sound rather than about orchestration." Do you think I could show to you one score (with recording) ? I hope you could help me with this eternal miraculous and amazing journey that is the composition and our (as artists) motivation and reflexive thoughts about "musical existence" and the "music in the existence".
Thank you for being so sincere and kind in what you do, Cheers,
C. de Azevedo.
p.s.: sorry for my english! <!--more--> AUTHOR: Caio de Azevedo AUTHOR EMAIL: caiocunha.az@gmail.com AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 177.16.235.136 Array ( [Name] => Caio de Azevedo [E-mail Address] => caiocunha.az@gmail.com [Message] => Hello Clara, how are you? But what made me take your contact and write for you immediately was this paragraph: "I am particularly interested in music as an existential, physical experience — music should be seen as well as heard. This is one of the reasons why I sometimes prefer to talk about the choreography of the sound rather than about orchestration." Do you think I could show to you one score (with recording) ? I hope you could help me with this eternal miraculous and amazing journey that is the composition and our (as artists) motivation and reflexive thoughts about "musical existence" and the "music in the existence".
Thank you for being so sincere and kind in what you do, Cheers,
C. de Azevedo.
p.s.: sorry for my english!
)

item.title: aureliano cattaneo - 2015-06-05 12:54:53
item.content:encoded:
Cara Clara,
non ci conosciamo personalmente, ma ho ascoltato tuoi lavori e mi interessano molto. Ti scrivo perché nell'ambito di un Master in composizione in cui insegno a Madrid, vorrei presentare nella calsse di analisis, lavori di compositori italiani delle ultime generazioni e mi piacerebbe tanto presentare anche qualcosa di tuo. Per il momento mi hanno mandato materiali Daniele Ghisi e Giovanni Bertelli, la mia idea é di presentare 5 compositori. Mi chiedo se ti andrebbe di mandarmi un tuo pezzo, registrazione e partitura e possibilmente qualche guida per l'analisi.
aspettando una tua risposta ti mando i miei piú cordiali saluti.
Aureliano <!--more--> AUTHOR: aureliano cattaneo AUTHOR EMAIL: aurelianoc@yahoo.it AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 81.32.210.210 Array ( [Name] => aureliano cattaneo [E-mail Address] => aurelianoc@yahoo.it [Message] => Cara Clara,
non ci conosciamo personalmente, ma ho ascoltato tuoi lavori e mi interessano molto. Ti scrivo perché nell'ambito di un Master in composizione in cui insegno a Madrid, vorrei presentare nella calsse di analisis, lavori di compositori italiani delle ultime generazioni e mi piacerebbe tanto presentare anche qualcosa di tuo. Per il momento mi hanno mandato materiali Daniele Ghisi e Giovanni Bertelli, la mia idea é di presentare 5 compositori. Mi chiedo se ti andrebbe di mandarmi un tuo pezzo, registrazione e partitura e possibilmente qualche guida per l'analisi.
aspettando una tua risposta ti mando i miei piú cordiali saluti.
Aureliano )

Ti scrivo perché nell'ambito di un Master in composizione in cui insegno a Madrid, vorrei presentare nella calsse di analisis, lavori di compositori italiani delle ultime generazioni e mi piacerebbe tanto presentare anche qualcosa di tuo. Per il momento mi hanno mandato materiali Daniele Ghisi e Giovanni Bertelli, la mia idea é di presentare 5 compositori. Mi chiedo se ti andrebbe di mandarmi un tuo pezzo, registrazione e partitura e possibilmente qualche guida per l'analisi.
aspettando una tua risposta ti mando i miei piú cordiali saluti.
Aureliano";}

item.title: marcus weiss - 2015-07-05 20:53:20
item.content:encoded: Dear Clara, I write to you in the name of our Trio Accanto, which is Nic Hodges, piano; Christian Dierstein, percussion and myself, saxophone. Since 2 years, after Yukiko went into "pension" from the trio, we restarted the ensemble with Nic Hodges and have a lot of fun, playing many new pieces. Now I don't know if I'm not already too late to ask you for having us in Bludenz!? We have interesting new pieces by Aperghis, Rolf Riehm, Stefan Prins, Johannes Schöllhorn and will have some in the near future by Georg Haas and also by Beat Furrer. - But it's, at least for me and also for Christian, also the memory of former Bludenz performances, that makes us curious about coming there again! - It's funny to write to a composer only about other composers! I hope we will have a chance to meet in the future. all the best, Marcus <!--more--> AUTHOR: marcus weiss AUTHOR EMAIL: marcusweiss@gmx.ch AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 77.58.189.44 Array ( [Name] => marcus weiss [E-mail Address] => marcusweiss@gmx.ch [Message] => Dear Clara, I write to you in the name of our Trio Accanto, which is Nic Hodges, piano; Christian Dierstein, percussion and myself, saxophone. Since 2 years, after Yukiko went into "pension" from the trio, we restarted the ensemble with Nic Hodges and have a lot of fun, playing many new pieces. Now I don't know if I'm not already too late to ask you for having us in Bludenz!? We have interesting new pieces by Aperghis, Rolf Riehm, Stefan Prins, Johannes Schöllhorn and will have some in the near future by Georg Haas and also by Beat Furrer. - But it's, at least for me and also for Christian, also the memory of former Bludenz performances, that makes us curious about coming there again! - It's funny to write to a composer only about other composers! I hope we will have a chance to meet in the future. all the best, Marcus )

item.title: Arnau Soler - 2015-07-21 13:32:09
item.content:encoded:
Dear Clara,
I am Arnau Soler, I write you from Grup Instrumental bcn216 we are very interested in your piece "Il collore di l´ombra" we saw in yor website the priece 2€ for the score, it includes also the independent parts for cello, violin and piano? or is just a score with all voices? Thank you for your answers, keep in touch.
Arnau Soler <!--more--> AUTHOR: Arnau Soler AUTHOR EMAIL: arnau@bcn216.com AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 88.18.49.110 Array ( [Name] => Arnau Soler [E-mail Address] => arnau@bcn216.com [Message] => Dear Clara,

Thank you for your answers, keep in touch.
Arnau Soler )

item.title: Delia De Matteis - 2015-07-23 15:28:33
item.content:encoded:
Gentilissima Clara Iannotta,
sono lieta di scriverle in relazione al programma di sala del 24° Festival di Milano Musica, che stiamo procedendo ad ultimare. A tale proposito, le sarei grata se potesse inviarmi una sua foto, da poter pubblicare in occasione del concerto di mdi ensemble del 13 novembre 2015 al Teatro Elfo Puccini di Milano.
In attesa di un suo gentile riscontro, i miei saluti più cordiali,
Delia De Matteis
Delia De Matteis Organizzazione Milano Musica - Associazione per la musica contemporanea Piazza Luigi di Savoia, 24 20124 Milano –IT tel. +39 02 67397800 fax. +39 02 66 90410 www.milanomusica.org <!--more--> AUTHOR: Delia De Matteis AUTHOR EMAIL: organizzazione@milanomusica.org AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 212.31.247.2 Array ( [Name] => Delia De Matteis [E-mail Address] => organizzazione@milanomusica.org [Message] => Gentilissima Clara Iannotta,

Delia De Matteis

item.title: Piero Guimaraes - 2015-07-26 18:23:17
item.content:encoded: Hi Clara, We met at the x2 concert where andPlay performed your piece. I am friend with Julia Den Boer...anyway, I am interested in buying some of your works. I am getting D'apres, but I am also interested in your violin solo (for my wife). How can I have access to it? I am starting a new music group in Providence and I really want to program some of your works. I am not sure if will be able to do this first season for financial reasons. That is why I am looking for you violin solo. I hope you are well. Piero <!--more--> AUTHOR: Piero Guimaraes AUTHOR EMAIL: pieroperc@gmail.com AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 72.227.82.138 Array ( [Name] => Piero Guimaraes [E-mail Address] => pieroperc@gmail.com [Message] => Hi Clara, We met at the x2 concert where andPlay performed your piece. I am friend with Julia Den Boer...anyway, I am interested in buying some of your works. I am getting D'apres, but I am also interested in your violin solo (for my wife). How can I have access to it? I am starting a new music group in Providence and I really want to program some of your works. I am not sure if will be able to do this first season for financial reasons. That is why I am looking for you violin solo. I hope you are well. Piero )

item.title: Julian Siffert - 2015-08-10 13:41:29
item.content:encoded:
Hello Clara,
i'm a composition student from austria who would be really interested in taking a look at some of your scores, therefore i tried to make use of the recent installed shop (more concrete: for Intent, Clangs, Failed Entertainment and The people here go mad) about a week ago. But since nothing happened in the meantime (after the transaction) i'm not quite sure if there was supposed to be a download link or if you would send the scores via mail personally?
(in order to prevent confusion: the actual account that performed the transfer was from Hans...or Johann Siffert since i don't have a paypal account myself)
Cheers Julian <!--more--> AUTHOR: Julian Siffert AUTHOR EMAIL: julian@baalrog.at AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 80.110.123.198 Array ( [Name] => Julian Siffert [E-mail Address] => julian@baalrog.at [Message] => Hello Clara,
i'm a composition student from austria who would be really interested in taking a look at some of your scores, therefore i tried to make use of the recent installed shop (more concrete: for Intent, Clangs, Failed Entertainment and The people here go mad) about a week ago. But since nothing happened in the meantime (after the transaction) i'm not quite sure if there was supposed to be a download link or if you would send the scores via mail personally?
(in order to prevent confusion: the actual account that performed the transfer was from Hans...or Johann Siffert since i don't have a paypal account myself)
Cheers Julian )

item.title: Pablo Carrascosa - 2015-08-17 14:53:10
item.content:encoded:
Dear Clara,
I´m a composer interested in some of your scores. I´ve tried to buy one of them but had some problems with Paypal which at least for now I´m not able to solve so I was wondering if there was another option of paying for the scores.
Thank you in advance.
Kind regards,

item.title: Tim Auvache - 2015-08-25 18:19:19
item.content:encoded:
Dear Clara, I'm writing from the BBC Music Library to enquire about "The people here go mad. They blame the wind." I've been asked to order 2 copies for BBC Radio 3 for their coverage of this year's Cut and Splice Festival. Although the scores would only be used in this instance by the radio producer and engineer for study, we'd like to add them to the BBC Music Library for possible future use which may include performance. As your website states for 'personal use or study only' I just wanted to check that it would be ok for us to add them to our Music Library?
Many thanks, Kind regards, Tim. <!--more--> AUTHOR: Tim Auvache AUTHOR EMAIL: tim.auvache@bbc.co.uk AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 10.118.2.30 Array ( [Name] => Tim Auvache [E-mail Address] => tim.auvache@bbc.co.uk [Message] => Dear Clara, I'm writing from the BBC Music Library to enquire about "The people here go mad. They blame the wind." I've been asked to order 2 copies for BBC Radio 3 for their coverage of this year's Cut and Splice Festival. Although the scores would only be used in this instance by the radio producer and engineer for study, we'd like to add them to the BBC Music Library for possible future use which may include performance. As your website states for 'personal use or study only' I just wanted to check that it would be ok for us to add them to our Music Library?
Many thanks, Kind regards, Tim. )

item.title: Kazue McGregor, Librarian, Los Angeles Philharmonic - 2015-09-01 20:32:05
item.content:encoded:
I am the librarian for the Los Angeles Philharmonic and I am interested in acquiring materials for Intent on Resurrection - spring or Some Such Thing for a performance in March 2016. Please advise on how to proceed. Details are below. Thank you very much.
Iannotta: Intent on Resurrection - spring or Some Such Thing March 1, 2016 (one performance) Walt Disney Concert Hall, Los Angeles, USA Mirga Grazinyte-Tyla, conductor 2 scores, 1 set No broadcast or streaming planned Require materials by December 1, 2015 <!--more--> AUTHOR: Kazue McGregor, Librarian, Los Angeles Philharmonic AUTHOR EMAIL: kmcgregor@laphil.org AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 209.249.224.14 Array ( [Name] => Kazue McGregor, Librarian, Los Angeles Philharmonic [E-mail Address] => kmcgregor@laphil.org [Message] => I am the librarian for the Los Angeles Philharmonic and I am interested in acquiring materials for Intent on Resurrection - spring or Some Such Thing for a performance in March 2016. Please advise on how to proceed. Details are below. Thank you very much.

item.title: Andy King - Radio 3 - 2015-09-22 16:37:14
item.content:encoded:
Dear Clara
I’m producing the recordings of this weekend’s Cut & Splice events for Radio 3 – very much looking forward to hearing your piece on Friday.
In the broadcasts I want to include interviews about the music with as many of the composers as possible. Please could you let me know if you would be happy to record a short interview in between rehearsals and performance on the day? It will be with our presenter Robert Worby in the office at Café Oto, and will take 10-15 minutes.
I completely understand the day will be very busy so will be happy to work around what’s best for you.
Many thanks
Andy
Andy King BBC Radio 3 | Lead Producer: Music Matters | Producer: Hear and Now, Breakfast Room 1015, BBC Broadcasting House, London, W1A 1AA t: +44 (0)20 7765 2278 | m: +44 (0)7951 855082 | e: andrew.king@bbc.co.uk

I completely understand the day will be very busy so will be happy to work around what’s best for you.
Many thanks
Andy

a:4:{s:2:"to";a:1:{i:0;s:24:"clara.iannotta@gmail.com";}s:7:"subject";s:36:"Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com";s:7:"message";s:1213:"Name: Andy King - Radio 3 E-mail Address: andrew.king@bbc.co.uk : Message: Dear Clara
I’m producing the recordings of this weekend’s Cut & Splice events for Radio 3 – very much looking forward to hearing your piece on Friday.
In the broadcasts I want to include interviews about the music with as many of the composers as possible. Please could you let me know if you would be happy to record a short interview in between rehearsals and performance on the day? It will be with our presenter Robert Worby in the office at Café Oto, and will take 10-15 minutes.
I completely understand the day will be very busy so will be happy to work around what’s best for you.
Many thanks
Andy
Andy King BBC Radio 3 | Lead Producer: Music Matters | Producer: Hear and Now, Breakfast Room 1015, BBC Broadcasting House, London, W1A 1AA t: +44 (0)20 7765 2278 | m: +44 (0)7951 855082 | e: andrew.king@bbc.co.uk
BBC Radio 3 - broadcaster of classical music, jazz, world music, arts programmes and drama www.bbc.co.uk/radio3
Time: Tuesday September 22, 2015 at 4:37 pm IP Address: 10.52.44.24 Contact Form URL: http://claraiannotta.com/contact/

item.title: Christine Paté - 2015-10-09 08:59:51
item.content:encoded: Bonjour Clara, je suis l ' accordéoniste Française qui a joué ta pièce de l' ensemble collectif l' année dernière. Comment vas-tu? J' aimerais te parler d' un éventuel projet, mais malheureusement c' est assez urgent. Pouvons nous téléphoner dans la journée ou parler sur Skype si tu n' es pas à Berlin? Je te donne mon téléphone 0163 832 55 34. Bien à toi Christine <!--more--> AUTHOR: Christine Paté AUTHOR EMAIL: post@christine-pate.de AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 178.8.62.243 Array ( [Name] => Christine Paté [E-mail Address] => post@christine-pate.de [Message] => Bonjour Clara, je suis l ' accordéoniste Française qui a joué ta pièce de l' ensemble collectif l' année dernière. Je te donne mon téléphone 0163 832 55 34. Bien à toi Christine )

item.title: Annelies Fryberger - 2015-10-16 15:58:45
item.content:encoded:
Dear Clara,
I'm a PhD student in the "Analysis of Musical Practices" team at the Ircam, and my research is on the evaluation of contemporary music. I was very interested in your post on Facebook some months back on anonymity in composition competitions, and I almost contacted you at that point. I'm reaching out now because I am wondering if you would accept a short interview on your experience as a panelist for the commandes d'Etat (aides à l'écriture) of this past year. I've had the opportunity to interview panelists from past years, and the 2015 panel is of particular interest to me, as it's the first time that the Ministry explicitly sought gender equality amongst panelists. Do know that the interview would not discuss specific aspects of the different applications - that information is obviously confidential and I will not address that at all. My interest is more to understand the dynamics of the panel and your role within it. Don't hesitate if you have questions for me about my research. I'm also happy to provide you with a list of questions beforehand if you'd like. And the interview can take place by phone, over skype, or in person, if you are planning to be in Paris in the coming months. Thank you for considering this option- it would be really valuable for me to hear your perspective on these things! All best, Annelies Fryberger <!--more--> AUTHOR: Annelies Fryberger AUTHOR EMAIL: annelies.fryberger@gmail.com AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 129.102.60.83 Array ( [Name] => Annelies Fryberger [E-mail Address] => annelies.fryberger@gmail.com [Message] => Dear Clara,
I'm a PhD student in the "Analysis of Musical Practices" team at the Ircam, and my research is on the evaluation of contemporary music. I was very interested in your post on Facebook some months back on anonymity in composition competitions, and I almost contacted you at that point. I'm reaching out now because I am wondering if you would accept a short interview on your experience as a panelist for the commandes d'Etat (aides à l'écriture) of this past year. I've had the opportunity to interview panelists from past years, and the 2015 panel is of particular interest to me, as it's the first time that the Ministry explicitly sought gender equality amongst panelists. Do know that the interview would not discuss specific aspects of the different applications - that information is obviously confidential and I will not address that at all. My interest is more to understand the dynamics of the panel and your role within it. Don't hesitate if you have questions for me about my research. I'm also happy to provide you with a list of questions beforehand if you'd like. And the interview can take place by phone, over skype, or in person, if you are planning to be in Paris in the coming months. Thank you for considering this option- it would be really valuable for me to hear your perspective on these things! All best, Annelies Fryberger )

item.title: Christine Weitzer/ Klangforum Wien - 2015-10-20 10:14:42
item.content:encoded:
Dear Clara Iannotta, Klangforum Wien is going to plan a concert in December 2016 (Wiener Konzerthaus) with Sylvain Cambering, with your piece Intent on Resurrection – Spring or some such thing. We have no paypal account so I want to please you to send us a Score in hard copy (with bill) to our Adress in Vienna: Klangforum Wien, Diehlgasse 51, 1050 Wien, AUSTRIA
MANY THANKS IN ADVANVE and best wishes Christine Weitzer
T 0043 1 521 67 13 c.weitzer@klangfourm.at <!--more--> AUTHOR: Christine Weitzer/ Klangforum Wien AUTHOR EMAIL: c.weitzer@klangforum.at AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 188.20.92.42 Array ( [Name] => Christine Weitzer/ Klangforum Wien [E-mail Address] => c.weitzer@klangforum.at [Message] => Dear Clara Iannotta, Klangforum Wien is going to plan a concert in December 2016 (Wiener Konzerthaus) with Sylvain Cambering, with your piece Intent on Resurrection – Spring or some such thing. We have no paypal account so I want to please you to send us a Score in hard copy (with bill) to our Adress in Vienna: Klangforum Wien, Diehlgasse 51, 1050 Wien, AUSTRIA
MANY THANKS IN ADVANVE and best wishes Christine Weitzer
T 0043 1 521 67 13 c.weitzer@klangfourm.at )

item.title: Tanja Pröbstl - 2015-10-21 15:16:21
item.content:encoded:
Dear Clara,
the Ernst von Siemens Music Foundation (www.evs-musikstiftung.ch) is always interested in talented young composers. In addition to its main prize awarded annually for a figure's life's work in the service of New Music the foundation also awards three promotional prizes to young composers. Moreover, every year we support numerous contemporary music projects with funding of over Euro 2.7 m.
Our attention has been drawn to you from a number of sources and we are interested in your work. Could I therefore ask you to send us a current curriculum vitae by e-mail, a selection of your scores (non digital) and recordings (on CD) of your work by mail for non-binding assessment? Since the next meeting of our Board of Trustees is scheduled for December it would be lovely if you could send us the material by the middle of November 2015, should you also be interested in keeping us and the Board of Trustees updated. Should you have any queries please do not hesitate to write us an e-mail or give us a call.
We look forward to receiving your material! With thanks and cordial regards, Tanja <!--more--> AUTHOR: Tanja Pröbstl AUTHOR EMAIL: proebstl@evs-musikstiftung.ch AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 192.35.17.12 Array ( [Name] => Tanja Pröbstl [E-mail Address] => proebstl@evs-musikstiftung.ch [Message] => Dear Clara,
the Ernst von Siemens Music Foundation (www.evs-musikstiftung.ch) is always interested in talented young composers. In addition to its main prize awarded annually for a figure's life's work in the service of New Music the foundation also awards three promotional prizes to young composers. Moreover, every year we support numerous contemporary music projects with funding of over Euro 2.7 m.
Our attention has been drawn to you from a number of sources and we are interested in your work. Could I therefore ask you to send us a current curriculum vitae by e-mail, a selection of your scores (non digital) and recordings (on CD) of your work by mail for non-binding assessment? Since the next meeting of our Board of Trustees is scheduled for December it would be lovely if you could send us the material by the middle of November 2015, should you also be interested in keeping us and the Board of Trustees updated. Should you have any queries please do not hesitate to write us an e-mail or give us a call.
We look forward to receiving your material! With thanks and cordial regards, Tanja )

item.title: Gustavo Bustamante Mesa - 2015-10-26 22:37:11
item.content:encoded:
The sacred is the interference of the uncreated in the created, of the eternal in time, of the infinite in space, of the supraformal in forms; it is the mysterious introduction into one realm of existence of a presence which in reality contains and transcends that realm and could cause it to burst asunder in a sort of divine explosion. The sacred is the incommensurable, the trascendent, hidden within a fragile form belonging to this world; it has its own precise rules, its terrible aspects and its merciful action; moreover, any violation of the sacred, even in art, has incalculable repercussions. Intrinsically the sacred is inviolable, and so much so that any attempted violation recoils on the head of the violator.
Frithjof Schuon
Dear friend Clara Iannotta : For me, art is a sacred thing. My name is Gustavo Adolfo Bustamante. I am promoter of literature erotic, jazz and world music in Medellín- Colombia. I have three programs: Contemporary Music and improvise music, called "Jazz Session" ( contemporary jazz ) and "Rizoma” (Improvise, arte sonoro and contemporary music ) in UN Radio 100.4 FM Móvil: http://tunein.com/radio/Un-Radio-Web-1004-s123108/ On Line: http://www.unradio.unal.edu.co/nc/en-linea/medellin.html
Would you please give me a free promotional of your music for my programs "Jazz Session" or "Rizoma" ( see poster adjunt )
Your work is a valuable contribution to my human and cultural growth.
Thank you very much A hug, Gustavo Bustamante Mesa Promoter of jazz, improvise and contemporary music
Barrio Cristo Rey, Guayabal Calle 4 Sur # 50G36 Phone 311 323 93 48 Medellin - Antioquia Colombia <!--more--> AUTHOR: Gustavo Bustamante Mesa AUTHOR EMAIL: rizoma21@gmail.com AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 168.176.127.125 Array ( [Name] => Gustavo Bustamante Mesa [E-mail Address] => rizoma21@gmail.com [Message] => The sacred is the interference of the uncreated in the created, of the eternal in time, of the infinite in space, of the supraformal in forms; it is the mysterious introduction into one realm of existence of a presence which in reality contains and transcends that realm and could cause it to burst asunder in a sort of divine explosion. The sacred is the incommensurable, the trascendent, hidden within a fragile form belonging to this world; it has its own precise rules, its terrible aspects and its merciful action; moreover, any violation of the sacred, even in art, has incalculable repercussions. Intrinsically the sacred is inviolable, and so much so that any attempted violation recoils on the head of the violator.
Frithjof Schuon
Dear friend Clara Iannotta : For me, art is a sacred thing. My name is Gustavo Adolfo Bustamante. I am promoter of literature erotic, jazz and world music in Medellín- Colombia. I have three programs: Contemporary Music and improvise music, called "Jazz Session" ( contemporary jazz ) and "Rizoma” (Improvise, arte sonoro and contemporary music ) in UN Radio 100.4 FM Móvil: http://tunein.com/radio/Un-Radio-Web-1004-s123108/ On Line: http://www.unradio.unal.edu.co/nc/en-linea/medellin.html

item.title: Ivan Buffa - 2015-10-28 11:52:12
item.content:encoded:
Dear Ms Clara Iannotta, I hope you're well! We met in Takefu, I hope you remember me. My name is Ivan Buffa and I am artistic director of Quasars Ensemble. As we consider your festival to be one of the leading modern classical music events in Europe, we would like to offer you one interesting project from the upper mentioned concepts and our repertoire and discuss potential ways of cooperation.
Music and drawing Michael Jarrell – Assonance VI Kaija Saariaho – Lichtbogen Bent Sørensen – The Lady and the Lark Toshio Hosokawa – Drawing
A new approach to the sound in music and eminent works of the spectral music Ivan Buffa – Quasars Tristan Murail – The Barque Mystique Gérard Grisey – Vortex Temporum I, II, III
Two famous monodramas in the range of 100 years Arnold Schönberg – Pierrot Lunaire Toshio Hosokawa – The Raven Eva Šušková – mezzo-soprano
Music and Object Christopher Trebue Moore – Dementia Praecox Rebecca Saunders – Stirrings Still II Carola Bauckholt – Treibstoff Frederik Neyrinck – Echo de Maeterlinck
A portrait of the first lady of the spectral music Kaija Saariaho – Lichtbogen Kaija Saariaho – Tempest Songbook Kaija Saariaho – Terrestre Kaija Saariaho – Sombre Mario Caroli – flute Eva Šušková – soprano Stephan Loges – baryton
Looking forward to hearing from you
Kind regards Ivan Buffa <!--more--> AUTHOR: Ivan Buffa AUTHOR EMAIL: buffa.ivan@gmail.com AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 84.47.35.246 Array ( [Name] => Ivan Buffa [E-mail Address] => buffa.ivan@gmail.com [Message] => Dear Ms Clara Iannotta, I hope you're well! We met in Takefu, I hope you remember me. My name is Ivan Buffa and I am artistic director of Quasars Ensemble. As we consider your festival to be one of the leading modern classical music events in Europe, we would like to offer you one interesting project from the upper mentioned concepts and our repertoire and discuss potential ways of cooperation.
Music and drawing Michael Jarrell – Assonance VI Kaija Saariaho – Lichtbogen Bent Sørensen – The Lady and the Lark Toshio Hosokawa – Drawing
A new approach to the sound in music and eminent works of the spectral music Ivan Buffa – Quasars Tristan Murail – The Barque Mystique Gérard Grisey – Vortex Temporum I, II, III
Two famous monodramas in the range of 100 years Arnold Schönberg – Pierrot Lunaire Toshio Hosokawa – The Raven Eva Šušková – mezzo-soprano
Music and Object Christopher Trebue Moore – Dementia Praecox Rebecca Saunders – Stirrings Still II Carola Bauckholt – Treibstoff Frederik Neyrinck – Echo de Maeterlinck
A portrait of the first lady of the spectral music Kaija Saariaho – Lichtbogen Kaija Saariaho – Tempest Songbook Kaija Saariaho – Terrestre Kaija Saariaho – Sombre Mario Caroli – flute Eva Šušková – soprano Stephan Loges – baryton
Looking forward to hearing from you
Kind regards Ivan Buffa )

item.title: Christoph Riedo - 2015-10-29 23:04:41
item.content:encoded: Cara Clara, ieri Kate van Orden mi ha detto che aveva incontrato una ragazza in Music department che stava cercando disperatamente altra gente con cui parlare in Italiano. Sono Svizzero ma me la cavo abbastanza in Italiano (ho studiato tra l'altro a Milano e Padova). Ho il mio 'desk' nel terzo piano del Music Building. E anche il mio collega Cory Gavito, un altro 'fellow', parla l'Italiano. Se vuoi faremo una pausa caffè insieme. Buon lavoro e a presto! Ciao, Christoph <!--more--> AUTHOR: Christoph Riedo AUTHOR EMAIL: christoph.riedo@unifr.ch AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 65.112.10.239 Array ( [Name] => Christoph Riedo [E-mail Address] => christoph.riedo@unifr.ch [Message] => Cara Clara, ieri Kate van Orden mi ha detto che aveva incontrato una ragazza in Music department che stava cercando disperatamente altra gente con cui parlare in Italiano. Sono Svizzero ma me la cavo abbastanza in Italiano (ho studiato tra l'altro a Milano e Padova). Ho il mio 'desk' nel terzo piano del Music Building. E anche il mio collega Cory Gavito, un altro 'fellow', parla l'Italiano. Se vuoi faremo una pausa caffè insieme. Buon lavoro e a presto! Ciao, Christoph )

item.title: Susan Stokdyk - 2015-10-30 14:50:03
item.content:encoded:
Hi Ms. Iannotta,
I'm the librarian for the Chicago Symphony's MusicNow series, and wanted to inquire about renting or purchasing Intent on Resurrection for the May 9, 2016 program. Could you let me know your process for sending music, and a possible quote? Thanks so much!
Susan Stokdyk, librarian Northwestern University Chicago Philharmonic Chicago Symphony's MusicNow series susan.stokdyk@gmail.com 765-744-8110 <!--more--> AUTHOR: Susan Stokdyk AUTHOR EMAIL: susan.stokdyk@gmail.com AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 129.105.159.24 Array ( [Name] => Susan Stokdyk [E-mail Address] => susan.stokdyk@gmail.com [Message] => Hi Ms. Iannotta,
I'm the librarian for the Chicago Symphony's MusicNow series, and wanted to inquire about renting or purchasing Intent on Resurrection for the May 9, 2016 program. Could you let me know your process for sending music, and a possible quote? Thanks so much!
Susan Stokdyk, librarian Northwestern University Chicago Philharmonic Chicago Symphony's MusicNow series susan.stokdyk@gmail.com 765-744-8110
)

item.title: Juhani Topias Vesikkala - 2015-11-06 21:49:11
item.content:encoded:
Hello Clara,
while doing my research I warmly remembered your music from Darmstadt 2014 and Graz where I studied 2012-2013. My thesis concerns the piano multiphonics (as used most purely in Erik Oña's Jodeln (1996), for instance), meaning the bass string flageolets where several pitches can be heard simultaneously.
As part of my soon-to-be-published thesis, I have undertaken a quest of compiling a list of all existing pieces that feature piano multiphonics (check out the two-page pdf at https://drive.google.com/folderview?id=0BxR3sWvku6mxfjVtVmNVclZzQ3JxRnNUZWNMREo4bTR6dUFRc0x4WnZNNVF2ek9PUHBMVEU&usp=sharing ). As of now, there is one of your works included.
Could you possibly inform me of all your output where you have used this mode of playing? Would you also like to send me some snippets of your scores where your notational aesthetic for a piano multiphonic is shown, plus any corresponding legend text? I could include them in a chapter that compares notational choices, contexts and their advantages.
Best wishes from Helsinki, Juhani Topias Vesikkala +358505712819 <!--more--> AUTHOR: Juhani Topias Vesikkala AUTHOR EMAIL: vesikkala@gmail.com AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 89.27.52.60 Array ( [Name] => Juhani Topias Vesikkala [E-mail Address] => vesikkala@gmail.com [Message] => Hello Clara,
while doing my research I warmly remembered your music from Darmstadt 2014 and Graz where I studied 2012-2013. My thesis concerns the piano multiphonics (as used most purely in Erik Oña's Jodeln (1996), for instance), meaning the bass string flageolets where several pitches can be heard simultaneously.
As part of my soon-to-be-published thesis, I have undertaken a quest of compiling a list of all existing pieces that feature piano multiphonics (check out the two-page pdf at https://drive.google.com/folderview?id=0BxR3sWvku6mxfjVtVmNVclZzQ3JxRnNUZWNMREo4bTR6dUFRc0x4WnZNNVF2ek9PUHBMVEU&usp=sharing ). As of now, there is one of your works included.
Could you possibly inform me of all your output where you have used this mode of playing? Would you also like to send me some snippets of your scores where your notational aesthetic for a piano multiphonic is shown, plus any corresponding legend text? I could include them in a chapter that compares notational choices, contexts and their advantages.
Best wishes from Helsinki, Juhani Topias Vesikkala +358505712819 )

while doing my research I warmly remembered your music from Darmstadt 2014 and Graz where I studied 2012-2013. My thesis concerns the piano multiphonics (as used most purely in Erik Oña's Jodeln (1996), for instance), meaning the bass string flageolets where several pitches can be heard simultaneously.
As part of my soon-to-be-published thesis, I have undertaken a quest of compiling a list of all existing pieces that feature piano multiphonics (check out the two-page pdf at https://drive.google.com/folderview?id=0BxR3sWvku6mxfjVtVmNVclZzQ3JxRnNUZWNMREo4bTR6dUFRc0x4WnZNNVF2ek9PUHBMVEU&usp=sharing ). As of now, there is one of your works included.
Could you possibly inform me of all your output where you have used this mode of playing? Would you also like to send me some snippets of your scores where your notational aesthetic for a piano multiphonic is shown, plus any corresponding legend text? I could include them in a chapter that compares notational choices, contexts and their advantages.
Best wishes from Helsinki, Juhani Topias Vesikkala +358505712819
Time: Friday November 6, 2015 at 9:49 pm IP Address: 89.27.52.60 Contact Form URL: http://claraiannotta.com/contact/

item.title: Phil Danielson - 2015-11-13 04:12:59
item.content:encoded:
Clara,
Nice to chat with you on our flight from London to Boston last week. All the best to you in 2016. Per your website, looks like some great concerts lined up. Don't forget to write for trombone!
Hey, on a side note, should you ever be up for a cultural experience, might check out one of these churches in Berlin. This past Sunday I met a guy who had lived in Berlin for a few years. He's now moved to S Germany, but knew of these. Whether in a funk, need a fresh perspective, need a breath of fresh air, might check one or more out.
And don't forget to write for trombone.
The first one is a German language church, but does have a number of internationals. The second church is an international church and primarily English language.
The third church I would recommend is a German church that also offers English translation.
http://www.kulturwerkstattberlin.de/termine.html
http://www.berlinchurch.org/
http://www.lukas-gemeinde.de/
From the brass section, Phil h: 716-580-3131
P.S. After a BRISK walk through Logan, I did squeak onto my connecting flight to Buffalo even given our delay getting off the ground in London.
P.P.S. Ever make it back to Buffalo, drop a line. We'd be glad to host you for a meal or whatever. My girls would like to meet a composer. <!--more--> AUTHOR: Phil Danielson AUTHOR EMAIL: phild02@aol.com AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 69.204.36.146 Array ( [Name] => Phil Danielson [E-mail Address] => phild02@aol.com [Message] => Clara,

And don't forget to write for trombone.
The first one is a German language church, but does have a number of internationals. The second church is an international church and primarily English language.
The third church I would recommend is a German church that also offers English translation.
http://www.kulturwerkstattberlin.de/termine.html
http://www.berlinchurch.org/
http://www.lukas-gemeinde.de/
From the brass section, Phil h: 716-580-3131
P.S. After a BRISK walk through Logan, I did squeak onto my connecting flight to Buffalo even given our delay getting off the ground in London.
P.P.S. Ever make it back to Buffalo, drop a line. We'd be glad to host you for a meal or whatever. My girls would like to meet a composer.
)

Dear Clara Iannotta,
RE: Parametric Composition
Tonality Systems Press has just published an ebook that might interest you . . .
You can Preview (and Purchase) it here:
http://tonalitysystemspress.co.uk
With good wishes
Nigel Morgan

item.title: Susanne Wosnitzka (mfm) - 2015-12-19 20:23:02
item.content:encoded: Hallo Clara, wir haben uns bei Anne Holler-Kuthe bei der Vertragsunterzeichnung für den Kompositionsauftrag von mfm kennengelernt. Ich bin gerade am Überarbeiten unserer Homepage, die komplett neu ist, & möchte etwas Werbung für Dich auf unseren Seiten machen. Mir ist aufgefallen, dass in Deinen Texten bei "news" Folgendes steht: "a small ensemble piece with electronics and light installation (for CrossingLines) and a string orchestra work (for Münchener Kammerorchester)." Könntest Du bitte ein klein wenig den Text und einen Link ändern? Das letzte Auftragswerk haben wir bei Dir in Auftrag gegeben (musica femina münchen e.V.), & nicht das Münchener Kammerorchester. Das MKO spielt Dein Werk nur :) Sonst könnte man in Deinem Text meinen, das MKO hätte Dich beauftragt ;) Vielen Dank und ganz viele Grüße, Sou <!--more--> AUTHOR: Susanne Wosnitzka (mfm) AUTHOR EMAIL: susanne_wosnitzka@web.de AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 37.49.89.1 Array ( [Name] => Susanne Wosnitzka (mfm) [E-mail Address] => susanne_wosnitzka@web.de [Message] => Hallo Clara, wir haben uns bei Anne Holler-Kuthe bei der Vertragsunterzeichnung für den Kompositionsauftrag von mfm kennengelernt. Mir ist aufgefallen, dass in Deinen Texten bei "news" Folgendes steht: "a small ensemble piece with electronics and light installation (for CrossingLines) and a string orchestra work (for Münchener Kammerorchester)." Könntest Du bitte ein klein wenig den Text und einen Link ändern? Das letzte Auftragswerk haben wir bei Dir in Auftrag gegeben (musica femina münchen e.V.), & nicht das Münchener Kammerorchester. Das MKO spielt Dein Werk nur :) Sonst könnte man in Deinem Text meinen, das MKO hätte Dich beauftragt ;) Vielen Dank und ganz viele Grüße, Sou )

item.title: Laura Carnelos - 2015-12-21 09:25:07
item.content:encoded:
Gentile Sig.ra Clara Iannotta,
mi chiamo Laura Carnelos e sono una studiosa di storia della stampa. Mi hanno chiesto di scrivere la voce "Rampazetto Francesco" nel Dizionario Biografico degli italiani entro fine gennaio. Volevo chiederle se è sua la tesi di cui si trova il riferimento e se, in caso affermativo, cortesemente mi potrebbe inviare una copia in PDF o come preferisce per poterla consultare e ovviamente citare nel DBI. In attesa di un suo cordiale riscontro, le auguro buona giornata
Laura Carnelos <!--more--> AUTHOR: Laura Carnelos AUTHOR EMAIL: lcarnelos81@gmail.com AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 94.247.8.11 Array ( [Name] => Laura Carnelos [E-mail Address] => lcarnelos81@gmail.com [Message] => Gentile Sig.ra Clara Iannotta,

In attesa di un suo cordiale riscontro, le auguro buona giornata
Laura Carnelos )

item.title: Luce Zurita - 2015-12-26 14:34:13
item.content:encoded:
Madame,
Je suis rédactrice pour l'Opéra de Rouen Normandie et je suis chargée d'écrire une note de programme pour le concert d'accentus à la Chapelle Corneille de Rouen le 23 mars 2016. Ce programme comprend l'une de vos créations, commandée par le choeur. Serait-il possible d'obtenir quelques renseignements sur cette œuvre que je pourrais faire figurer dans mon texte ?
En vous remerciant,
Luce Zurita <!--more--> AUTHOR: Luce Zurita AUTHOR EMAIL: luce.zurita@gmail.com AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 90.22.150.5 Array ( [Name] => Luce Zurita [E-mail Address] => luce.zurita@gmail.com [Message] => Madame,

En vous remerciant,
Luce Zurita )

item.title: Diego Castro Magas - 2016-01-16 20:26:42
item.content:encoded:
Hello, I'm writing you in order to express my interest in performing at Bludenzer Tage zeitgemäßer Musik . I'm a Chilean guitarist based in the UK and I just launched a CD featuring recent British guitar music, distributed by NMC recordings:
http://www.nmcrec.co.uk/huddersfield-contemporary-records/shrouded-mirrors
I think my repertoire could fit very well in the programming of the festival. Please find a tentative proposal below, including some videos of recent performances:
Wieland Hoban: 'Knokler', for solo classical guitar (2009-2016) 12'. This would be a premiere of the full version of the piece, as I played and recorded just the first section of it: https://youtu.be/0gGE5sFrjjo
James Erber: 'Am Grabe Memphis Minnies', for solo classical guitar (1997) 8' https://youtu.be/Y70DzY8-yPU
Richard Barrett: 'transmission' for electric guitar and electronics (1996-99, rev. 2016) 17'. I'm currently collaborating with the composer in a revision of the electronics of the piece, so it could be the premiere of the revised version.
Aaron Cassidy: The pleats of matter, for electric guitar and electronics (2005-7) 11' http://youtu.be/1fpLw4cHuvw
Please let me know whether this kind of repertoire could be of interest for next versions of the festival.
With best wishes, Diego Castro Magas

a:4:{s:2:"to";a:1:{i:0;s:24:"clara.iannotta@gmail.com";}s:7:"subject";s:36:"Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com";s:7:"message";s:1601:"Name: Diego Castro Magas E-mail Address: dcastromagas@gmail.com : Message: Hello, I'm writing you in order to express my interest in performing at Bludenzer Tage zeitgemäßer Musik . I'm a Chilean guitarist based in the UK and I just launched a CD featuring recent British guitar music, distributed by NMC recordings:
http://www.nmcrec.co.uk/huddersfield-contemporary-records/shrouded-mirrors
I think my repertoire could fit very well in the programming of the festival. Please find a tentative proposal below, including some videos of recent performances:
Wieland Hoban: 'Knokler', for solo classical guitar (2009-2016) 12'. This would be a premiere of the full version of the piece, as I played and recorded just the first section of it: https://youtu.be/0gGE5sFrjjo
James Erber: 'Am Grabe Memphis Minnies', for solo classical guitar (1997) 8' https://youtu.be/Y70DzY8-yPU
Richard Barrett: 'transmission' for electric guitar and electronics (1996-99, rev. 2016) 17'. I'm currently collaborating with the composer in a revision of the electronics of the piece, so it could be the premiere of the revised version.
Aaron Cassidy: The pleats of matter, for electric guitar and electronics (2005-7) 11' http://youtu.be/1fpLw4cHuvw
Please let me know whether this kind of repertoire could be of interest for next versions of the festival.
With best wishes, Diego Castro Magas
www.diegocastromagas.com
Time: Saturday January 16, 2016 at 8:26 pm IP Address: 92.22.235.207 Contact Form URL: http://claraiannotta.com/contact/
Sent by an unverified visitor to your site.";s:7:"headers";s:126:"From: Diego Castro Magas <dcastromagas@gmail.com> Reply-To: dcastromagas@gmail.com Content-Type: text/plain; charset="UTF-8"";}

item.title: Alain FERON (Opéra de Dijon) - 2016-01-17 16:16:15
item.content:encoded:
Bonjour, Je dois rédiger la note de programme de votre concert, mais , vu que c'est une création, auriez-vous la gentillesse de m'envoyer des informations sur votre œuvre ou bien de rédiger quelques lignes de présentation que j'inclurai dans mon texte. Merci par avance. Bien à,vous. Alain Féron PS : Je dois rendre la notice avant le 27 janvier ! CMa requête est donc (je vous prie de bien vouloir m'en excuser) urgente ! <!--more--> AUTHOR: Alain FERON (Opéra de Dijon) AUTHOR EMAIL: alainferon@sfr.fr AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 77.150.171.95 Array ( [Name] => Alain FERON (Opéra de Dijon) [E-mail Address] => alainferon@sfr.fr [Message] => Bonjour, Je dois rédiger la note de programme de votre concert, mais , vu que c'est une création, auriez-vous la gentillesse de m'envoyer des informations sur votre œuvre ou bien de rédiger quelques lignes de présentation que j'inclurai dans mon texte. Merci par avance. Bien à,vous. Alain Féron PS : Je dois rendre la notice avant le 27 janvier ! CMa requête est donc (je vous prie de bien vouloir m'en excuser) urgente !
)

item.title: claudio jacomucci - 2016-01-29 17:33:07
item.content:encoded:
Salve Clara,
non ci conosciamo, tempo fa mi ha parlato di te Francesco DIllon. Mi è capitato di vedere la programmazione di Bludenzer Tage zeitgemäßer Musik e volevo farti i complimenti, passarti i miei contatti, le informazioni sul mio lavoro ed invitarti dare un'occhiata a www.claudiojacomucci.com/projects.html dove trovi le proposte di concerto. Sarebbe bello collaborare in futuro. Speriamo di conoscerci.
Buon lavoro e ancora complimenti.
Claudio Jacomucci www.claudiojacomucci.com <!--more--> AUTHOR: claudio jacomucci AUTHOR EMAIL: info@claudiojacomucci.com AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 151.67.224.235 Array ( [Name] => claudio jacomucci [E-mail Address] => info@claudiojacomucci.com [Message] => Salve Clara,

Claudio Jacomucci www.claudiojacomucci.com
)

item.title: Juergen Groezinger - 2016-01-31 15:05:10
item.content:encoded: Cara Clara, spero che Mathis ti ha detto che noi suoniamo "The people here go mad. They blame the wind" a Aprile 16 al mio festival di Ulm. E possibile comprare la musica con un negozzio? Per me va benissimo con Pdf, Ma come faccio con pagare? Normalmente sará pagato dello Stadthaus; ma loro non fanno transfer con credir card. Un saluto cordiale Juergen P.S.: forse ti ricordi: abbiamo parlato quando ho suonato (perciussionista la tua musica con "Ensemblekollektiv" a Berlino, Maerzmusik, l ´anno scorso.... . <!--more--> AUTHOR: Juergen Groezinger AUTHOR EMAIL: info@groezinger-music.de AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 178.26.167.71 Array ( [Name] => Juergen Groezinger [E-mail Address] => info@groezinger-music.de [Message] => Cara Clara, spero che Mathis ti ha detto che noi suoniamo "The people here go mad. They blame the wind" a Aprile 16 al mio festival di Ulm. E possibile comprare la musica con un negozzio? Per me va benissimo con Pdf, Ma come faccio con pagare? Normalmente sará pagato dello Stadthaus; ma loro non fanno transfer con credir card. Un saluto cordiale Juergen P.S.: forse ti ricordi: abbiamo parlato quando ho suonato (perciussionista la tua musica con "Ensemblekollektiv" a Berlino, Maerzmusik, l ´anno scorso.... . )

item.title: Dourde Orane - 2016-01-31 20:23:52
item.content:encoded:
Demande d'info Festival Archipel 2016 GE
Chère Madame Iannotta,
Le texte concernant votre Concerto pour piano et ensemble que vous trouvez sur le site du festival est-il dans sa version définitive (puisqu’il a été rédigé en amont de l’écriture de l’oeuvre) ?
http://www.archipel.org/2016/index.php?m=11&i=o15676
Un grand merci de vos précisions et souhaits à ce sujet.
Meilleurs messages,
Orane Dourde <!--more--> AUTHOR: Dourde Orane AUTHOR EMAIL: orane.dourde@hotmail.com AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 31.10.172.176 Array ( [Name] => Dourde Orane [E-mail Address] => orane.dourde@hotmail.com [Message] => Demande d'info Festival Archipel 2016 GE

item.title: Fabio Selvafiorita - 2016-02-14 12:50:38
item.content:encoded: CAPOLAVORO ciao Clara BRAVISSSIMA ho da poco comprato l tuo cd! Livelli altissimi, mi piace molto la tua musica mi piaceva quando l'ho conosciuta anni fa e mi piace ancora di più ora che la ascolto intepretata con maestria! complimenti ancora e se capiti a Milano per Marzo (18-22)ti aspetto ad una mostra che sto organizzando di sound art per il Festival 5 giornate. un abbraccio Fabio <!--more--> AUTHOR: Fabio Selvafiorita AUTHOR EMAIL: fabio@fabioselvafiorita.com AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 93.32.116.204 Array ( [Name] => Fabio Selvafiorita [E-mail Address] => fabio@fabioselvafiorita.com [Message] => CAPOLAVORO ciao Clara BRAVISSSIMA ho da poco comprato l tuo cd! item.title: David Bloom - 2016-02-18 16:25:27
item.content:encoded:
Dear Clara,
My name is David Bloom, and I am founding co-artistic director of Contemporaneous, a New York-based ensemble of 21 musicians. We are very interested in your music and are considering programming a work of yours this August in upstate New York.
Because the instrumentation might work well for us, we would like to consider your new piece "troglodyte angels clank by." I understand that the piece has still not been performed. Would it still be under exclusivity by this August, meaning that we would not be able to perform it? If it is possible that we could perform it, I would love to see a perusal score. Otherwise, we are very interested in a few other works of yours.
Many thanks, and I look forward to delving into your music!
Yours, David <!--more--> AUTHOR: David Bloom AUTHOR EMAIL: davidbloom@contemporaneous.org AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 67.87.165.90 Array ( [Name] => David Bloom [E-mail Address] => davidbloom@contemporaneous.org [Message] => Dear Clara,
My name is David Bloom, and I am founding co-artistic director of Contemporaneous, a New York-based ensemble of 21 musicians. We are very interested in your music and are considering programming a work of yours this August in upstate New York.
Because the instrumentation might work well for us, we would like to consider your new piece "troglodyte angels clank by." I understand that the piece has still not been performed. Would it still be under exclusivity by this August, meaning that we would not be able to perform it? If it is possible that we could perform it, I would love to see a perusal score. Otherwise, we are very interested in a few other works of yours.
Many thanks, and I look forward to delving into your music!
Yours, David )

item.title: Michael Vorfeld - 2016-02-23 22:10:33
item.content:encoded:
Dear Clara Iannotta,
With this e-mail I like to inform you about my audio visual performance LIGHT BULB MUSIC. There are two videos online which might give you a rough idea about it. https://vimeo.com/32291937 https://vimeo.com/32638725 Would be great to find your interest! I could imagine that it might fit into "Bludenzer Tage zeitgemäßer Musik". With best wishes Michael Vorfeld http://www.vorfeld.org/ <!--more--> AUTHOR: Michael Vorfeld AUTHOR EMAIL: vorfeld@vorfeld.org AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 79.245.160.103 Array ( [Name] => Michael Vorfeld [E-mail Address] => vorfeld@vorfeld.org [Message] => Dear Clara Iannotta,
With this e-mail I like to inform you about my audio visual performance LIGHT BULB MUSIC. There are two videos online which might give you a rough idea about it. https://vimeo.com/32291937 https://vimeo.com/32638725 Would be great to find your interest! I could imagine that it might fit into "Bludenzer Tage zeitgemäßer Musik". With best wishes Michael Vorfeld http://www.vorfeld.org/ )

item.title: Nancy Bennie - 2016-02-24 19:07:15
item.content:encoded:
Dear Clara
I am the production coordinator for BBC Radio 3's new music programme , Hear and Now. We would like to feature some music on an upcoming programme from 'A Failed Entertainment' but unfortunately RZ edition are not able to supply a digital promo copy of the album (ie - WAV format sent to me via wetransfer) and a physical CD copy would take too long to arrive in the post. Do you have digital copies of the pieces on the album that you could send to me? (or do you have a publisher that does?) We would really like to feature the album in our next recording of the programme but we are recording on Friday so need the music files as soon as possible. Sorry to be a pain! I look forward to hearing from you, Nancy <!--more--> AUTHOR: Nancy Bennie AUTHOR EMAIL: nancy.bennie@bbc.co.uk AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 10.52.47.50 Array ( [Name] => Nancy Bennie [E-mail Address] => nancy.bennie@bbc.co.uk [Message] => Dear Clara
I am the production coordinator for BBC Radio 3's new music programme , Hear and Now. We would like to feature some music on an upcoming programme from 'A Failed Entertainment' but unfortunately RZ edition are not able to supply a digital promo copy of the album (ie - WAV format sent to me via wetransfer) and a physical CD copy would take too long to arrive in the post. Do you have digital copies of the pieces on the album that you could send to me? (or do you have a publisher that does?) We would really like to feature the album in our next recording of the programme but we are recording on Friday so need the music files as soon as possible. Sorry to be a pain! I look forward to hearing from you, Nancy )

item.title: Jens Wernscheid - 2016-02-29 12:19:02
item.content:encoded:
Dear Ms. Iannotta,
My name is Jens Wernscheid, I am responsible for PR at Ricordi.
I would like to meet you and talk to you about a new artistic program at Ricordi Berlin. When do you have time to meet? You can also call me at +49 (0) 30 52007-1326.
Best wishes
Jens Wernscheid <!--more--> AUTHOR: Jens Wernscheid AUTHOR EMAIL: jens.wernscheid@umusic.com AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 213.61.130.232 Array ( [Name] => Jens Wernscheid [E-mail Address] => jens.wernscheid@umusic.com [Message] => Dear Ms. Iannotta,
My name is Jens Wernscheid, I am responsible for PR at Ricordi.
I would like to meet you and talk to you about a new artistic program at Ricordi Berlin. When do you have time to meet? You can also call me at +49 (0) 30 52007-1326.
Best wishes
Jens Wernscheid )

item.title: Danniel Ribeiro - 2016-02-29 19:24:59
item.content:encoded:
I've ordered a score here - Àphones, to be specific - but I still haven't had any email with the link for download. My paypal purchase was confirmed right away, I can send a receipt if it's needed, although it's in portuguese.
Thank you and best regards. <!--more--> AUTHOR: Danniel Ribeiro AUTHOR EMAIL: dannfribeiro@gmail.com AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 69.159.17.3 Array ( [Name] => Danniel Ribeiro [E-mail Address] => dannfribeiro@gmail.com [Message] => I've ordered a score here - Àphones, to be specific - but I still haven't had any email with the link for download. item.title: Ross Waldorf - 2016-03-02 18:34:39
item.content:encoded:
Ms. Iannotta:
I was the effusive person who came up to you last night at the LA Phil performance of your piece, Intent on Resurrection – Spring or Some Such Thing. I just wanted to send along a quick note thanking you again for writing it.
I've been a long-time LA Phil Green Umbrella subscriber, and always look forward to whatever interesting compositions are on the evening's slate. The music you love always makes the day better, whether it's Beethoven, or Stravinsky or David Bowie, or Kendrick Lamar -- I try to be an equal-opportunity listener. The Green Umbrella is a particular animal, though, because generally you'll be introduced to things you haven't heard before -- which is a far different experience than anticipating a performance of Le Sacre du Printemps, or whatever thing it is you know and love.
I tell friends the reason to subscribe to the Green Umbrella is for those occasional pieces that come along that really rattle your brain around -- just get to the heart of why human expression is about the best thing we do. Sometimes something just reaches in and grabs the right couple of synapses, and then there's a big smile. Reminds me that zooming through a vacuum on a big floating rock isn't so bad at all. Yours was one of my all-time favorites — thanks for that.
It’s a beautiful piece. So unpretentious. You did a wonderful job of never seeming to be trying too hard -- just looking around for sounds and textures that were intriguing, and then fitting them together in some inexplicable way that struck you as the right one. All of the effects were so interesting -- so many novel sounds. Not a single one of which made me feel like that grumpy uncle who says (pick any accent or language you like): "Why can't these newfangled composers just let the orchestra play their instruments like normal people!?"
Good luck going forward, and please come back to Los Angeles. There may be a bunch of pot-smoking surfers running wild on the streets until their next audition (not that there’s anything wrong with that), but we also have the LA Phil, and they're a pretty cool bunch. We love them.
All the best to you, and thanks again. Cheers, Ross Waldorf <!--more--> AUTHOR: Ross Waldorf AUTHOR EMAIL: ross_waldorf@mac.com AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 97.93.44.109 Array ( [Name] => Ross Waldorf [E-mail Address] => ross_waldorf@mac.com [Message] => Ms. Iannotta:

Sometimes something just reaches in and grabs the right couple of synapses, and then there's a big smile. Reminds me that zooming through a vacuum on a big floating rock isn't so bad at all. It’s a beautiful piece. So unpretentious. All of the effects were so interesting -- so many novel sounds. item.title: Eliana Echeverry - 2016-03-14 09:47:29
item.content:encoded:
Hello Clara, my name is Eliana Echeverry. I´m from Bogota Colombia. I am composer and psychologist, and I´m conducting a study about the making decision process in composers.
I want to invite you to participate in the stuy. I will be in Boston next week, from march 23th to 27th. I would interview you about one of your works. We can meet where you want.
If you have any question or something please let me know. I hope you can participate in my research.
All the best!!! <!--more--> AUTHOR: Eliana Echeverry AUTHOR EMAIL: elianaecheverrym@gmail.com AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 181.61.136.86 Array ( [Name] => Eliana Echeverry [E-mail Address] => elianaecheverrym@gmail.com [Message] => Hello Clara, my name is Eliana Echeverry. I´m from Bogota Colombia. I am composer and psychologist, and I´m conducting a study about the making decision process in composers.
I want to invite you to participate in the stuy. I will be in Boston next week, from march 23th to 27th. I would interview you about one of your works. We can meet where you want.
If you have any question or something please let me know. I hope you can participate in my research.
All the best!!! )

item.title: Laura Bianchini - 2016-03-16 19:36:34
item.content:encoded: gentile Clara ho avuto modo di ascoltare la sua musica in occasione della Biennale Musique en Scène, alcuni giorni fa. Avrei desiderato conoscerla ma a fine concerto non sono riuscita a raggiungerla. Sono rimasta sinceramente colpita dalla ricchezza timbrica che ha saputo ottenere dall'orchestra e dal pianoforte. Sono una compositrice e co-direttore del Centro Ricerche Musicali - CRM di Roma, un centro impegnato nella ricerca scientifico-tecnologica. Da anni collaboriamo con il GRAME, con il quale abbiamo stabilito una convenzione quadro e stiamo portando avanti un progetto di ricerca sugli strumenti cosiddetti "aumentati". Assieme a Michelangelo Lupone, compositore e co-direttore del CRM stiamo valutando la possibilità di avere un suo lavoro nella prossima edizione 2017 di ArteScienza (periodo fine giugno/luglio) una manifestazione internazionale di arte scienza e cultura contemporanea. Abbiamo un progetto con FRAUKE AULBERT, una cantante, molto dotata che usa tecniche estese della voce, che prevede 5 creazioni per voce con elettronica Mi chiedevo se è disponibile eventualmente a scrivere un brano per lei (durata ca 10'). La cantante sta chiedendo un sostegno alla Fondazione Siemens per il progetto e per le commissioni ai compositori. Purtroppo, come forse saprà, in Italia non ci sono speranze di poter commissionare nuovi brani .... Mi faccia sapere se è interessata e se è disponibile. In attesa di risentirla, cordiali saluti Laura Bianchini laura.bianchini@crm-music.it www.crm-music.it <!--more--> AUTHOR: Laura Bianchini AUTHOR EMAIL: laura.bianchini@crm-music.it AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 185.82.114.192 Array ( [Name] => Laura Bianchini [E-mail Address] => laura.bianchini@crm-music.it [Message] => gentile Clara ho avuto modo di ascoltare la sua musica in occasione della Biennale Musique en Scène, alcuni giorni fa. Avrei desiderato conoscerla ma a fine concerto non sono riuscita a raggiungerla. Sono rimasta sinceramente colpita dalla ricchezza timbrica che ha saputo ottenere dall'orchestra e dal pianoforte. Sono una compositrice e co-direttore del Centro Ricerche Musicali - CRM di Roma, un centro impegnato nella ricerca scientifico-tecnologica. Da anni collaboriamo con il GRAME, con il quale abbiamo stabilito una convenzione quadro e stiamo portando avanti un progetto di ricerca sugli strumenti cosiddetti "aumentati". Assieme a Michelangelo Lupone, compositore e co-direttore del CRM stiamo valutando la possibilità di avere un suo lavoro nella prossima edizione 2017 di ArteScienza (periodo fine giugno/luglio) una manifestazione internazionale di arte scienza e cultura contemporanea. Abbiamo un progetto con FRAUKE AULBERT, una cantante, molto dotata che usa tecniche estese della voce, che prevede 5 creazioni per voce con elettronica Mi chiedevo se è disponibile eventualmente a scrivere un brano per lei (durata ca 10'). La cantante sta chiedendo un sostegno alla Fondazione Siemens per il progetto e per le commissioni ai compositori. Purtroppo, come forse saprà, in Italia non ci sono speranze di poter commissionare nuovi brani .... Mi faccia sapere se è interessata e se è disponibile. In attesa di risentirla, cordiali saluti Laura Bianchini laura.bianchini@crm-music.it www.crm-music.it )

item.title: Kieran Murphy - 2016-03-22 17:46:50
item.content:encoded:
Greetings!
I'm just writing to let you know about a new up and coming website that may benefit you and the Audio Community as a whole.
http://audioprofessionals.net
To be as brief as possible; It's a website designed for both audio professional AND potential employer. It's quick and easy for professionals to set up profiles - no sign up is required for people looking for audio work. It essentially allows users to be contacted directly through their own preferred means. Lastly, it's completely free for audio professionals to create a profile and share some work!
So at the very least, it offers you a free additional platform for more exposure and hopefully more work.
Thank you for your time,
Kieran Murphy. <!--more--> AUTHOR: Kieran Murphy AUTHOR EMAIL: contact@audioprofessionals.net AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 109.76.219.121 Array ( [Name] => Kieran Murphy [E-mail Address] => contact@audioprofessionals.net [Message] => Greetings!
I'm just writing to let you know about a new up and coming website that may benefit you and the Audio Community as a whole.
http://audioprofessionals.net
To be as brief as possible; It's a website designed for both audio professional AND potential employer. It's quick and easy for professionals to set up profiles - no sign up is required for people looking for audio work. It essentially allows users to be contacted directly through their own preferred means. Lastly, it's completely free for audio professionals to create a profile and share some work!
So at the very least, it offers you a free additional platform for more exposure and hopefully more work.
Thank you for your time,
Kieran Murphy. )

item.title: Zach Beever - 2016-03-28 06:37:55
item.content:encoded:
Hi Clara,
I recently purchased some of your scores and I was wondering where I could find a full recording of Clangs.
Best, Zach <!--more--> AUTHOR: Zach Beever AUTHOR EMAIL: zachary_beever@bostonconservatory.edu AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 98.217.181.164 Array ( [Name] => Zach Beever [E-mail Address] => zachary_beever@bostonconservatory.edu [Message] => Hi Clara,

item.title: Yuji Noguchi - 2016-04-09 11:06:58
item.content:encoded: Hi Clara, I'm currently preparing Al di là del bianco (bass clar part) for a concert with Vortex ensemble. Could you please make a part music based on the score and send it to me? The part I'm working on has a lot of misstakes, (no match with score) for ex. bar 59, 62, 67, 69, 122. The bar 132, I need your help. Many thanks in advance, kind regards. P.S. I like very much your music!!!! Yuji <!--more--> AUTHOR: Yuji Noguchi AUTHOR EMAIL: noguchi.yuji@gmail.com AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 31.10.175.198 Array ( [Name] => Yuji Noguchi [E-mail Address] => noguchi.yuji@gmail.com [Message] => Hi Clara, I'm currently preparing Al di là del bianco (bass clar part) for a concert with Vortex ensemble. Could you please make a part music based on the score and send it to me? The part I'm working on has a lot of misstakes, (no match with score) for ex. bar 59, 62, 67, 69, 122. The bar 132, I need your help. Many thanks in advance, kind regards. P.S. I like very much your music!!!! Yuji )

item.title: Jeffrey Means - 2016-04-10 01:05:57
item.content:encoded:
Dear Clara,
I'm writing on behalf on Sound Icon, a new music ensemble in Boston for which I am Artistic Director. I'm interested in programming Troglodyte Angels Clank By on our first concert of the 16/17 season. I know this is a recent piece of yours, and I'm wondering if it will be under exclusivity rights this fall?
Thank you, Jeff Means <!--more--> AUTHOR: Jeffrey Means AUTHOR EMAIL: jeff.c.means@gmail.com AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 66.30.250.191 Array ( [Name] => Jeffrey Means [E-mail Address] => jeff.c.means@gmail.com [Message] => Dear Clara,
I'm writing on behalf on Sound Icon, a new music ensemble in Boston for which I am Artistic Director. I'm interested in programming Troglodyte Angels Clank By on our first concert of the 16/17 season. I know this is a recent piece of yours, and I'm wondering if it will be under exclusivity rights this fall?
Thank you, Jeff Means )

item.title: Michelle O'Sullivan - 2016-04-11 23:53:59
item.content:encoded: Dear Clara, as a poet with The Gallery Press I have been asked to curate some events on behalf of The Ballina Arts Centre. Currently, I am in process of curating an evening to celebrate the work of Dorothy Molloy, who was born and lived her early years in Ballina, Co. Mayo. The event will be taking place at the beginning of August. I was much taken with your string quartet , A Failed Entertainment and more so when I learned that Dorothy was mentioned as inspiration. The event is bringing apprpox. 8 artists/writers together to read 2-3 poems of Dorothy's followed by a personal response to the poems or her work in general. I'd like to extend an invitation to you to be part of the event. If this is of interest to you, and I do hope it will, I send of on more details of the events re: reading fees etc... Kindest Regards, Michelle O'Sullivan <!--more--> AUTHOR: Michelle O'Sullivan AUTHOR EMAIL: michelle.osullivan@talk21.com AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 109.77.234.16 Array ( [Name] => Michelle O'Sullivan [E-mail Address] => michelle.osullivan@talk21.com [Message] => Dear Clara, as a poet with The Gallery Press I have been asked to curate some events on behalf of The Ballina Arts Centre. Currently, I am in process of curating an evening to celebrate the work of Dorothy Molloy, who was born and lived her early years in Ballina, Co. Mayo. The event will be taking place at the beginning of August. I was much taken with your string quartet , A Failed Entertainment and more so when I learned that Dorothy was mentioned as inspiration. The event is bringing apprpox. 8 artists/writers together to read 2-3 poems of Dorothy's followed by a personal response to the poems or her work in general. I'd like to extend an invitation to you to be part of the event. If this is of interest to you, and I do hope it will, I send of on more details of the events re: reading fees etc... Kindest Regards, Michelle O'Sullivan )

item.title: walentynowicz - 2016-04-23 14:17:00
item.content:encoded: Dear Clara, I'm Ensemble Garage pianist mwalentynowicz.com and I currently look for a piece for piano solo and orchestra, I listened to your soundcloud and I liked your a lot - paw-marks in wet cement. Congratulations great piece! I would like to ask if it could be possible for you to send me full score or parts of that or tech rider? I would be happy if it will be possible to perform it but so far I understand there a re also two fermormers piano percussion in the piano right?. We are looking for a suitable piece. The concert would be with a new music orchestra Kattowitz which regularly performs by warsaw autumn festival. Thank you very much! All best Malgorzata <!--more--> AUTHOR: walentynowicz AUTHOR EMAIL: malgorzata.walentynowicz@gmail.com AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 185.66.195.88 Array ( [Name] => walentynowicz [E-mail Address] => malgorzata.walentynowicz@gmail.com [Message] => Dear Clara, I'm Ensemble Garage pianist mwalentynowicz.com and I currently look for a piece for piano solo and orchestra, I listened to your soundcloud and I liked your a lot - paw-marks in wet cement. item.title: Ettore Garzia - 2016-06-01 20:27:35
item.content:encoded:
Salve Clara,
mi chiamo Ettore Garzia e sono il redattore di Percorsi Musicali, un ampio blog musicale che si interessa di musica, e soprattutto di contemporanea ed improvvisazione. Le ho anche chiesto l'amicizia su Facebook già qualche tempo fa, che mi ha accordato. Le scrivo per segnalare che ho parlato della sua musica e del suo recente cd nello spazio che da inizio anno dedico alla musica contemporanea italiana. Spero gradirà. Il link è: http://ettoregarzia.blogspot.it/2016/06/suoni-della-contemporaneita-italiana.html. Le faccio i miei complimenti per il suo lavoro che è di altissima qualità ed emotivamente affascinante. I miei cari saluti, Ettore Garzia - Percorsi Musicali. <!--more--> AUTHOR: Ettore Garzia AUTHOR EMAIL: ettoregarzia@gmail.com AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 93.67.160.152 Array ( [Name] => Ettore Garzia [E-mail Address] => ettoregarzia@gmail.com [Message] => Salve Clara,

I miei cari saluti, Ettore Garzia - Percorsi Musicali. )

item.title: Etienne Nillesen - 2016-06-15 22:18:54
item.content:encoded:
Hi Clara, first of all I really love your music and the 'a failed entertainment' cd!! I bought 4 scores for study on june 12th but I haven't gotten an email yet. I'm not in a hurry so no problem but I think you wrote to contact you if no emails were received. It's these 4 scores: The people here go mad. They blame the wind. (score) Al di là del bianco (score) Limun (score) A Failed Entertainment (score)
Thanks for your music! Best Etienne Nillesen <!--more--> AUTHOR: Etienne Nillesen AUTHOR EMAIL: etiennenillesen@live.com AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 87.79.219.220 Array ( [Name] => Etienne Nillesen [E-mail Address] => etiennenillesen@live.com [Message] => Hi Clara, first of all I really love your music and the 'a failed entertainment' cd!! It's these 4 scores: The people here go mad. They blame the wind. (score) Al di là del bianco (score) Limun (score) A Failed Entertainment (score)
Thanks for your music! Best Etienne Nillesen
)

item.title: Saeko Takayama - 2016-07-05 13:00:16
item.content:encoded: Dear Ms. Iannotta, I'm Saeko Takayama, Violinist and member of ensemble cross.art in Stuttgart, Germany. We will play in a concert with the Thema " Italien music" in November2016 in Stuttgart and I 'm looking for a piece of violin solo. I have interest in your "dead wasps in the jam-jar (i) " and would like to ask you whether I can get the score or recording. I'm looking forward your answer. Best regards, Saeko Takayama <!--more--> AUTHOR: Saeko Takayama AUTHOR EMAIL: saekot828@googlemail.com AUTHOR URL: SUBJECT: Contact e-mail from claraiannota.com IP: 188.96.163.83 Array ( [Name] => Saeko Takayama [E-mail Address] => saekot828@googlemail.com [Message] => Dear Ms. Iannotta, I'm Saeko Takayama, Violinist and member of ensemble cross.art in Stuttgart, Germany. We will play in a concert with the Thema " Italien music" in November2016 in Stuttgart and I 'm looking for a piece of violin solo. I have interest in your "dead wasps in the jam-jar (i) " and would like to ask you whether I can get the score or recording. I'm looking forward your answer. Best regards, Saeko Takayama )
